<includeonly><infobox type="Album"> <title source="title"/> <image source="image"><caption source="imagecaption"/></image> <data source="artist"><label>Artist</label></data> <data source="released"><label>Released</label></data> <data source="recorded"><label>Recorded</label></data> <data source="length"><label>Length</label></data> <data source="label"><label>Label</label></data> <data source="producer"><label>Producer</label></data> </infobox></includeonly><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

== Description == To use this template, add the {{T|{{BASEPAGENAME}}}} template and fill in the appropriate fields. Fields left blank will not appear in articles. This infobox template uses [[w:Help:Infobox|Fandom's infobox syntax]]. == Syntax == 
{{Album
 | title         = 
 | image         = [e.g. "Example.jpg"]
 | imagecaption  = 
 | artist        = 
 | released      = 
 | recorded      = 
 | length        = 
 | label         = 
 | producer      = 
}}
== Sample output == {{Album | title = Fleur | image = Example.jpg | artist = Marigold | released = June 2012 | recorded = 2011 | length = 88:88 | label = Spring | producer = Daffy }} 
{{Album
 | title         = Fleur
 | image         = Example.jpg
 | artist        = Marigold
 | released      = June 2012
 | recorded      = 2011
 | length        = 88:88
 | label         = Spring
 | producer      = Daffy
}}
[[Category:Infobox templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

revision.comment: Remove aria complementary role because it's incorrect in this context; see: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Accessibility/ARIA/Roles/complementary_role
revision.text:
{| class="article-table plainlinks" style="width:100%;" |- style="font-size:18px;" ! style="padding:0px;" |
Template documentation
|- | ''Note: portions of the template sample may not be visible without values provided.'' |- | View or edit [[{{{1|Template:{{PAGENAMEE}}/doc}}}|this documentation]]. ([[Template:Documentation|About template documentation]]) |- | Editors can experiment in this template's [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}/sandbox|action=edit}} sandbox] and [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}/testcases}} test case] pages. |}
{{{{{1|{{PAGENAME}}/doc}}}}}
{{Documentation}}[[Category:Documentation templates]]

==Description== This template is used to insert descriptions on template pages. ==Syntax== Add {{t|Documentation}} at the end of the template page. Add {{t|Documentation|documentation page}} to transclude an alternative page from the /doc subpage. ==Usage== ===On the Template page=== This is the normal format when used: 
TEMPLATE CODE
Any categories to be inserted into articles by the template
{{Documentation}}
''If your template is not a completed div or table, you may need to close the tags just before {{Documentation}} is inserted (within the noinclude tags).'' ''A line break right before {{Documentation}} can also be useful as it helps prevent the documentation template "running into" previous code.'' ===On the documentation page=== The documentation page is usually located on the /doc subpage for a template, but a different page can be specified with the first parameter of the template (see [[#Syntax|Syntax]]). Normally, you will want to write something like the following on the documentation page: 
==Description==
This template is used to do something.

==Syntax==
Type {{t|templatename}} somewhere.

==Samples==
<nowiki>{{templatename|input}}</nowiki> 

results in...

{{templatename|input}}

Any categories for the template itself
[[Category:Template documentation]]
Use any or all of the above description/syntax/sample output sections. You may also want to add "see also" or other sections. Note that the above example also uses the [[Template:T]] template. [[Category:Documentation templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

;Description A template link with a variable number of parameters (0-20).
;Syntax :{{t|t|parameter1|parameter2|parameter3|parameter4|...|parameter20}} <!-- self-referential examples! -->
;Source :Improved version not needing t/piece subtemplate developed on [http://templates.fandom.com Templates wiki] see the [http://templates.fandom.com/index.php?title=Template:T&action=history list of authors]. Copied here via CC-By-SA 3.0 license.
;Example :{{t|t|param1|param2}}

<includeonly><infobox type="Character"> <title source="name"/> <image source="image"> <caption source="imagecaption" /> </image> <group> <data source="aliases"><label>Aliases</label></data> <data source="relatives"><label>Relatives</label></data> <data source="affiliation"><label>Affiliation</label></data> <data source="occupation"><label>Occupation</label></data> </group> <group> <header>Biographical information</header> <data source="marital"><label>Marital status</label></data> <data source="birthDate"><label>Date of birth</label></data> <data source="birthPlace"><label>Place of birth</label></data> <data source="deathDate"><label>Date of death</label></data> <data source="deathPlace"><label>Place of death</label></data> </group> <group> <header>Physical description</header> <data source="species"><label>Species</label></data> <data source="gender"><label>Gender</label></data> <data source="height"><label>Height</label></data> <data source="weight"><label>Weight</label></data> <data source="eyes"><label>Eye color</label></data> </group> <group> <header>Appearances</header> <data source="portrayedby"><label>Portrayed by</label></data> <data source="appearsin"><label>Appears in</label></data> <data source="debut"><label>Debut</label></data> </group> </infobox>{{#ifeq: {{NAMESPACENUMBER}} | 0 | [[Category:Characters]]}}</includeonly><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

 | name         = 
 | image        =

 | affiliation  = 
 | occupation   =

 | birthDate    =

 | deathDate    = 
 | deathPlace   = 
 | species      = 
 | gender       = 
 | height       = 
 | weight       = 
 | eyes         = 
 | portrayedby  = 
 | appearsin    = 
 | debut        = 

}}

;Description :This template is used to create a basic navigation box. You can do so by calling the template, via the steps under "Syntax", but it is recommended to '''copy the code verbatim''' via the steps under "Navbox Creation". ;Navbox Creation type=create prefix=Template: preload=Template:Navbox_Sample editintro=Template:Navbox/doc buttonlabel=Make your navbox! default = Navbox Foo #Think of a name for your navbox, like "Navbox Foo". Type it in the above field, press the button, and save the page immediately. Be ready to return to ''this'' page to see the rest of the instructions. #Edit the resulting page in source mode. #Replace {{{header}}} with the text you would like to appear in the header. #Replace {{{body}}} with the text you would like to appear in the body. #To add another section, copy these four lines of code immediately below the lines in the existing code that they resemble: 
|-
! style="padding:0.2em 0.5em;" nowrap="nowrap" class="color1" | {{{header}}}
|-
| style="padding:0.2em 0.5em;" | {{{body}}}
Save the page once you have added as many sections as you needed, and filled them with content. You may also want to create a /doc subpage explaining that to call the resulting template, one must only type {{Navbox Foo}}, or rather, whatever we decided to name the template in step 1. ;Syntax 
{{navbox
|header=Land of Bob
|body=This [[place]] and that [[place]].
}}
:Results in... {{navbox |header=Land of Bob |body=This [[place]] and that [[place]]. }} [[Category:Navbox templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

== Description == This template uses your wiki's SITENAME and strips off the word "wiki" leaving what is in most cases the text describing the topic of your wiki. To use this template in its basic form, simply add the {{T|{{BASEPAGENAME}}}} template wherever you want your topic to appear in a sentence or section. If your wiki's SITENAME minus the word "wiki" is not a good descriptor for your wiki's topic, you may also simply edit the template and replace it with just the text you want displayed. == Syntax == 
{{Topic}}
== Sample output == {{Topic}} [[Category:Templates]][[Category:Template documentation|{{PAGENAME}}]]

;Description :This template is used to mark pages for deletion, categorizing them in [[:Category:Candidates for deletion]]. ;Syntax :Type {{t|delete}} on the page to be deleted.''' [[Category:Notice templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

==Description== To use this template, enter the following and fill in the appropriate fields. Most fields left blank will not show up. ==Syntax== 
{{Quote
 | quote   = 
 | speaker = 
 | source  = 
}}
As an alternative, these can be placed in positional order. ==Samples== {{Quote | quote = When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. | speaker = [[w:c:gameofthrones:Cersei Lannister|Cersei Lannister]] | source = [[w:c:gameofthrones:You Win or You Die|"You Win or You Die"]] }} 
{{Quote
 | quote   = When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.
 | speaker = [[w:c:gameofthrones:Cersei Lannister|Cersei Lannister]]
 | source  = [[w:c:gameofthrones:You Win or You Die|"You Win or You Die"]]
}}
or 
{{Quote
 | When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die.
 | [[w:c:gameofthrones:Cersei Lannister|Cersei Lannister]]
 | [[w:c:gameofthrones:You Win or You Die|"You Win or You Die"]]
}}
== Technical details == This template uses the [[w:Help:Lua|Lua templating language]], and more information can be found [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Quote|on the Global Lua Module page]]. '''For a traditional wikitext version of this template, see [[w:c:templates:Template:Quote|Quote on Templates Wiki]]'''. [[Category:Quote templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

;Description :Marks an article as a disambiguation page, adding a banner to the article and categorizing it under [[:Category:Disambiguations]]. ;Syntax :Add {{t|disambiguation}} at the top of a disambiguation page. [[Category:Notice templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

{{t|Dialogue}} facilitates the writing of dialogue in a standard format. The template can handle most standard formats of writing dialogue, and can be indented, bulleted or numbered. '''This template ''cannot'' be subst:'d'''. This template uses the [[w:Help:Lua|Lua templating language]], and more information can be found [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Dialogue|on the Global Lua Module page]]. '''For a traditional wikitext version of this template, see [[w:c:templates:Template:Dialogue/wikitext|Dialogue on Templates Wiki]]'''. ==Syntax== This is how to write the template in [[w:Help:wikitext|wikitext]] onto your article: 
{{dialogue
|short=full
|short=full
|short=full
...
|Character|Speech
|Character|Speech
|Character|Speech
...
|cite = dialogue description
}}
These parameters are explained more fully below. ==Parameters== '''Named parameters specify name shortcuts. They are all optional.''' They are placed at the top of the template call, like this: 
{{dialogue
|short=full
|short=full
|short=full
...
Name shortcuts apply to your main dialogue text. If you use a shortcut specified here for a character name, then the full name will be replaced for it. Named parameters of the form "mood1", "mood2", "mood3", etc., up to "mood10", specify moods for the corresponding line number (e.g. "mood1" specifies line 1). They are placed in a line like this: 
...
|Character|Speech|mood1=angry
|Character|Speech|mood2=quiet
|Character|Speech|mood3=ecstatic
...
Positional parameters form the text of the dialogue (i.e. any line not containing an "=" will be construed as part of the dialogue. :;Parameter 1 ''(required)'' : Character name speaking :;Parameter 2 ''(optional)'' : Line to speak :;Parameter 3 ''(optional)'' : Next character :;Parameter 4 ''(optional)'' : Next line :;Parameter 5 ''(optional)'' : Next character :;Parameter 6 ''(optional)'' : Next line :;Parameter 7 ''(optional)'' : so on... Note: if any character is called "action" then that line will be construed as an action line. It still counts as a ''line'' nonetheless. To write a dialogue description/source, use cite = ==Examples== Here is an example of a full template usage: 
{{dialogue
|harry=Harry Enfield
|bryan=Bryan Adams

|harry|Hello!                |mood1=happy
|bryan|Oh hello there        |mood2=surprised
|harry|How are you?          |mood3=inquisitive
|bryan|Quite fine thank you. |mood4=reserved
|harry|Oh that's spiffing.   |mood5=spiffed
|bryan|It is, isn't it?!     |mood6=multo-spiffed
|harry|Quite so.             |mood7=bored
|bryan|Well, I'm off!        |mood8=joyous
|harry|Ta-ta!                |mood9=relieved
|bryan|Au revoir!            |mood10=sarcastic
}}
The above would generate: {{dialogue |harry=Harry Enfield |bryan=Bryan Adams |harry|Hello! |mood1=happy |bryan|Oh hello there |mood2=surprised |harry|How are you? |mood3=inquisitive |bryan|Quite fine thank you. |mood4=reserved |harry|Oh that's spiffing. |mood5=spiffed |bryan|It is, isn't it?! |mood6=multo-spiffed |harry|Quite so. |mood7=bored |bryan|Well, I'm off! |mood8=joyous |harry|Ta-ta! |mood9=relieved |bryan|Au revoir! |mood10=sarcastic }} The below code demonstrates examples of extended use: 
{{dialogue
|george=Georgie Boy
|rachel=Rachel

|action|Enter: George and Rachel
|george|Good morrow dearest Rachel!|mood2=happy
|action|Rachel turns to see him
|rachel|Oh, George, it's you!
|george|...
|rachel|Why won't you say anything?!|mood6=worried
|action|Enter: Guards
|Guards|We are announcing George's arrest!
|rachel|Oh my!|mood9=horrified
|action|George is dragged away.
}}
The above would generate: {{dialogue |george=Georgie Boy |rachel=Rachel |action|Enter: George and Rachel |george|Good morrow dearest Rachel!|mood2=happy |action|Rachel turns to see him |rachel|Oh, George, it's you! |george|... |rachel|Why won't you say anything?!|mood6=worried |action|Enter: Guards |Guards|We are announcing George's arrest! |rachel|Oh my!|mood9=horrified |action|George is dragged away. }} ===Notes=== You can number, bullet or indent your dialogue: 
:{{dialogue|Me|Hello|You|Howdido!}}
:{{dialogue|Me|Hello|You|Howdido!}} 
#{{dialogue|Me|Hello|You|Howdido!}}
#{{dialogue|Them|Good afternoon|Us|What a load of rubbish!}}
#{{dialogue|Me|Hello|You|Howdido!}} #{{dialogue|Them|Good afternoon|Us|What a load of rubbish!}} 
*{{dialogue
|angel=Fortitude
|angel|I am an angel!|Crowd|We don't believe you!}}
*{{dialogue
|angel=Fortitude
|angel|But I'm being quite serious!|Crowd|Too bad for you then!}}
*{{dialogue |angel=Fortitude |angel|I am an angel!|Crowd|We don't believe you!}} *{{dialogue |angel=Fortitude |angel|But I'm being quite serious!|Crowd|Too bad for you then!}} You will get the odd spacing error (e.g. "Speech") if you lay out your dialogue on multiple lines. [[Category:Quote templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

This is the {{t|Namespace}} meta-template. It helps other templates detect what type of page they are on. It detects and groups all the different [[Wikipedia:Namespace#Enumeration|namespaces]] used on Fandom into several types: ; main : Main (i.e. article) space, where normal articles are kept. ; talk : Any talk space, including page names that start with "Talk:", "User talk:", "File talk:", etc. ;user ;file ;mediawiki ;template ;help ;category : The remaining namespaces. ; other : Any namespaces that were not specified as a parameter to the template (see explanation below). For backwards compatibility, this template handles '''image''' as if '''file'''. '''image''' ([[Image:...]]) is now deprecated. '''Note:''' For most cases it may be better to use the simpler namespace detection templates (see the [[#See also|see also]] section below). This template is more prone to human errors such as misspelling parameter names. This template uses the [[w:Help:Lua|Lua templating language]], and more information can be found [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Namespace_detect|on the Global Lua Module page]]. '''For a traditional wikitext version of this template, see [[w:c:templates:Template:Namespace_detect|Namespace_detect on Templates Wiki]]'''. == Usage == This template takes one or more parameters named after the different page types as listed above. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | main  = Article text
 | talk  = Talk page text
 | other = Other pages text
}}
If the template is on a main (article) page, it will return this: : {{Namespace |demospace=main | main = Article text | talk = Talk page text | other = Other pages text }} If the template is on any other page than an article or a talk page, it will return this: : {{Namespace | main = Article text | talk = Talk page text | other = Other pages text }} The example above made the template return something for all page types. But if we don't use the '''other''' parameter or leave it empty, it will not return anything for the other page types. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | file     = File page text
 | category = Category page text
 | other    =
}}
On any pages other than file and category pages the code above will render nothing. : {{Namespace | file = File page text | category = Category page text | other = }} By using an empty parameter, you can make it so the template doesn't render anything for some specific page type. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | main  = 
 | other = Other pages text
}}
The code above will render nothing when on mainspace (article) pages, but will return this when on other pages: : {{Namespace | main = | other = Other pages text }} == Demospace and page == For testing and demonstration purposes, this template can take two parameters named '''demospace''' and '''page'''. '''demospace''' understands any of the page type names used by this template, including the '''other''' type. It tells the template to behave like it is on some specific type of page. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | main  = Article text
 | other = Other pages text
 | demospace = main
}}
No matter on what kind of page the code above is used, it will return this: : {{Namespace | main = Article text | other = Other pages text | demospace = main }} The '''page''' parameter instead takes a normal pagename, making this template behave exactly as if on that page. The pagename doesn't have to be an existing page. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | user  = User page text
 | other = Other pages text
 | page  = User:Example
}}
No matter on what kind of page the code above is used, it will return this: : {{Namespace | user = User page text | other = Other pages text | page = User:Example }} It can be convenient to let your template understand the '''demospace''' and/or '''page''' parameter and send it on to the {{T|Namespace}} template. Like this: 
{{Namespace
 | main  = Article text
 | other = Other pages text
 | demospace = {{{demospace|}}}
 | page  = {{{page|}}}
}}
If both the '''demospace''' and '''page''' parameters are empty or undefined, the template will detect page types as usual. == Parameters == List of all parameters: 
{{Namespace
| main  = 
...
| other =
| demospace = {{{demospace|}}} / main / talk / user /
              file / mediawiki / template /
              help / category / other
| page  = {{{page|}}} / User:Example
}}
== Technical details == If you intend to feed tables as content to the numbered parameters of this template, you need to know this: [[w:Help:Template|Templates]] have a problem handling parameter data that contains pipes "|" unless the pipe is inside another template {{name|param1}} or inside a piped link [[w:Help:Template|help]]. Thus templates can not handle [[w:Help:Table|wikitables]] as input unless you escape them by using the {{!}} [[w:Help:Magic words|magic word]]. This makes it hard to use wikitables as parameters to templates. Instead, the usual solution is to use HTML wikimarkup for the table code, which is more robust. [[Category:General wiki templates]]{{#ifeq:{{SUBPAGENAME}}|sandbox|[[Category:Namespace manipulation templates]]}}[[Category:Template documentation]]

-- This Module is used for making templates based in the Lua language. -- See more details about Lua in [[w:Help:Lua]]. -- The Fandom Developer's Wiki hosts Global Lua Modules that can be imported and locally overridden. -- The next line imports the Dialogue module from the [[w:c:dev:Global Lua Modules]]. local Dialogue = require('Dev:Dialogue') -- See more details about this module at [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Dialogue]]
-- The last line produces the output for the template return Dialogue

-- This Module is used for making templates based in the Lua language. -- See more details about Lua in [[w:Help:Lua]]. -- The Fandom Developer's Wiki hosts Global Lua Modules that can be imported and locally overridden. -- The next line imports the Hatnote module from the [[w:c:dev:Global Lua Modules]]. local H = require('Dev:Hatnote') -- See more details about this module at [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Hatnote]]
-- The last line produces the output for the template return H

-- This Module is used for making templates based in the Lua language. -- See more details about Lua in [[w:Help:Lua]]. -- The Fandom Developer's Wiki hosts Global Lua Modules that can be imported and locally overridden. -- The next line imports the Mbox module from the [[w:c:dev:Global Lua Modules]]. local Mbox = require('Dev:Mbox') -- See more details about this module at [[w:c:dev:Global_Lua_Modules/Mbox]]
-- The imported Module is overwritten locally to include default styling. -- For a more flexible Mbox experience, delete the function below and import -- https://dev.fandom.com/wiki/MediaWiki:Global_Lua_Modules/Mbox.css -- or paste (and modify as you like) its contents in your wiki's -- [[MediaWiki:Wikia.css]] (see [[w:Help:Including_additional_CSS_and_JS]]) -- or look at https://dev.fandom.com/wiki/Global_Lua_Modules/Mbox -- for more customization inspiration
-- -- BEGIN DELETION HERE --
local getArgs = require('Dev:Arguments').getArgs local localCSS = mw.loadData('Module:Mbox/data').localStyle
function Mbox.main(frame) local args = getArgs(frame)
-- styles local styles = {} if args.bordercolor then styles['border-left-color'] = args.bordercolor elseif args.type then styles['border-left-color'] = 'var(--type-' .. args.type .. ')' end
if args.bgcolor then styles['background-color'] = args.bgcolor end
-- images local image = args.image or '' local imagewidth = args.imagewidth or '80px' local imagelink = '' if args.imagelink then imagelink = '|link=' .. args.imagelink end
local imagewikitext = ('%sFile:%s|%s%s' .. ']]'):format('[[', image, imagewidth, imagelink)
-- id for closure local id = args.id or 'mbox'
local container = mw.html.create('div') :addClass('mbox') :addClass(args.class) :css(styles) :css(localCSS['mbox']) :cssText(args.style)
local content = container:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content') :css(localCSS['mbox__content'])
if args.image then local image = content:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__image') :addClass('mw-collapsible') :attr('id', 'mw-customcollapsible-' .. id) :css(localCSS['mbox__content__image']) :wikitext(imagewikitext) if args.collapsed then image:addClass('mw-collapsed') end end
local contentwrapper = content:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__wrapper') :css(localCSS['mbox__content__wrapper'])
if args.header then contentwrapper:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__header') :css(localCSS['mbox__content__header']) :wikitext(args.header) end
if args.text then local text = contentwrapper:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__text') :addClass('mw-collapsible') :attr('id', 'mw-customcollapsible-' .. id) :css(localCSS['mbox__content__text']) :wikitext(args.text) if args.collapsed then text:addClass('mw-collapsed') end
if args.comment then text:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__text__comment') :css(localCSS['mbox__content__text__comment']) :wikitext(args.comment) end end
contentwrapper:tag('span') :addClass('mbox__close') :addClass('mw-customtoggle-' .. id) :css(localCSS['mbox__close']) :attr('title', 'Dismiss')
if args.aside then local aside = content:tag('div') :addClass('mbox__content__aside') :addClass('mw-collapsible') :attr('id', 'mw-customcollapsible-' .. id) :css(localCSS['mbox__content__aside']) :wikitext(args.aside) if args.collapsed then aside:addClass('mw-collapsed') end end
return container end
-- -- END DELETION HERE --
-- The last line produces the output for the template return Mbox

;Description This template allows you to clear the left side, right side, or both sides of the page. Clearing means that the content following the template will not be displayed until the existing content on the specified sides (for example, "hanging" or floating images or blocks) is displayed completely. This template is often used so that the text does not flow around unrelated images. The template adds the following code to the page:
(the value after clear depends on the parameters). This code affects elements with the CSS property float, including files floated to the side (for example, [[File:Image.png|right]]). ;Syntax * To clear both sides of the page, add the code {{t|Clear}}. * To clear only the left side of the page, add the code {{t|Clear|left}}. * To clear only the right side of the page, add the code {{t|Clear|right}}. You can also use {{t|-}} instead of {{t|Clear}} as a shorthand call for this template. __NOTOC__ ;Example 

=== Section 1 ===
[[File:Example.jpg|200px|right]]
Section 1 text.

=== Section 2 ===
Section 2 text.
{{Clear|right}}

=== Section 3 ===
Section 3 text.
This code produces the following result: ---- === Section 1 === [[File:Example.jpg|200px|right]] Section 1 text. === Section 2 === Section 2 text. {{Clear|right}} === Section 3 === Section 3 text. ---- As you can see above, the example image added in section 1 is displayed to the right and extends down through section 2, while the {{t|Clear}} template is called at the end of the second section, resulting in the example image not being next to section 3. Thus, one use of the {{t|Clear}} template is to control which elements are displayed next to which other elements. == See also == * [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/clear CSS property clear on MDN] * [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/float CSS property float on MDN] [[Category:General wiki templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

<includeonly><infobox> <title source="title"> <default>{{PAGENAME}}</default> </title> <image source="image"> <caption source="caption"/> </image> <data source="developer"><label>Developer</label></data> <data source="publisher"><label>Publisher</label></data> <data source="engine"><label>Engine</label></data> <data source="version"><label>Version</label></data> <data source="platform"><label>Platform</label></data> <data source="releasedate"><label>Release date</label></data> <data source="genre"><label>Genre</label></data> <data source="mode"><label>Mode</label></data> <data source="rating"><label>Rating</label></data> <data source="media"><label>Media</label></data> <group collapse="open"> <header>System requirements</header> <data source="requirements"></data> </group> </infobox></includeonly><noinclude>{{Documentation}}</noinclude>

== Description == To use this template, add the {{T|{{BASEPAGENAME}}}} template and fill in the appropriate fields. Fields left blank will not appear in articles. This infobox template uses [[w:Help:Infobox|Fandom's infobox syntax]]. == Syntax == 
{{Game
 | title         = The game's name, displayed on top of the infobox
 | image         = [e.g. "Example.jpg"]
 | developer     = 
 | publisher     = 
 | engine        = The engine the game runs on
 | version       = Most recently released version of the game. If your wiki does patch notes, you may wish to link to those.
 | platform      = Platform(s) the game is available on
 | releasedate   = When the game released
 | genre         = Genre(s) the game is classified as
 | mode          = Singeplayer, multiplayer, etc.
 | rating        = ESRB / PEGI, etc. ratings
 | media         = What media the game is available on (digital, cartridge, cd, etc.)
 | requirements  = System requirements
}}
== Sample output == {{Game | title = The Game of Flower | image = Example.jpg | developer = | publisher = | engine = | version = | platform = PC | releasedate = Soon | genre = RPG | mode = Single player | rating = | media = | requirements = Cutting edge hardware }} 
{{Game
 | title         = The Game of Flower
 | image         = Example.jpg
 | developer     = 
 | publisher     = 
 | engine        = 
 | version       = 
 | platform      = PC
 | releasedate   = Soon
 | genre         = RPG
 | mode          = Single player
 | rating        = 
 | media         = 
 | requirements  = Cutting edge hardware
}}

;Description :This template is used to create the box used by the various image license templates. The default styling is currently geared to a light-themed wiki. If your wiki has a dark theme and this template is too bright relative to the other elements on your wiki, simply change the following style parameters: :background-color: This is the color of the background and is currently set to: #fefefe :border-color: This is the color of the borders and is currently set to: #d6d6d6 :color: This is the color of the text and is currently set to: #333 ;Syntax :Type {{t|LicenseBox|text{{=}}License text}} on the image information page. revision.text: This module is used by most of the basic [[:Category:Quote templates|Quote templates]] and is invoked by {{t|Quote}}.
This module is invoked by the {{t|Dialogue}} template.
This module is invoked by the {{t|Hatnote}} template, which is used by a number of [[:Category:Notice templates|Notice templates]].
This module is invoked by the {{t|Navbox}} template. Navbox templates are not displayed for mobile users.
This module is invoked by the {{t|Namespace}} template.

revision.comment: Created page with "This module stores configuration data for Module:Namespace detect. Here you can localise the module to your wiki's language. To activate a configuration item, you need to u..."
revision.text:
This module stores configuration data for Module:Namespace detect. Here you can localise the module to your wiki's language.
To activate a configuration item, you need to uncomment it. This means that you need to remove the text "-- " at the start of the line.

== Description == To use this template, add the {{T|{{BASEPAGENAME}}}} template and fill in the appropriate fields. Fields left blank will not appear in articles. This infobox template uses [[w:Help:Infobox|Fandom's infobox syntax]]. == Syntax == 
{{Series
 | title     = 
 | image     = 
 | caption   = 
 | release   = 
 | seasons   = 
 | episodes  = 
 | runtime   = 
 | genre     = 
 | network   = 
 | distrib   = 
 | creator   = 
 | writer    = 
 | director  = 
 | composer  = 
 | based on  = 
 | exec prod = 
 | producer  = 
 | prod co   = 
 | country   = 
 | language  = 
}}
== Sample output == {{Series | title = ''Default page title'' | image = Wiki.png | caption = Test | release = Test | seasons = Test | episodes = Test | runtime = Test | genre = Test | network = Test | distrib = Test | creator = Test | writer = Test | director = Test | composer = Test | based on = Test | exec prod = Test | producer = Test | prod co = Test | country = Test | language = Test }} 
{{Series
 | title     = ''Default page title''
 | image     = Wiki.png
 | caption   = Test
 | release   = Test
 | seasons   = Test
 | episodes  = Test
 | runtime   = Test
 | genre     = Test
 | network   = Test
 | distrib   = Test
 | creator   = Test
 | writer    = Test
 | director  = Test
 | composer  = Test
 | based on  = Test
 | exec prod = Test
 | producer  = Test
 | prod co   = Test
 | country   = Test
 | language  = Test
}}

''{{{work}}}'' }}{{#if: {{{pages|}}} | {{{pages}}} }}{{#if: {{{publisher|}}} | . {{{publisher}}}{{#if: {{{author|}}}{{{last|}}} | | {{#if: {{{date|}}}{{{year|}}}{{{month|}}} || }} }} }}{{#if: {{{author|}}}{{{last|}}} ||{{#if: {{{date|}}} | ({{{date}}}) | {{#if: {{{year|}}} | {{#if: {{{month|}}} | ({{{month}}} {{{year}}}) | ({{{year}}}) }} }} }} }}.{{#if: {{{archivedate|}}} | Archived from [{{{url}}} the original] on {{#time:F j, Y|{{{archivedate}}}}}{{#if: {{{archiveyear|}}} | , {{{archiveyear}}} }}. }}{{#if: {{{accessdate|}}} | Retrieved on {{#time:F j, Y|{{{accessdate}}}}}{{#if: {{{accessyear|}}} | , {{{accessyear}}} }}. }}{{#if: {{{accessmonthday|}}} | Retrieved on {{{accessmonthday}}}, {{{accessyear}}}. }}{{#if: {{{accessdaymonth|}}} | Retrieved on {{{accessdaymonth}}} {{{accessyear}}}. }}{{#if: {{{quote|}}} |  “{{{quote}}}” }}{{documentation}}

revision.comment: Created page with "__NOTOC__ This template is used to [[Wikipedia:WP:CITE|cite sources]] in Wikipedia. It is specifically for web sites which are not news sources. This template replaces deprec..."
revision.text:
__NOTOC__ This template is used to [[Wikipedia:WP:CITE|cite sources]] in Wikipedia. It is specifically for web sites which are not news sources. This template replaces deprecated [[Wikipedia:Template:Teb reference|template:web reference]]. It provides lower case parameters only. A general discussion of the use of templates for adding citation of open-source web content to Wikipedia articles is available at [[Wikipedia:Citation templates|citation templates]]. This page uses [[w:Wikia:Licensing|Creative Commons Licensed]] content from [[w:c:Wookieepedia:Template:Cite web|Wookieepedia]] == Usage == ;Common form for cases where little is known about authorship of the page (with current date) {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessdate={{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}} |format= |work= }} ;Using last, first (with current date) {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessdate={{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}} |last= |first= |authorlink= |coauthors= |date= |year= |month= |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} ;Using author (with current date) {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessdate={{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}} |author= |authorlink= |coauthors= |date= |year= |month= |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} ;Using non-linked retrieved date, last, first {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessmonthday= |accessyear= |last= |first= |authorlink= |coauthors= |date= |year= |month= |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} ;Using non-linked retrieved date, author {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessmonthday= |accessyear= |author= |authorlink= |coauthors= |date= |year= |month= |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} ;All parameters, horizontal format (delete the ones you don't need) {{Cite web |url= |title= |accessdate= |accessmonthday= |accessdaymonth = |accessyear= |author= |last= |first= |authorlink= |coauthors= |date= |year= |month= |format= |work= |publisher= |pages= |language= |archiveurl= |archivedate= |quote= }} ;All parameters, vertical format 
{{Cite web
| url = 
| title = 
| accessdate = 
| accessdaymonth = 
| accessmonthday = 
| accessyear = 
| author = 
| last = 
| first = 
| authorlink = 
| coauthors = 
| date = 
| year = 
| month = 
| format = 
| work = 
| publisher = 
| pages = 
| language = 
| archiveurl = 
| archivedate = 
| quote = 
}}
=== Required parameters === * '''url''': URL of online item. * '''title''': Title of online item. ''For producing a [[Wikipedia:WP:CONTEXT#Dates|wikilinked date]] of retrieval:'' :* '''accessdate''': Full date when item was accessed, in [[Wikipedia:ISO 8601|ISO 8601]] YYYY-MM-DD format, for example "accessdate = {{CURRENTYEAR}}-{{CURRENTMONTH}}-{{CURRENTDAY2}}". ''Must not be wikilinked'' ''For producing a non-wikilinked date of retrieval:'' :* '''accessmonthday''' and '''accessyear''': Month and day when item was accessed, for example "accessmonthday = May 10", and year when item was accessed, for example "accessyear = 2005". Produces: ''Retrieved on May 10, 2006.'' :* '''accessdaymonth''' and '''accessyear''': Month and day when item was accessed, for example "accessmonthday = 10 May", and year when item was accessed, for example "accessyear = 2005". Produces: ''Retrieved on 10 May 2006.'' === Optional parameters === * '''author''': Author ** '''last''' works with '''first''' to produce last, first ** '''authorlink''' works either with '''author''' or with '''last''' & '''first''' to link to the appropriate wikipedia article. Does not work with URLs. ** '''coauthors''': allows additional authors * '''date''': Full date of publication, preferably in [[Wikipedia:ISO 8601|ISO 8601]] YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. ''2006-02-17''. May be wikilinked. ** OR: '''year''': Year of publication, and '''month''': Name of the month of publication. If you also have the day, use ''date'' instead. Must not be wikilinked. * '''format''': Format, e.g. PDF. HTML implied if not specified. * '''work''': If this item is part of a larger work, name of that work. * '''publisher''': Publisher, if any. * '''pages''': ''pp. 5–7'': first page and optional last page. This is for listing the pages relevant to the citation, not the total number of pages in the book. This is especially useful for PDF format, where the page can be linked to with the #page=''number'' anchor tagged on the end of the URL: *: pages = [http://www.example.org/file.pdf#page=123 p. 123] * '''language''': language of publication (don't specify "English" as this is the default). * '''archiveurl''': URL of the archive location of the item (requires '''archivedate''') * '''archivedate''': Date when the item was archived (requires '''archiveurl'''), in [[Wikipedia:ISO 8601|ISO 8601]] YYYY-MM-DD format, e.g. ''2006-02-17''. Must not be wikilinked; it will be linked automatically. * '''quote''': Relevant quote from online item. == Examples == ;Some standard use cases * {{Cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06 }} * {{Cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06 }} * {{Cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06}} * {{Cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | author=Doe, John | title=My Favorite Things Part II | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06}} * {{Cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06}} * {{Cite web | url=http://www.nfl.com/fans/ | title=Digest of Rules | publisher= National Football League | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | url=http://www.nfl.com/fans/ | title=Digest of Rules | publisher= National Football League | accessdate=2005-07-06 }} ;Non-linking date of retrieval (using accessmonthday and accessyear) * {{Cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessmonthday=July 6 | accessyear=2005 }}
→ {{cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessmonthday=July 6 | accessyear=2005 }} ;Using format * {{Cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | publisher = International Narcotics Control Board | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | publisher = International Narcotics Control Board | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06}} ;language * {{Cite web | author=Joliet, François | title=Honnit soit qui mal y pense | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 | language=French }}
→ {{cite web | author=Joliet, François | title=Honnit soit qui mal y pense | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org | accessdate=2005-07-06 | language=French}} ;coauthors * {{Cite web | first=John | last=Doe | coauthors=Peter Smith, Jim Smythe | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2006-05-16 }}
→ {{cite web | first=John | last=Doe | coauthors=Peter Smith, Jim Smythe | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2006-05-16 }} ;No author * {{Cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2006-05-16 }}
→ {{cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | publisher=Open Publishing | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2006-05-16 }} ;No author, no publisher * {{Cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | work=Encyclopedia of Things | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }} * {{Cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }}
→ {{cite web | title=My Favorite Things Part II | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.example.org/ | accessdate=2005-07-06 }} * {{Cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06 | language=Greek }}
→ {{cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06 | language=Greek }} ; Using archiveurl and archivedate to refer to items that went away but are available from an archive site * {{Cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06 | archiveurl=http://www.archive.org/2005-09-11/www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | archivedate=2005-09-11 }}
→ {{cite web | title=List of psychotropic substances under international control | date=2005-04-30 | url=http://www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | format = PDF | accessdate=2005-07-06 | archiveurl=http://www.archive.org/2005-09-11/www.incb.org/pdf/e/list/green.pdf | archivedate=2005-09-11 }} * {{Cite web |url=http://joanjettbadrep.com/cgi-bin/fullStory.cgi?archive=currnews&story=20060405-01shore.htm |title=Interview with Maggie Downs |date=2006-03-31 |publisher=The Desert Sun |archiveurl=http://72.14.207.104/search?q=cache:JAxf4v-pQmgJ:joanjettbadrep.com/cgi-bin/fullStory.cgi%3Farchive%3Dcurrnews%26story%3D20060405-01shore.htm |archivedate=2006-04-26 }}
→ {{cite web |url=http://joanjettbadrep.com/cgi-bin/fullStory.cgi?archive=currnews&story=20060405-01shore.htm |title=Interview with Maggie Downs |date=2006-03-31 |publisher=The Desert Sun |archiveurl=http://72.14.207.104/search?q=cache:JAxf4v-pQmgJ:joanjettbadrep.com/cgi-bin/fullStory.cgi%3Farchive%3Dcurrnews%26story%3D20060405-01shore.htm |archivedate=2006-04-26}} ; Using quote * {{Cite web | title = My Favorite Things Part II | work = Encyclopedia of Things | url = http://www.example.org/ | accessdate = 2005-07-06 | quote = Lorem ipsum dolor. }}
→ {{cite web | title = My Favorite Things Part II | work = Encyclopedia of Things | url = http://www.example.org/ | accessdate = 2005-07-06 | quote = Lorem ipsum dolor. }} ;No parameters (error) * {{Cite web}}
→ {{cite web}} [[Category:General wiki templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

revision.comment: JiaxingBot moved page [[Jiaxing Wiki:Wiki rules]] to [[Jiaxing Wiki:Wiki Rules]]: title standarization
revision.text: Below is a suggested set of rules to follow when editing this wiki. Administrators of this wiki should read these rules and adapt them as necessary. # Do not copy contents without authorization: All contents, '''especially biography''' published on this site are protected by relevant laws. Do not copy, disseminate or use for other purposes without authorization. Please note that '''information from biography is for use within the site only'''. We reserve the right to take legal responsibility for any violation of this regulation. # '''Keep it civil''': Do not make personal attacks on other people. If you need to criticize another user’s argument, do so without attacking them as a person. Do not use bigoted language, including slurs which degrade another person or group of people based on gender, race, sexual orientation, nationality, religion, etc. # '''Be a productive member of the wiki''': Contribute to the wiki in line with the established processes and conventions. Need help? Ask an [[Special:ListUsers/sysop|administrator]]! Disrupting the wiki with “edit warring” over differing opinions of a topic with another user or group of users is not productive. # '''Do not engage in excessive self-promotion''': The wiki is a collaborative community resource for the topic at hand. It is NOT a free place to advertise your related website, YouTube channel, blog, social media account, etc. Have a question about whether your link would be welcome? Ask an administrator! # '''Do not harass other users''': If somebody asks you to stop posting certain content on their wall, respect their wishes. It is their wall. # '''Do follow community guidelines for formatting''': When a community has established formatting, it’s important to adhere to that, especially when spoiler content is involved. [[Category:{{SITENAME}}]] [[zh:Jiaxing Wiki:维基规则]]

'''Welcome to {{SITENAME}}!'''
Here is the Wiki website of [[Jiaxing]] Home. Here you can enjoy the latest news about [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]], and everything about [[Jiaxing]] is here. Every participating user can contribute to this community, share and contribute. To begin with, please click on the "[[Jiaxing Channel|'''''ABOUT US''''']]" link in the navigation menu to access more information. We're a collaborative community website about {{topic}} that anyone, including you, can build and expand. Wikis like this one depend on readers getting involved and adding content. Welcome to [[Jiaxing Channel|Jiaxing]] Home, a wiki-based online database that contains detailed information related to [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]], [[Wang Ximing]], [[Wang Ziyu]], [[Wang Zhaochu]], etc., the dynamic duo behind the [[Jiaxing Channel|Jiaxing YouTube channel]]! This community is dedicated to bringing you the latest news, updates, and insights on the content created by [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]]. [[Jiaxing]] Home is a place for [[Jiaxing]] fans to come together, share their experiences, and engage with others who share their passion. We invite you to join our community and become a part of the conversation. Share your thoughts on your favorite videos, ask questions, and connect with other [[Jiaxing]] enthusiasts from around the world. So come on in and explore the world of [[Jiaxing]]! Click on the links to access our latest videos and see what [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] are up to next. We can't wait to see you there! ==Navigation== [[Jiaxing Radio Station|Learn more about Jiaxing Radio Station]]、[[w:c:jiaxing:zh:Main Page|佳兴广播站官方中文Wiki]] Representatives of Jiaxing Radio Station: [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]], [[Wang Ximing]], [[Lei Yangjuan]], [[Wang Ziyu]], [[Wang Zhaochu]] YouTube Channel: [https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos Jiaxing Radio Station] Odysee Channel: [https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f Jiaxing Radio Station] ''Need help building out this community?'' *[[Project:Wiki Rules|'''Rules of this wiki''']] *[[w:c:community:Help:Getting Started|Getting Started]] *[[w:c:community:Help:Contributing|How to Contribute]] *[[w:c:community:Help:Community Management|Managing your new community]] *[[w:c:community:Help:Contents|Guides]] *[[w:c:community:Help:Index|All Help articles]] You can also be part of the larger Fandom family of communities. Visit [[w:c:community|Fandom's Community Central]]! [[Category:{{SITENAME}}]] [[zh:Main Page]] {{Navbox_Total|state5=expanded}}

Welcome to this fully open and freely editable wiki, $1 is a wiki community about Jiaxing Album's YouTube channel, dedicated to collecting all information related to Wang Jiaming, Guo Jingxing, Wang Ximing, Wang Ziyu, Wang Zhaochu, etc. Anyone can contribute for $1.

revision.text:
{{PersonalInfoProtection}}{{Celebrity|title=Guo Jingxing|image=GuoJingxing.jpg|english_name=Guo Jingxing|gender=male|nationality={{China}}|minzu=Han|college=Huazhong University of Science and Technology|representative_work=[[Once You]], [[Nineteen Years Old]]|language=Chinese(Mandarin, Qidong Dialect) Japanese, English|birthplace=Hengyang City, Hunan Province|birthday={{Birthdate|1999-09-05}}|hometown=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province, China|height=5.58 feet|weight=165.3 pounds|constellation=Virgo|facebook=784830122lzh|instagram=lzh_1999|twitter=lzh7848}} '''Guo Jingxing''', born in September 5, 1999, is a native of '''''Hengyang, Hunan''''', One of the founders of [[Jiaxing Channel|Jiaxing Radio Station]], and also the uploader and operator of [[Jiaxing Channel|Jiaxing Radio Station]] YouTube channel. In March 2013, he was admitted to '''[[Hengyang No. 8 Middle School]]''' through the self-enrollment examination, and was admitted to [[Wikipedia:Huazhong University of Science and Technology|Huazhong University of Science and Technology]] through the college entrance examination in 2016. Representative works include "[[Little Apple]]" (2014), "[[The Former You]]", "[[Nineteen Years Old]]", "[[Ordinary Day]]" and so on. ==Life experience== In September 2004, enrolled in Jinwa Primary School in Qidong County. In September 2006, enrolled in Shangshu Primary School in Fengshiyan Town, Qidong County. In September 2010, enrolled in Hengyang Chengzhang Middle School, Qidong Campus, Class 14. In September 2013, enrolled in [[Hengyang No. 8 Middle School]], Class 423. In September 2016, enrolled in Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
==Representation== For details, see [[Jiaxing Radio Station]]. ==References== [[Category:Guo Jingxing]] [[Category:Qidong]] [[Category:People]] [[zh:郭竞兴]] [[Category:Biography]] [[Category:NoCopy]] {{Navbox_Total}}

{{Celebrity | title=Wang Zhaochu | image=WangZhaochu.jpg | caption=Wang Zhaochu in Chuanshan Primary School, Qidong | chinese_name=王钊楚 | english_name=Wang Zhaochu | nickname=Chuchu, Xiao Tangge | gender=male | nationality={{China}} | language=Chinese (Mandarin, Qidong dialect) | minzu=Han | birthday={{Birthdate|2015-10-28}} | hometown=Hengyang City, Hunan Province | works=''[[If you love me, hug me]]'' ''[[Tomorrow will be better]]'' ''[[Wang Zhaochu Qidong One Day Tour]]''|youtube=UCa-w0sPxyTBLTHhks2_toag |birthplace=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|profession=student|constellation=Scorpio|representative_work=''[[Hero Song]]''(2017)}}
'''Wang Zhaochu'''(Chinese name:'''王钊楚'''), born on October 28, 2015 in '''[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]]''', is the son of '''[[Wang Ximing]]''' and '''[[Lei Yangjuan]]'''. In March 2019, he started studying at Taihetang Little Elves Kindergarten and transferred to [[Qidong County]] Chuyuan Kindergarten (Lianhuayuan) to study in the kindergarten senior class in September 2020. He graduated from Qidong County Chuyuan Kindergarten on July 6, 2021 and started studying at Chuanshan Experimental Primary School in Qidong County in September 2021. == Life Experience == On October 28, 2015, he was born in [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]]. From March 2019, he studied in Taihetang Little Elves Kindergarten. In September 2020, he was transferred to Chuyuan Kindergarten (Lianhuayuan) in Qidong County to study in the first class of kindergarten. On July 6, 2021, he graduated from Chuyuan Kindergarten in [[Qidong County]]. From September 2021, Wang Zhaochu began to study at Class 104 in Chuanshan Experimental Primary School, Qidong County. ==Classic Video== Record Wang Zhaochu's video on [[Jiaxing Radio Station]] official YouTube channel ([https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos '''entry''']) and [[Wang Ximing]] YouTube channel ([https://www.youtube.com/@wangximing1985 '''entry''']) are uploaded. [[Wang Ximing]]'s YouTube channel mainly uploads daily videos and game records of Wang Zhaochu. [[zh:王子瑜]]{{Celebrity|title=Wang Ziyu (Wang Jiaming's younger brother)|image=[[File:WangZiyu.jpg]]|chinese_name= 王子瑜|english_name=Wang Ziyu|gender=male|nationality={{cn}}|language=Chinese (Mandarin, Qidong dialect), English|minzu=Han|birthplace=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|birthday ={{Birthdate|2009-08-25}}|hometown=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|profession=student|height=growing|constellation=Virgo|representative_work=[[Steve's Space Adventure]] [[Black Coffin Carrier: Eating Bricks]]|nickname=|youtube=UCH0V4wPNGeKPCx9zzKr_VlA}} '''Wang Ziyu''' (Chinese name: '''王子瑜'''), born on August 25, 2009 in [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], is The younger brother of '''[[Wang Jiaming]]''', one of the founders of [[Jiaxing Radio Station]]. Representative works include "[[Awakening|Realization]]" (movie), "[[Desert Camel]]", "[[Light Chaser]]", "[[Big Fish]]", "[[Undersea]]" and so on. Wang Ziyu studied at Chuanshan Primary School in Qidong County from 2015 to 2021, and in Class 217 of Qidong Chengzhang from September 2021. == Some experiences == In September 2015, Wang Ziyu enrolled in Chuanshan Primary School in Qidong County. Around August 2017, Wang Ziyu won the first prize in the Hengyang Chess Competition. On August 7, 2019, Wang Ziyu went to Hengyang to get glasses with a prescription of 150 degrees. In January 2020, Wang Ziyu won the Outstanding Cadre Award for the winter vacation "English Sprint 100 Points" course. In January 2020, Wang Ziyu moved to a new house in Sanwang Garden in Qidong County. In April 2020, Wang Ziyu opened a YouTube channel called [[Wang Ziyu Funny Show]]. On May 2, 2021, Wang Ziyu recorded the latest cover single "[[Undersea]]", which was [[Wikipedia:Netease Cloud Music|Netease Cloud Music]] ranked first on the hot list. In June 2021, Wang Ziyu graduated from Chuanshan Primary School in Qidong County. In September 2021, he started studying at Chengzhang School in Qidong County.
==Representation== As of May 2021, Wang Ziyu has covered many songs and recorded many game videos. The following table includes some representative works. {| class="article-table sortable" |+ Collection of Wang Ziyu's works ! Title !! Year !! Genre !! {{Celebrity|image=LeiYangjuan.jpg|chinese_name=雷阳娟|english_name=Lei Yangjuan|gender=female|nationality={{China}}|language=Chinese|minzu=Han|birthplace=Qidong County, Hengyang City, Hunan Province |birthday={{Birthdate|1989-08-04}}|hometown=Hengyang City, Hunan Province|profession=administrator|height=160cm|caption=Lei Yangjuan is working. |representative_work=《[[Bird Paradise]]》|constellation=Leo}}
'''Lei Yangjuan''' (Chinese name: '''雷阳娟'''), born on {{Birthdate|1989-08-04}}, in '''[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]],''' China. On February 23, 2015, she married [[Wang Ximing]] and is the mother of '''[[Wang Zhaochu]]'''. Currently, she resides in [[wikipedia:Shenzhen|Shenzhen]], [[wikipedia:Guangdong|Guangdong Province]] with her husband and works at '''Delong Electrical Appliances Co., Ltd.''' in Shenzhen. ==Specific experience== Around 2010, Lei began working at Rui Bang Apparel Co., Ltd. in Dongguan, Guangdong, as a salesperson. Around 2013, she started working at Mei Ya Apparel Co., Ltd. in Shenzhen, where she worked in the human resources department as a management staff. From the first half of 2015 to May 2016, she took a leave of absence from work due to pregnancy and stayed at home to give birth to and care for her child. On November 2, 2019, a safety production management qualification certificate was obtained through the safety production knowledge and management ability assessment of Shenzhen Emergency Management Bureau. The certificate is valid for three years and was issued based on passing the assessment. The industry category is classified as non-high-risk production and operation. Around December 2019, she participated in the self-study examination of South China Normal University. In November 2021, she resigned from Mei Ya Apparel Co., Ltd. in Shenzhen and began working at Delong Electric Co., Ltd. in Shenzhen in the same month. See [[Wang Ximing]] for details. ==Representation== ===Cover of "[[:File:【翻唱MV】雷阳娟 - 鸟语林 Bird Paradise（cover 双笙）重制版|Bird Paradise]]"=== [[File:【翻唱MV】雷阳娟 - 鸟语林 Bird Paradise（cover 双笙）重制版]] ===Wishes to Wang Zhaochu in his 7th Birthday=== [[File:雷阳娟祝王钊楚7岁生日快乐20221028]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Lei Yangjuan]] [[Category:Qidong]] [[Category:Wang Zhaochu]] [[Category:People]] [[zh:雷阳娟]] [[Category:Biography]] [[Category:NoCopy]] {{Navbox_Total}} {{PersonalInfoProtection}}

{{Celebrity|image=WangXiming.jpg|chinese_name=王喜明|english_name=Wang Ximing|gender=male|nationality={{China}}|language=Chinese (Mandarin, Qidong dialect)|minzu=Han|birthplace= Taihetang Town, [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|birthday={{Birthdate|1986-01-10}}|hometown=Hengyang City, Hunan Province|profession=Packaging Engineer|college=Hunan University of Technology|height= 168cm|weight=69kg|achievements=Shenzhen famous packaging engineer|representative_work=''[[Alien Revelation]]'' ''[[That night, at two o'clock in the morning in Shenzhen]]''|caption=The picture shows Wang Ximing grilling skewers. |constellation=Capricorn|email=690978709@qq.com|qq=690978709|facebook=wxm690978709|youtube=UCHgIk7P9quDaQQmEqj819RA|instagram=wangximing1985|tiktok=wangximing1985}}
'''''Wang Ximing''''' (Chinese name: '''王喜明'''), was born on January 10, 1986 in Taihetang Town, [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], native of '''Hengyang, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]]'''. He graduated from the Industrial Design Department of '''Hunan University of Technology''' in 2009, and married with [[Lei Yangjuan]] on February 23, 2015. He is the father of [[Wang Zhaochu]] after Oct 28, 2015, and is currently living with Lei Yangjuan in ''' [[Wikipedia:Shenzhen|Shenzhen]], [[Wikipedia:Guangdong|Guangdong Province]]''', and working as a package design engineer at '''Shenzhen Comen Medical Equipment Co., Ltd.'''. Wang Ximing's hobbies include handicrafts, movies, and the electronic game DOTA2. ==Life experience== In September 1992, he enrolled in Taihetang Town Central Primary School, [[Qidong County]]. In September 1998, he enrolled in Chenglianxu Middle School in [[Qidong County]]. In September 2001, enrolled at Yuxian Middle School in [[Qidong County]]. In September 2004, enrolled at Dingxing Middle School in [[Qidong County]]. In September 2005, enrolled in the Industrial Design program at Hunan University of Technology. After graduating from university in 2009, worked as a market development/salesperson at Wahaha Sales Company in Yiyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], from September of that year for a period of 7 months. In April 2010, switched to Ocean Paper Printing (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd., and was promoted to Packaging Engineer in 2013. In April 2020, switched to Chaoyang Electronics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. as a Packaging Engineer. On August 23, 2022, resigned from Chaoyang Electronics (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. On August 31, 2022, started working at Shenzhen Comen Medical Equipment Co., Ltd. == Job Duties == === Hunan Wahaha Sales Yiyang Branch (2009.09-2010.03) === # Conducted market research and analyzed market demand. # Formulated detailed marketing plans and assisted in organizing exhibitions and sales promotion events. # Conducted on-site sales promotion and coordinated with terminal sales. # Employed other methods to increase the visibility and influence of new products and services of Wahaha in the market. === Ocean Paper Printing (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd. (2010.04-2020.04) === # Conducted physical testing of raw paper, corrugated paperboard, and finished products (including quantitative, thickness, moisture, ring pressure, edge pressure, puncture resistance, stacking, and dropping). # Designed and developed packaging and display plans that meet market demand and transportation safety requirements. # Provided professional packaging design recommendations based on cost. # Developed suitable packaging plans and created drawings according to product packaging requirements (including die-cutting, printing, and rendering). # Conducted packaging samples and assisted in the production of samples using the paper sample cutting machine. Analyzed packaging materials and technologies to improve production processes and techniques (including selection of molding methods, die-cutting and creasing technology, and corrugated box bonding technology). # Coordinated with relevant departments to supervise product quality (including specifications, dimensions, corrugation, adhesion, creasing, cutting, jointing, and printing quality). # Followed up with customer feedback in a timely manner to ensure that the packaging design and assembly meet customer requirements and standards. ==Character Events== Due to failing the college entrance exam in June 2004, repeated a year of high school at Dingxing Middle School in Qidong County starting in September of that year. In May 2014, participated in the national senior packaging engineer system learning and obtained the senior packaging engineer qualification certificate. In 2017, purchased a Huawei M3 tablet. On April 3, 2018, passed the third subject of the driver's license exam. In April 2019, Wang Ximing opened a [https://youtube.com/@wangximing1985 YouTube channel] and uploaded daily videos of Wang Zhaochu. In November 2019, participated in a 3-day training program on speech and virtue. On May 1, 2021, received a golden iPad. ==Marriage== In January 2013, Wang Ximing and [[Lei Yangjuan]] got engaged. On February 23, 2015 (the fifth day of the Chinese Lunar New Year), Wang Ximing and [[Lei Yangjuan]] held their [[Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan's Wedding|wedding ceremony]] at Yizhou Hotel in [[Qidong County]]. On October 28 of the same year, their son [[Wang Zhaochu]] was born. == Anecdotes == During his high school years, Wang Ximing was completely out of touch with reality and didn't consider his future. He would often spend his free time playing video games at nearby internet cafes, and sometimes even skipped class to do so. On the night before the national college entrance exam in June 2004, Wang Ximing was still immersed in an all-night gaming session at the internet cafe. After failing the exam, he repeated a year of high school at Dingxing High School and was able to score over 500 points on the second attempt, earning him admission to Hunan University of Technology's industrial design program. Wang Ximing's four years in college were both empty and happy. He played games all day, and the two classes a week he had were a breeze. His university experience taught him laziness, and sometimes when he returned home during breaks, his family found that his clothes had grown moldy and had a bad odor, even though he had only washed them a month before. Wang Ximing only studied one software program in college, and in the end, the only thing he did with his university computer was play games before eventually selling it to someone else. After graduating in 2009, Wang Ximing worked as a salesperson for Wahaha in Changsha, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]]. Due to his unsuccessful work and lack of interest in sales, he left around 2011 and went to Shenzhen, where he found a stable job at a marine paper factory. Wang Ximing's love life has been full of ups and downs. In 2012, he reunited with his ex-girlfriend in Shenzhen, only to discover that she had been deceitful and unfaithful. His family advised him to break up with her, and while his ex-girlfriend was deeply upset at the time, Wang Ximing didn't feel much. In addition, the parents of Wang Ximing's ex-girlfriend felt that he was too introverted and not lively and despised her. Soon after his family's repeated persuasion, he eventually broke up with her and met [[Lei Yangjuan]] in 2013 through mutual friends and relatives. He quit smoking with the encouragement of Lei Yangjuan about a year after they met. After two years of dating in Shenzhen, they got married on February 23, 2015, at the Qidong Yizhou Hotel. ==Representation== ''[[Alien Revelation]]'' ''[[That Night, at Two O'Clock in the Morning in Shenzhen]]'' ==Related Videos== [[:File:精彩纪录 - 王喜明老照片（1985-2004）|Wang Ximing's Old Photos(1986~2004)]] [https://youtu.be/39BpOofS6X8 Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan Cycling] [https://youtu.be/0wR4AtFiyG0 Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan's wedding] [https://youtu.be/6-_wHEW-DzA Video of Wang Ximing's wedding reception] [[:File:【高清MV】王喜明和雷阳娟视频大集锦|Lei Yangjuan & Wang Ximing Video Collection]] [[:File:【完整版】2019年王喜明和王钊楚游祁东水漓坊水上乐园|Wang Ximing, Wang Zhaochu and Wang Ziyu swim in Shuilifang Waterpark in 2019]] [[Wang Zhaochu's Seventh Birthday Wishes|Wang Zhaochu 7th Birthday Wishes in 2022]] [[zh:王喜明]] [[Category:Biography]] [[Category:People]] [[Category:Lei Yangjuan]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:NoCopy]] __NOEDITSECTION__ {{Navbox_Total}} {{PersonalInfoProtection}}

{{Wikipedia}}{{Stub}} [[zh:祁东县]] '''Qidong County''' is a county under the jurisdiction of Hengyang City. Located in the south of [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], the People's Republic of China, in the Qishui Basin in the middle reaches of the Xiangjiang River, it is connected to Qiyang in the south, Shaodong and Hengyang in the north, Hengnan in the east, and Dong'an and Shaoyang in the west. It is also the county seat where [[Jiaxing Radio Station]] was founded and often filmed.
In 1952, Qidong County was established in the six northeastern districts of Qiyang, which was named Qidong because it was located in the east of Qiyang. The county has jurisdiction over 25 townships, streets, and offices, and 368 administrative villages (community neighborhood committees), with an area of 1872 square kilometers and a registered population of 1.058 million. It is the famous "Hometown of Yellow Flowers in China", "Hometown of Generals", "Hometown of Black Metal", and is currently the only "Hometown of Chinese Folk Art" in [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]]. The geographical coordinates are 111°32′16″～112°20′10″ east longitude, 26°28′1″～27°4′34″ north latitude. ==History==
On April 25, 1952, Qiyang County was dissected and all of the seventh, eighth, ninth, and tenth districts of the original Qiyang County and most of the fifth and sixth districts were set aside to establish Qidong County. Due to the large area in the county Part of it is located in the east of Qiyang County, hence the name Qidong. Hongqiao is located in the county seat. The area under its jurisdiction includes Minyou, Guiyang, Sizhi, Jingyan, Sijing, Zhenzhong, Jingqing, Jinlan, Zhichang 9 townships and the northern half of Baolu Township in Qiyang County in the 38th year of the Republic of China (1949). When the county was established, it belonged to the Lingling Prefectural Area, since October 1952 it has been under the Shonan Administrative Office, since July 1954 it has been under the Hengyang Region, and since June 1983 it has been under the Hengyang City.
==Relationship with Jiaxing Radio Station==
[[Jiaxing Radio Station]] was founded in Qidong County, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]] in 2014. [[Category:Qidong]]

{{Stub}}{{Movie|title1=Awakening (microfilm starring Wang Ziyu)|image1=[[File:【祁东文化】2019新年微电影《觉悟》 Realization]] |caption1=Screenshot of [[Wang Ziyu]]'s micro movie. | Director = [[Guo Jingxing]] | producer = [[Wang Jiaming]], Wang Yonghong | screenwriter = [[Wang Jiaming]] | Starring = [[Wang Ziyu]], Chen Junru (Junjun) | length = 5:54 | origin = {{China}} | language = Chinese ([[Qidong]] Dialect)|release date=February 15, 2019 ([https://youtu.be/MbuX6Bkm7oU YouTube])|publisher=[[Jiaxing Film Industry]]|box office=10 RMB|Mainland China=Realization|Taiwan=Awakening}}
'''''Realization''''' (also named "'''''Awakening'''''") is a microfilm produced by '''[[Jiaxing Film Industry]]''' for the 2019 Spring Festival. It was written by '''[[Wang Jiaming]]''', starring '''[[Wang Ziyu]]''' and featuring Chen Junru. The entire film was shot and completed by '''[[Guo Jingxing]]''' alone within two days, and post-production took one day. The actual filming of the movie was not completed, so an open ending was used. ==Movie script== ===Scene I=== '''Theme: Wang Ziyu played games crazily, resulting in a drop in grades'''
One day, Wang Ziyu was obsessed with playing mobile phones at home.
'''Dad (voiceover):'''Hurry up and do your homework, the homework assigned by the teacher today is not finished yet. Hurry up and do it! Jia Ming, hurry up and teach him.
Dad urged hard, but Wang Ziyu was unmoved.
'''Voiceover:'''Did you get the results of the midterm exam a few days ago?
Wang Ziyu was still unmoved,
Put a hand on Wang Ziyu's shoulder and push him away: Did you hear me?
Wang Ziyu still ignored her,
Dad then shook his head helplessly and walked away.
'''(Camera turns to dad's footsteps leaving)''' ===Scene II=== '''Theme: Wang Ziyu's self-introduction (Wang close-up) (black and white)'''
My name is Wang Ziyu, and my grades have not been very good. I am addicted to my mobile phone all day, and my eyesight is not very good. Probably for this reason.
It may be because you can find pleasure in the game that you don't have in reality, and you are also lacking in interest in learning. I have a best friend who is proficient in not only studying, but also playing piano, chess, calligraphy and painting in life. His name is Junjun. But I don't envy him very much. I think learning is not the whole of life, and enjoying the present is the most important thing.
until one day…… ===Scene III=== '''Theme: Junjun got into the high school he wanted, Wang went to a school he didn't like'''
Location: Jun Jun's home
'''Wang:'''Dong Dong Dong'''(knock on the door)'''Is Junjun at home? come out and play.
Junjun: Ziyu, I have to do my homework today and practice piano in the afternoon, so I can't play with you.
'''Wang:'''If you can't do it, you can't do it'''(spit on the ground)'''
'''(Junjun is doing a question at home)'''
There are three days left before the junior high school exam.
Wang Ziyu played crazily. Junjun worked hard at home to solve the problems.
Exam results came out,
Junjun cheered when he received the notice, but Wang Ziyu could only go to a not-so-good junior high school. ===Scene IV=== '''Theme: Wang Ziyu fell into a difficult environment, Jun Jun felt helpless '''
Location Junjun's home
'''Wang:'''Junjun, I'm here to find you.
'''Junjun:'''What do you want from me?
'''Junjun's mother:'''Wang, which junior high school did you get into?
'''Wang: It's embarrassing to say:'''It's not a particularly good junior high school
'''Junjun's mother said hypocritically:'''It doesn't matter, let's study hard in the future. Get into a good high school
Junjun was embarrassed by the side.
'''Come here too and quickly pull Wang away and say:'''Let's go out and play together. ===Scene V=== '''Theme: Wang Ziyu fell into inferiority complex under the shadow of handsome'''
'''Location: On the street'''
Junjun and Wang are walking on the road,
'''Wang:'''I envy you for being able to go to such a good junior high school.
'''Junjun:'''Then why didn't you work hard at the beginning? Playing with mobile phones all the time.
'''Wang:'''I don't know...
Wang's mother came over,
When Wang saw his mother and looked at Junjun again, he felt ashamed and wanted to find a crack in the ground to sneak in.
Suddenly mother saw Wang,
'''Mom:'''Wang, what are you playing?
Junjun, you are here too. Let's go and play together ===Scene VI=== '''Theme: Seeing Junjun's cultural accomplishment, Wang Ziyu is even more ashamed'''
Wang felt more and more inferior, and at the same time thought of his classmates in that school. I thought of Junjun.
I don't feel like I should be what I used to be.
Then... ==Movie Narration== '''(Wang Ziyu's narration)''' Wang Ziyu is obsessed with playing mobile phones at home. Wang Ziyu's daily life is just like what he saw. Picking up his mobile phone is either Douyin or Kuaishou, or some games he just saw. Dad urged hard, but Wang Ziyu was unmoved. Still unmoved, Wang Ziyu put a hand on Wang Ziyu's shoulder and pushed him away. Wang Ziyu still ignored her, and her father shook his head helplessly and walked away. Wang Ziyu is one of the best students in school. He usually studies very seriously and listens very seriously at school. However……
My name is Wang Ziyu, and my grades have not been very good. I am addicted to my mobile phone all day, and my eyesight is not very good. Probably for this reason.
It may be because you can find pleasure in the game that you don't have in reality, and you are also lacking in interest in learning. I have a best friend who is proficient in not only studying, but also playing piano, chess, calligraphy and painting in life. His name is Junjun. But I don't envy him very much. I think learning is not the whole of life, and enjoying the present is the most important thing. until one day……
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''In winter, the tree trunk without leaves swayed in the bitter cold wind. At this time, Wang Ziyu was sitting alone in the corner of the street, looking very unhappy. At this time, Wang Ziyu suddenly saw Junjun.
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''This is Junjun's home. Junjun has been studying very hard. At this time, Wang Ziyu knocked on the door of Wang Ziyu's house. There are three days left before the junior high school exam. Wang Ziyu was still playing crazily. However, Junjun worked hard at home to solve the problems. The exam results came out, and Junjun cheered when he received the notice, but Wang Ziyu could only go to a junior high school that was not particularly good.
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Jun Jun, this way!
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''Junjun saw him and ran over immediately.
Junjun: Wang Ziyu is so lucky to meet you
'''Wang Ziyu:'''What are you doing here?
Junjun: I was admitted to a good junior high school, and I am going to have a look
'''Wang Ziyu:'''I envy you that you were able to get into such a good junior high school
Junjun: Then why didn’t you work hard when playing with your mobile phone?
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Don't mention the mobile phone, let's go to the traffic island to play
'''Junjun:'''Okay
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)''' So Wang Ziyu and Junjun walked to the traffic island together.
'''Wang Ziyu:'''What should we do when we go to the traffic island?
'''Junjun:'''There are not many people today, let's go for a run together later.
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Okay
'''Junjun:'''Let's go for a few laps
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Let's go
'''(Running...)'''
'''Wang Ziyu:'''How did you get into such a good school?
'''Junjun:'''It's because you usually play with your mobile phone
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Then can I be admitted to such a good school without playing with my mobile phone?
'''Junjun:'''You still have to study hard, you have to listen to the teacher in class
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)''' Wang Ziyu and Junjun ran together on the traffic island. After running, they went to Wang Ziyu's mother's shop together.
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''This is Wang Ziyu's shop. At this time, Wang Ziyu's mother saw them.
'''(Wang Ziyu's mother)'''
Tzuyu, let's leave school
Junjun, you just came back together
'''Junjun:'''Yes
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''
You, got the notice today
Well... a lot of points
'''Wang Ziyu:'''Forty-five points in Chinese and seventy-five points in mathematics
'''(Wang Ziyu's mother)'''
Over 40 in Chinese, 75 in Mathematics
how do you read
Then you don't read it
then stop reading
Junjun, you scored a lot, Junjun
'''(Wang Ziyu's narration)'''
'''Junjun:'''100 points in mathematics and 89 points in Chinese
'''(Wang Ziyu's mother)'''
Yo, you study so well
Tzuyu, don’t read anymore
You see, Junjun scored more than 90 points, how are you studying?
Ha, tell me how you learned ==Movie Highlights== ===Highlight video=== [[File:王子瑜微电影幕后花絮（2019）]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: File:2017年大陆国庆档纪录片《王钊楚》正式预告 Wang Zhaochu Official Trailer

revision.text: 《王钊楚》是一部中国大陆纪录片，普通话解说，上映于2017年10月1日，记录了从1965年至2017年8月的这段历史，以及王钊楚的生前生后的一些事情，这部纪录片是佳兴自频道纪录最全，内容最写实，涉及历史最广的一部纪录片。 ©佳兴影视 Jiaxing Movies & Videos Presents

page.title: File:【王佳明解说】你见过这么变态的超级玛丽吗？让日本人告诉你

revision.text:
2012年3月2日，这是一个日本人的游戏。让我们来玩一玩吧，听说很很变态。 这部游戏全名叫しょぼんのアクション，具体介绍详见：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Syobon_Action

page.title: File:【王佳明解说】玩经典红白机游戏彩虹岛 RAINBOW ISLANDS

revision.text:
这一次玩一个名叫Rainbow Islands（彩虹岛）的游戏，彩虹岛是我们红白机游戏玩家的童年回忆和经典游戏著作，这款游戏简约时尚，是90年代的风靡小游戏，让我们一起来回顾一下它的玩法。 该游戏于1987年在日本上市，日文名叫レインボーアイランド，是一款红白机游戏。具体详见：https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rainbow_Islands:_The_Story_of_Bubble_Bobble_2

page.title: File:王喜明&雷阳娟婚礼电影插曲片段 - Love Story

revision.text:
2015年2月23日，王喜明和雷阳娟在祁东一洲大酒店举办了隆重的婚礼，这些片段都是收集了当天婚礼最精彩的片段合集。 视频原本为2017年国庆档大型纪录片《王钊楚》的其中一个片段。
王喜明和雷阳娟的婚礼视频系列合集： 婚纱照片合集： 婚礼接亲全程录像： 婚礼现场全程录像： （结婚1周年之际）视频大集锦：

2018年9月，即将满十九岁的我们依然年轻，让我们的故事依旧停留在青春的记忆中。 翻唱：郭竞兴 王佳明； 制作：郭竞兴； 导演：郭竞兴； 词曲：赵雷。
走过初识你的地点 揣着多天来的期盼 如果我不能再次把你遇见 我会日夜期盼 我不是伟岸的正经人 我承认吸引我的是你的脸 在这隐忍的夏天 冰淇淋里面 谁愿与孤单为伴 我的心情总是失落 我懂女孩子是矜持的 你的耳机里到底听的是什么 有没有我熟悉的歌 我想发寻你的传单 可是我没有你的照片 只好写初识游泳馆 大厅的里面 我们不见不散 康铭旋转门转不休 宽街没有另外路口 我在红绿灯下面等了你很久 你是否朝交道口走 我不是油嘴滑舌的人 你可知19岁的天真 布满皱纹的城市都在因为你 而变得越来越青春 我的心情总是失落 我懂女孩子是矜持的 你的耳机里到底听的是什么 有没有我熟悉的歌 我想 我想现在就见到你 我想发寻你的传单 可是我没有你的照片 只好写初识游泳馆 大厅的里面 我们不见不散 我想发寻你的传单 可是我没有你的照片 我猜在南锣的里面 中戏的门前 或许你会再次出现 我猜在南锣的里面 书店的门前 你也等待我的出现 我会在南锣的里面 江湖的门前 握着啤酒等你出现 我猜在19岁这一天 青春的一半 我与你会注定擦肩

page.title: File:【旅游】2019年广州之旅 - 第一集(白云山索道)

revision.text:
指导：王永宏 拍摄、后期：郭竞兴 对白：祁东话(中国方言) 附加字幕
王佳明一家人和郭竞兴于2019年2月7日从衡阳出发，一路上搭乘6个小时的卧铺，晚上10点到达广州，广州的天气有20多度，而衡阳的天气只有2℃，下了车的我们感到很不适应，之后到达了火车站旁边的宾馆住了一夜后，第二天(2月8日)开始了白云山索道之旅。 从白云山索道往下看，峰峦重叠、溪涧纵横、林木葱郁、鸟语花香，景观多样，四季如春；远眺则可俯览全市，遥望珠江，小蛮腰隐约可见。
旅游全程视频：https://youtu.be/tOqVds5vARI [[Category:2019Vlog]]

page.title: File:【旅游】2019年广州之旅 - 第二集(白云山顶+圣心大教堂)

revision.text:
指导：王永宏 拍摄、后期：郭竞兴 对白：祁东话(中国方言) 附加字幕
王佳明一家人和郭竞兴于2019年2月8日中午乘坐索道到达了广州白云山山顶，之后便坐观光车下山，坐地铁前往圣心大教堂。 从白云山山顶往下看，峰峦重叠、溪涧纵横、林木葱郁、鸟语花香，景观多样，四季如春；远眺则可俯览全市，遥望珠江，小蛮腰隐约可见。 圣心大教堂巍峨耸立，雕梁画栋，富丽堂皇，美轮美奂。
旅游全程视频：https://youtu.be/tOqVds5vARI [[Category:2019Vlog]]
