旅游全程视频：https://youtu.be/tOqVds5vARI [[Category:2019Vlog]]

page.title: File:【旅遊VLOG】2019年廣州自由行 - 廣州有哪些好玩的旅遊景點 - 白雲山 Travel in Guangzhou

revision.text:
廣州有哪些好玩的？怎麼逛最省時間？到達廣州火車站我們首先前往最近的景點，賞當地的名花，玩最驚險刺激的娛樂項目！
指導：王永宏 拍攝、後期：郭競興 對白：祁東話(中國方言) 附加字幕
王佳明一家人和郭競興一家人於2019年2月7日從衡陽出發，到達廣州，2月8日中午坐纜車到達白雲山山頂，之後坐觀光車下山，下午從聖心大教堂出發，到達廣州塔，第二天來到了廣州長隆。 從白雲山山頂往下看，峰巒重疊、溪澗縱橫、林木蔥鬱、鳥語花香，景觀多樣，四季如春；遠眺則可俯覽全市，遙望珠江，小蠻腰隱約可見。 聖心大教堂巍峨聳立，雕樑畫棟，富麗堂皇，美輪美奐。
視頻中出現的音樂： 0:06 廣州廣（粵語） 1:54 一起走過的日子（粵語） 4:08 瀟灑走一回（國語） 6:55 滄海一聲笑（粵語） 8:34 相思風雨中（粵語） 10:08 漫步人生路（粵語） 11:34 偏偏喜歡你（粵語） 13:24 光輝歲月（粵語） 15:16 倩女幽魂（粵語） 17:13 海闊天空（粵語） 18:12 海草歌（抖音/普通話） 21:46 浮誇（粵語） 24:09 CHINA-X（純音樂/廣州長隆主題曲） [[Category:2019Vlog]]

page.title: File:【雷阳娟】深圳市美雅服饰公司员工风采

revision.text:
雷阳娟和郭竞兴于2019年制作，播放在公司年会上的视频。
深圳美雅服饰有限公司，坐落在环境优美的现代化经济中心城市深圳的宝安工业基地公明上村元山工业区，宝安公明上村元山工业区；南接深圳经济特区，北连东莞市，东濒大鹏湾，临望香港新界、元朗，地理位置优越，交通运输便捷，投资项目，发展业务得天独厚。

revision.text: 王子瑜于2009年8月25日出生于湖南祁东，2019年1月的时候是一个小学四年级的学生，由于网络时代的来临，王子瑜开始沉迷于手机，导致视力下降，他的从小玩伴俊俊此时在育贤读小学五年级，成绩优秀。

page.title: File:【高清】中国湖南省祁东1984~2017年卫星变化图

revision.text:
中国于1978年改革开放，祁东也赶上了进程，祁东原来是偏远农村，发展了30年，由原来老城区发展成县城，如今发展成一个大城市。
订阅频道，我们会持续分享更多的关于祁东的特色视频给您，Subscribe Us：https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9XJQh5K_KtSssnBaW9iHyA?sub_confirmation=1

revision.text:
原唱：赵雷 词曲：赵雷 翻唱：雷阳娟&郭竞兴&王佳明
#西虹市首富#趙雷#彩虹下面
黄昏淹没倒影中的桅杆 夕阳目送我离开岸 经过了乌云孩子般的天 看到了月亮的笑脸 那是船才能开向的天边 阳光把冬天晒的很暖 经过了冰川 再次扬起帆 歌声就在彩虹的下面 继续走吧 再快一点 热情的土著人已经把篝火点燃 继续走吧 挥动衬衫 那些神奇的歌声在把我召唤 这里有与世无争的笑颜 娇艳的花开满山间 雨后山谷里传来一首歌 歌词的意思是这样的 最美不过头顶彩虹的村庄 彩虹下的歌声笑语中嘹亮 拉起低下头抿嘴笑的姑娘 编一支花环为她戴在头上 喝掉杯中的酒暖一暖心房 趁着年轻的火焰烧的正旺 晚霞里的风已吹干了衣裳 彩虹下的人不会迷失方向 歌声悠悠 鼓声激荡 跳舞的姑娘牙齿白的像月光 烧肉飘香 晚风清爽 不知不觉人们就唱到了天亮 经过了冰川 再次扬起帆 歌声就在彩虹的下面

page.title: File:龙盼 彭竞燃 祁东婚礼盛典20190123

revision.text: 2019年1月23日，姐姐彭竞燃和正在军队服役的龙盼结婚。他们的爱情故事在2018年的8月7号正式拉开了唯美的序幕。在这一天，男孩为了向女孩表达自己内心的那一份爱恋之情，在自己的家中摆满了充满爱心的蜡烛，向女孩求婚。也正是因为这样一个小小的举动，女孩选择了跟这个男孩在一起。于是两个人在2018年的8月8日相约，一起去到了民政局领取了结婚证。八月九号，两个人开始了彼此的婚纱照的拍摄。一路走来，经过了两年多的时间，男孩一直在部队当兵，一年也就一个月回家探亲的机会，很少有时间照顾女孩，于是男孩便承担起家中所有的家务：洗衣服、做饭。是一个实打实的好男人。 故事就是，陪着一个平凡的人，守着一个平凡的心。最真挚、最初的情感，恰恰就蕴含在这细水长流的日子里。足备好的爱情就是初恋时的心动，初识时的甜蜜；相居时的欣赏，熟时候的接纳；平淡里的相守，困境中的扶持；流连里的不弃，还有身边的你。 [[Category:2019Vlog]]

page.title: File:龙盼 彭竞燃3D电子相册（固定制作浪漫之约）- 天长地久婚纱

revision.text: 2018年的8月9日，龙盼和彭竞燃开启了婚纱照的拍摄。 两个人在2018年的8月8日相约，一起去到了民政局领取了结婚证。一路走来，经过了两年多的时间，男孩一直在部队当兵，一年也就一个月回家探亲的机会，很少有时间照顾女孩，于是男孩便承担起家中所有的家务：洗衣服、做饭。是一个实打实的好男人。 故事就是，陪着一个平凡的人，守着一个平凡的心。最真挚、最初的情感，恰恰就蕴含在这细水长流的日子里。足备好的爱情就是初恋时的心动，初识时的甜蜜；相居时的欣赏，熟时候的接纳；平淡里的相守，困境中的扶持；流连里的不弃，还有身边的你。

page.title: File:王子瑜骑共享单车游遍祁东20190613

revision.text: 2019年6月13日，王子瑜和郭竞兴在祁东交通岛找到了两台哈啰单车，然后用手机哈啰APP解了锁，在祁东街上到处开，开了55分钟。 下午6点，我陪王子瑜做完了作业，然后根据中午我跟王子瑜的约定，王子瑜要跟我一起骑单车，王子瑜说：“首次开可以开两个小时，不要钱。”于是我打开手机APP，首先是找到两辆共享单车，我和王子瑜一起把车锁打开了，然后车锁啪的一下就开了，王子瑜被声音吓了一跳，之后又打开了一辆。然后我们从交通岛的店出发， 然后经过交通岛，开进菜市场，然后开往莲花路，然后经过王子瑜小学门口，到达楚杰路，丰产街；一直开到伯伯的盛世洪城家楼下，之后开到了322国道上，然后经过被拆掉的金融广场，然后到达加油站，上了坡，之后差点开到政府广场，后来沿着莲花西路开回了家。 [[Category:2019Vlog]]

page.title: File:【深圳】雷阳娟辞职前对公司提出的意见

revision.text: 老板，以前你说我是你的助理，希望我在员工中听到什么消息都及时告诉你，让我做你一只眼睛，但是，我没有按你的要求向你反馈任何信息，因为，我知道现在的你，不喜欢听负面消息，假如我与你一讲，你便会找一些管理人员开罪、大骂并罚款，也甚至连累我自己，所以，我也可能为了自保不想多找事。就在前两天我写了离职单交给羊大哥，却被他扔了，他说让我考虑考虑，然后我想了很多，我想，要不然我先把公司所有的问题向你反应了吧，就让我就做一次你的眼睛，把我看到听到的所有的问题都与你讲出来。 第一点：你一直在说，只要是我美雅 的员工，我都会把他们当兄弟姐妹来对待，可是你真的做到了吗？老员工是这样评价的，以前老板娘在的时候，福利很好，对车间员工也好，虽然第一天大骂了他们，但第二天就请员工吃饭，这样员工还是积极的做事。但现在，我们不仅什么福利 没有，而且你每天都会骂人，而且有些事情你没弄清楚原因也在开骂。你就把我们工人真的当做是个劳动人，员工请个假都心惊肉跳的生怕又被你骂，但员工也是人，家里肯定也有事，就换位思考，老板你自己一年回老家办事几次呢。说到这你肯定会想说，我公司这么难开，这个厂人数越来越少，我就不难做吗？正因为我怕你这样讲，所以我才以这种形式给你提出意见。 第二点：你接管这个美雅已三年多了，刚开始第一、二年你都还会听听管理层的意见，但现在，不知道是因为你懂的多了，还是觉得自己越来越高高在上，所有人的意见都不听，总是给一种全公司你是老大所有人不管对的错的都得听你的，不听就给我走人的感觉。老板，开早会的时候你自己放眼看一下参会的成员，不是你的朋友就是你的老乡，要么就像王兴龙、王道林、何全友这样为公司付了整个青春的人，他们为什么一直在这里，就是因为感激你，想帮助你帮助这个工厂，可是，你一步步的做法，都让人觉得心寒，你真的信任他们吗，你以为他们真的是因为惧怕离开 厂而听你的话吗，绝不是。可能因为你的命真的很好，碰到的人都是好人，虽然最近都处处在抱怨，但还是一直在努力 工作想帮助 这个工厂。 第三点：我们公司目前的现状，从去年268人变成今年一直都不能突破230人，其原因在哪，第一有接单方面的，单量少，总是换款员工做的产量就减少然后工资低。第二点就是生活费上面的，没对比就没伤害 ，员工现在都知道对面厂饭卡充了四百多，而我们员工生活费的确很低，离职人都给了意见 。我们的饭卡车间的240，后道裁床的210，都减去工资里还要扣掉的60元。车间人就是6元一天，后道裁床的5元一天，请问一天5、6元的生活补贴，按现在深圳的水平，够吗？时代在发展社会在进步，可我们公司还是按以前的老规矩在做事，不仅仅是制度上的还是福利 上的。现在我们连员工最基本的生活保障都不能给予，员工怎能会全心全意为公司服务。 第四点：很多时候 ，老板你往自己身上花钱很舍得，请你的朋友吃饭喝酒也很舍得，但是公司真正的申请买一点儿东西，几十元你都会讲，虽然批了但免不了会被说一顿。员工都知道你的酒 都是一车一车买，而且一瓶酒贵得很。可是老板你的钱也都是靠基层员工劳动出来的，如果真的把他们当兄弟姐妹真的多多关心关照下员工会不会更好呢。公司总是在需要用钱的时候，你开口就说你不开厂了，大不了关了美雅，你都这样讲了，我们员工还能有什么好说的，你一句话可以怒掉我们所有的一切。但是，你看前段时间华为贸易战，作为老板的任正非，他底气十足的回应了所有记者所问的问题，不仅是因为他自己有才华有底气而且他背后还有一个大团队一直在支撑着他，这就是他的领导层，在公司出了大的问题，给不出工资的时候，管理层没有选择离开 ，而是陪着任正非一起并肩作战，正是因为任正非之前舍得花成本去培养他们，在人力资源上面也舍得下血本。试想一下，假如我们公司真的出了什么问题，能几个人会真心帮助老板你呢，他们会不要工资的与你一起解决问题吗。我想没几个，因为你做的事让人感动心寒，你除了骂就不会别的，你也从不为员工考虑，只希望员工为你带来利益而你从不员工增加什么，也从不站在员工的角度去看问题，也不听取任何人的意见 ，只要是你决定 ，你就觉得那是正确的必须 这样做，你是老板，你说怎么做我们就怎么做，但肯定都是口服心不服。。我们所有的人，都为公司好，想让公司一步步的走向正轨，每个管理层站在自己岗位上看清问题 提出意见 改善工作，想让工作越做越起劲，公司也越变越强，可是此时的你，却听不了任何人与你提出的意见 。老板 ，专业的人，做专业的事，只有各个岗位身在其职的人才能正确的看清一切问题，你为什么就不能听听他们的意见呢，既然你用了这些人，那么你就该信任并放权。你开会的时候总讲这么一句话，怎么去管怎么去理，是你们的事，我要的是结果要的是效率。可是老板你真的是只要结果吗？真的怎么去管怎么理是我们的事吗？不是，我们一点权力一点决策权都没有，处处都必须经过你，告诉你了，就说这点小事也要与你讲，不告诉你，就说为什么这具我不知道，谁做的，你说我们是不是很难做。。。现在是新时代，也是竞争的社会，适者生存 不适者淘汰，一个公司如果再不跟上社会的脚步也是会被淘汰的，这也是我们最不希望看到的结果吧。 我讲了很多，肯定这些话都深深的打击也伤到了你，但是，我觉得我有义务告诉你这一切，因为如果我不讲，其它人也都不会讲了，然后你还会继续一意孤行 像古代皇帝一样独自专政，引起员工更加的不满与抱怨，一个消极的工作氛围，就是一个公司走向衰退期的开始 。 老板，如果你觉得我讲得不对，那么就可以做以下两点求证：第一，让我召集所有的管理人员开个会，你来主持 ，就放下姿态心平气和的问问他们，对于公司对于你，看他们会提出什么意见。第二，我出个通知，让员工把所有的意见写个纸条放到意见箱里，我来统计所有的员工的意见再向你反馈。 老板，我的所有一切情绪会表现在脸上，然后我做事的风格可能也与你不一样，我刚开始总是听你的话按你的吩咐做事，我只会执行，因为那个时候我对公司对管理层对目前的状况不了解，我只求保住自己职位。。但现在，我觉得在美雅我成长了，我也清楚的知道自己的职责明确自己该做什么也有了自己的主见，所以，我就把全部我知道的上述问题一一向你说出来，也尽了我的份内工作，就此为止吧。
2012年7月26日，王子瑜到郭竞兴家玩。

page.title: File:【王佳明实验】怎么也吹不走的乒乓球

revision.text: 【祁东高清视频出版社2012年4月出版】王佳明：下面我来为大家做一个有趣的小实验。我们要准备的材料有：一个吹风机和一个乒乓球。好，先我们把乒乓球插上插座，然后再把吹风机打开。把乒乓球放到上面去。这就是怎么、怎么也吹不走的乒乓球。

page.title: File:王&郭 - 说你什么好（相声）

revision.text: 【祁东出版社】2014年2月出品； 台词：新的马年就要来到 我祝大家龙马精神 龙腾马跃 龙马精神 马到成功 立马精神……马 马 马 马 马年吉祥 我有一个朋友 他真的要我不知道说他什么好 嘿 你看 他又来了 hi 给大家拜年了 给大家拜个晚年 祝大家元宵节快乐 元宵节快乐 我有一个朋友 王佳明啊 这怎么又说我了啊 他太爱花钱了 我怎么爱花钱了呢 我真的不知道说他点什么好 他前几天 呃 看着别人 非要出国旅游 他也要去 我叫他去办理护照 办护照 隔了几天之后 我去问一下 这护照 怎么还没办理下来啊 那个办护照的人说 诶 先生你要去哪里啊 我说我这是要去泰国啊 泰国 哦 然后他看了一眼说 诶 小伙子 你这上面写的是秦国 切[[User:Guojingxing123|Guojingxing123]] ([[User talk:Guojingxing123|talk]]) 16:39, 27 February 2023 (UTC) 他还又说 你这照片 也太小了一点吧 我说不小 这上面你还戴着红领巾呢 护照办理下来了 我们一块儿去泰国旅游 结果到了酒店之后 到了酒店 诶 就剩下海景房了 啊什么 就剩下海景房了 海景房 然后我就问他 这多少钱 这多少钱啊 五千四 这也太贵了 这么贵啊 我说 给我便宜点 我保证不看海景行吗 他怎么说 他偏不答应 诶哟 他不答应了怎么办 然后 睡了一晚之后 发现房间里有老鼠 老鼠 然后我就给那个 应该投诉啊 给那个公司打电话 打电话了 Hello Hello 忘了忘了 不好了不好了 我把那个老鼠英文怎么说给忘了 啊 幸亏是我呀 我把那部 猫和老鼠 的电影 动画片 给记下来了 You know Tom and Jerry Tom and Jerry Yes 啊 Jerry is here Here 切…… 这算什么 从那个泰国回来 就靠那三句半的英文 勉强在泰国玩了一圈 回来以后 回来以后怎么样啊 我就 我就 王佳明啊 王佳明怎么了 他爱看的电视节目我都不爱看 人的喜好各有不同嘛 他 我爱看真实的 新闻里面的街头采访 采访 有一天 采访 这位大妈 你对这个刮大风 你有什么看法呀 大妈是个东北人 唉呀妈呀 我这不 和老头子出来买菜 这不 诶 我老头子呢 你看这风影响多大 把她老头子都给刮飞了 还有一个问题 你对这个每个工作部门 买那个烟花 是怎么看法呀 那能怎么看啊 趴窗户看呗 趴窗户看 Yeah 呃 这个 王佳明 我还记得他还有一次 啊 怎么了 说啊 就是 额 上飞机的时候 飞机 我们俩一起坐飞机的时候 坐过飞机吗 哦哦 是 是 坐过飞机 上飞机的时候 我们俩挨着坐

page.title: File:王子瑜翻唱《沙漠骆驼》完整版MV

revision.text:
原唱：展展与罗罗（施展/罗中凯）； 演唱：王子瑜； 制作：郭竞兴。 这是王子瑜拍摄的唯一的一部MV，演唱部分是通过后期电脑修音制成。 #沙漠骆驼 #沙漠駱駝 #翻唱
我要穿越这片沙漠 找寻真的自我 身边只有一匹骆驼陪我 这片风儿吹过 那片云儿飘过 突然之间出现爱的小河 我跨上沙漠之舟 背上烟斗和沙漏 手里还握着一壶烈酒 漫长古道悠悠 说不尽喜怒哀愁 只有那骆驼奔忙依旧 什么鬼魅传说 什么魑魅魍魉妖魔 只有那鹭鹰在幽幽的高歌 漫天黄沙掠过 走遍每个角落 行走在无尽的苍茫星河 白天黑夜交错 如此妖娆婀娜 蹉跎着岁月又蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 坚持才能洒脱 走出黑暗就能逍遥又快活 我寻找沙漠绿洲 出现海市蜃楼 我仿佛看到她在那里等候 想起了她的温柔 滚烫着我的胸口 迷失在昨夜的那壶老酒 我穿上大头皮鞋 跨过凛冽荒野 我仿佛穿越到另一个世界 阿拉丁神灯要倾斜 天堂地狱已然重叠 突然之间飞来一只蝴蝶 什么鬼魅传说 什么魑魅魍魉妖魔 只有那鹭鹰在幽幽的高歌 漫天黄沙掠过 走遍每个角落 行走在无尽的苍茫星河 白天黑夜交错 如此妖娆婀娜 蹉跎着岁月又蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 坚持才能洒脱 走出黑暗就能逍遥又快活 我已坠入在这神奇的国度 驼铃相伴走向圣堂之路 原谅我曾经恍惚陷入迷途 遮住了眼眸 淹没了意图 怎能被这样征服 什么鬼魅传说 什么魑魅魍魉妖魔 只有那鹭鹰在幽幽的高歌 漫天黄沙掠过 走遍每个角落 行走在无尽的苍茫星河 白天黑夜交错 如此妖娆婀娜 蹉跎着岁月又蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 坚持才能洒脱 走出黑暗就能逍遥又快活 梦里回到最初 浪潮起起伏伏 彷徨着未来又彷徨着孤独 漫长人生旅途 花开花落无数 沸腾的时光怎能被荒芜 清晨又到日暮 天边飞鸟群逐 摇曳着苍穹又描摹着黄土 东方鱼肚白出 烈日绽放吐露 放下尘浮我已踏上归途

revision.text: 该视频于2018年8月15日由郭竞兴制作，音乐取自贝瓦儿歌的《明天会更好》，王钊楚于2018年8月14日在琼花伯伯家玩，15日在盛世洪城玩，其中也穿插了12日王子瑜在祁东奥园广场一楼和大门口外面蹦床上玩的场景。 结尾曲为阿里郎的隔壁泰山。
【祁东&衡阳旧时光纪录】这段视频纪录了郭建辰从出生到20岁之前的老照片（1989~2009年），很有纪念意义，值得一看。（此视频为修改版） 制作日期：2015年6月4日。
王钊楚2018年8月17日，王钊楚2岁9个月，能够说出自己爸爸妈妈爷爷奶奶的名字，还有外公的名字。 [[Category:2018Vlog]]

page.title: File:【祁东】左军&王婷婚礼接亲宴会全程

revision.text:
2019年8月25日，新郎左军和新娘王婷在一起将近两年的时光，从羞羞怯怯的心动，到从容不迫的笃定，一路走来，他们得到最大的回答是陪伴，是最长情的告白。生活中，左军他是一个少许有些腼腆的人，所以我们也可以想象得到，几乎是不会做太浪漫的事情，几乎新娘和他在一起，这么长的时间里，做过最浪漫的事情一定是今天这场婚礼，这也是这个女孩子，她内心所有所有的期待。
承办单位：祁东致美婚礼 祁东一洲大酒店 影视制作：CC映画婚礼 婚礼主持团队：湖南先行者主持团队 主持人：孟飞
婚礼全程台词： （视频附带字幕）
#祁东 #婚礼 #一洲大酒店
婚礼开始时间：25:00

page.title: File:【自导自演】新版新闻联播（祁东版）

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, removed: https://bit.ly/37Ab4vR (7), 更多精彩节目视频及栏目：, 王喜明的YouTube频道（第二频道）：, 佳兴官方Vimeo频道：, 佳兴官方Dailymotion频道：, 佳兴官方优酷频道：, 佳兴官方土豆频道：, 佳兴官方Facebook主页：, 佳兴官方博客：
revision.text:
由王佳明和郭竞兴自导自演的新闻联播，视频采取播送加实况转播的方式为观众们呈现了一派幽默而生动的祁东印象（纯属虚构 仅供娱乐）。 这次新闻联播的主要内容有： ①端午节到来，各地赛龙舟、包粽子。 ②鼎山公园游客强烈增多，现已超过游客限度，如今消防官兵已展开强烈行动，为鼎山采取强烈措施，如今每个人上鼎山时都会采摘树枝，县政府已经光临指导。 ③6月7日和8日是全国高考日，各地的高考生即将奔赴考场，对于这次史上最严格的高考，全国211工程应该如何招生。 ④神曲已经势不可挡，全世界已经无法阻止神曲的脚步，Gangnam Style已经开始在中国和全球范围内流行，Superstar已经开始在中国巡演。 ⑤莫言？不说话？：采访Noerre文学家的亲戚不说话实况直播。 视频于2014年6月9日出品。
0:00 新闻联播开播 1:37 数据分析：鼎山的游客 4:51 鼎山之消息 6:57 高考数据统计 11:05 新的Noerre文学奖在我国诞生 23:27 本台播出新的节目

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, removed: https://bit.ly/37Ab4vR (7), 更多精彩节目视频及栏目：, 王喜明的YouTube频道（第二频道）：, 佳兴官方Vimeo频道：, 佳兴官方Dailymotion频道：, 佳兴官方优酷频道：, 佳兴官方土豆频道：, 佳兴官方Facebook主页：, 佳兴官方博客：
revision.text: 王佳明于2014年寒假期间和我一起在盛世宏城伯伯家用电视唱了几首我们都很喜欢的歌，有《乡恋》、《流星雨》、《光阴的故事》，午宏伯伯在旁边做督导，高一下学期即将到来，王佳明和我在伯伯家玩的很开心。 这是2015年国庆节重制版，原因是当时高三，而2016年6月即将参加高考，我希望我进入大学后虽然身在异地，但是仍然能珍惜这份难得的友谊。

page.title: File:祁东县太和堂镇五里堆庭园甜橙小丰收 欢迎亲朋好友品鉴 Sweet Orange Harvest

revision.text:
种植历史悠久，已40余年； 我们家的果园独立成园， 周边无农田、无工厂等无任何污染源， 农家肥栽培、井水灌溉，散养土鸡除虫， 光照充足，生长期长，果实个大均匀、 色泽鲜艳、味甜少渣清香。 含有大量维生素C， 营养价值高，剥开果皮 里面就是美味和健康。 实惠的价格， 健康的果品。
采摘时间：11月底
联系人：王午宏 手机号/微信：15673453336

page.title: File:西瓜视频：湖南祁东某小学生因玩手机与父亲发生激烈争吵

revision.text: 2019年3月31日，湖南祁东一四年级小学生王子瑜和爸爸因为爸爸不给他玩手机一事而发生激烈争吵，此前该小学生还曾拍摄过家庭微电影指责社会上小学生玩手机的现象，告诉大家玩手机的危害有多大，不久之后该小学生戴上了100多度的眼镜。

page.title: File:王子瑜翻唱《沙漠駱駝》KTV字幕版(卡拉OK)

revision.text:
源影片：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aq7j1lQ_9UM
歌詞： 我要穿越這片沙漠 找尋真的自我 身邊只有一匹駱駝陪我 什麼風兒吹過 那片雲兒飄過 忽然之間出現愛的小河 我跨上沙漠之舟 我背上煙斗沙漏 手裡還握著一壺烈酒 漫長古道悠悠 說不清喜土哀舊 只有那駱駝奔忙依舊 什麼鬼魅傳說 什麼魑魅魍魎妖魔 只有那騖鷹在幽幽的高歌 漫天黃沙掠莫 走遍每個角落 行走在無盡的蒼茫星河 白天黑夜交錯 如此壺裡幽默 蹉跎了歲月也蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 堅持才能塞脫 走出黑暗就能逍遙又快活 我尋找沙漠綠洲 出現海市蜃樓 我彷彿看到她在那裡等候 想起了她的溫柔 滾燙著我的胸口 迷失在昨夜的那壺老酒 我穿上大頭皮鞋 跨過凜冽荒野 我彷佛穿越到另一個世界 阿拉丁神燈要傾斜 天堂地獄已然重疊 突然之間飛來一隻蝴蝶 什麼鬼魅傳說 什麼魑魅魍魎妖魔 只有那騖鷹在幽幽的高歌 漫天黃沙掠莫 走遍每個角落 行走在無盡的蒼茫星河 白天黑夜交錯 如此壺裡幽默 蹉跎了歲月也蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 堅持才能塞脫 走出黑暗就能逍遙又快活 我已墜入在這神奇的國度 駝鈴相伴走向聖堂之路 原諒我曾經恍惚陷入迷途 遮住了眼眸 湮沒了意圖 怎能被這樣征服 什麼鬼魅傳說 什麼魑魅魍魎妖魔 只有那騖鷹在幽幽的高歌 漫天黃沙掠莫 走遍每個角落 行走在無盡的蒼茫星河 白天黑夜交錯 如此壺裡幽默 蹉跎了歲月也蹉跎了自我 前方迷途太多 堅持才能塞脫 走出黑暗就能逍遙又快活 夢裡回到最初 浪潮起起伏伏 徬徨著未來又徬徨著孤獨 漫長人生旅途 花開花落無數 沸騰的時光怎能被荒蕪 清晨又到日暮 天邊飛鳥群逐 搖曳著蒼穹又描胡著黃土 東方魚肚白出 烈日綻放吐露 放下塵浮我已跨上歸途

revision.text:
原唱：赵雷 翻唱：王佳明
一个人住在这城市 为了填饱肚子就已精疲力尽 还谈什么理想 那是我们的美梦 梦醒后 还是依然奔波在风雨的街头 有时候想哭就把泪 咽进一腔热血的胸口 公车上我睡过了车站 一路上我望着霓虹的北京 我的理想把我丢在这个拥挤的人潮 车窗外已经是一片白雪茫茫 又一个四季在轮回 而我一无所获的坐在街头 只有理想在支撑着那些麻木的血肉 理想今年你几岁 你总是诱惑着年轻的朋友 你总是谢了又开 给我惊喜 又让我沉入失望的生活里 公车上我睡过了车站 一路上我望着霓虹的北京 我的理想把我丢在这个拥挤的人潮 车窗外已经是一片白雪茫茫 又一个四季在轮回 而我一无所获的坐在街头 只有理想在支撑着那些麻木的血肉 理想今年你几岁 你总是诱惑着年轻的朋友 你总是谢了又开 给我惊喜 又让我沉入失望的生活里 又一个年代在变换 我已不是无悔的那个青年 青春被时光抛弃 已是当父亲的年纪 理想永远都年轻 你让我倔强地反抗着命运 你让我变得苍白 却依然天真的相信花儿会再次的盛开 阳光之中 到处可见奔忙的人们 被拥挤着 被一晃而飞的光阴忽略过

我们听说武汉新型冠状病毒肺炎持续恶化的消息后，便打造了这一首《另一种乡愁》送给那些在汉游子，向所有奋斗在一线的医务人员、指战员致敬！

page.title: File:王钊楚和王子瑜的一天20200218

revision.text: #王钊楚 成长视频 (via. Google Photos) [[Category:2020Vlog]]

在湘西游玩两天。首先去了张家界的天门山，然后到上面的玻璃栈道，中午在山脚下吃了饭之后，下午出发本来打算去玻璃桥，可是没有票，后来调头前往凤凰古城。之后在山上找了一个景点，那个景点就是沿着山路一直往里面走，走到最末端的地方有一个瀑布。最后去了南长城，在上面买了些东西之后就回来了。
视频制作于2018年2月21日；(Modified Version) 出品人 Vlog-Maker：郭竞兴 Guo Jingxing； 指导、导演 Director：王永宏 Wang Yonghong； 主演 Starring：王子瑜 Wang Ziyu； 中国上映时间 Release Time：2018年2月22日；
0:00 片头 2:04 高速公路服务区休息 4:22 到达张家界 9:18 到达天门山森林公园 22:11 到达天门山栈道 32:10 到达吉首西收费站 33:05 到达凤凰古城 47:47 到达凤凰大峡谷 55:27 到达南长城 [[Category:2018Vlog]]

page.title: File:【翻唱MV】王子瑜 - 孤芳自赏（cover 杨小壮）

revision.text:
#抖音 #孤芳自赏 #我承认我自卑 原唱：杨小壮 翻唱：王子瑜 翻唱/视频制作时间：2020年2月1日/2月19日 视频制作：郭竞兴
一个人的房间 漆黑的夜晚 看着你的故事和你的朋友圈 谁会喜欢孤单 是不想人看穿 最后一点点温暖 也被你 打散 孤独的人晚上 最害怕有灯光 你关了那灯光 心里却有一点忧伤 你流泪的眼眶 他走后的模样 深深刺痛的心告诉自己要坚强 我承认我自卑 我真的很怕黑 每到黑夜来临的时候我总很狼狈 我彻夜在买醉 但我不曾后悔 只是想让自己清楚为什么掉眼泪 这孤单的滋味 我慢慢的体会 时间它会让我遇见我心中的玫瑰 要等到时间对 等大雁向南飞 我暖着我的玫瑰不让她枯萎 孤独的人晚上 最害怕有灯光 你关了那灯光 心里却有一点忧伤 你流泪的眼眶 他走后的模样 深深刺痛的心告诉自己要坚强 我承认我自卑 我真的很怕黑 每到黑夜来临的时候我总很狼狈 我彻夜在买醉 但我不曾后悔 只是想让自己清楚为什么掉眼泪 这孤单的滋味 我慢慢的体会 时间它会让我遇见我心中的玫瑰 要等到时间对 等大雁向南飞 我暖着我的玫瑰不让她枯萎 要等到时间对 等大雁向南飞 我暖着我的玫瑰不让她枯萎

page.title: File:【完整版】王钊楚的2020超长寒假（内嵌字幕版）

revision.text:
#王钊楚 #寒假 舒适地躺在沙发上看迪迦奥特曼，玩着植物大战僵尸的幸运罐，走到江南大酒店享受街边电子游戏，帮老老唱生日歌，和爸妈逛街买衣服，骑共享电动车，在三旺花园唱着K歌，和叔叔跳骑马舞，和奶奶打羽毛球……王钊楚和叔叔们一起享受了一场由疫情带来的充实超长寒假。(视频有内嵌字幕)
这些视频拍摄于2020.1.14~2020.2.23。佳兴广播站趁着疫情制作了此部纪录片《王钊楚·2020超长寒假五天乐》，纪录了王钊楚的精彩瞬间。
0:00 片头 0:55 在家看电视 6:41 在楼下玩手机 7:57 玩植物大战僵尸 10:22 在老老家玩手机 14:44 老老过生日 28:09 弹钢琴 31:00 在家看电影 31:37 在老老家玩 34:49 看迪迦奥特曼 36:09 和叔叔们放烟花 37:26 和爸爸去买菜 38:26 和爸爸放烟花 39:22 和爸爸去买菜 39:52 在楼下院子玩耍 42:56 和爸爸去领快递 43:37 在家看电影 48:36 去中心市场买衣服 51:29 经典哭闹场面 56:10 放烟花 57:36 烤串 58:51 唱歌 1:00:53 在家玩手机 1:02:55 和叔叔玩 1:09:05 在家玩 1:15:09 在家跳蹦床
精彩选段： 第1集(1.14~1.16)：https://youtu.be/-9Maa3Kbq4U 第2集(1.17)：https://youtu.be/ni-_osATx90 第3集(1.18~1.22)：https://youtu.be/4vq06tZgWug 第4集(1.31~2.20)：https://youtu.be/IuLrcXspQ1A 第5集(2.21~2.23)：https://youtu.be/WEZV45mZUHk
Comfortably lie on the sofa watching Diga Ultraman, playing the Plants vs. Zombies lucky pot, walk to the Jiangnan Hotel to enjoy street video games, help old and old sing birthday songs, go shopping with parents and buy clothes, ride shared electric cars , Singing the Karaoke in Sanwang Garden, dancing with his uncle, playing badminton with his grandma ... Wang Zhaochu and his uncles enjoyed a full and long winter vacation brought by the epidemic.
These videos were taken from 2020.1.14 to 2020.2.23. Jiaxing Broadcasting Station took advantage of the epidemic situation to produce this documentary film "Wang Zhaochu · 2020 Super Long Winter Holiday Five Days Fun", recording the wonderful moment of Wang Zhaochu. [[Category:2020Vlog]]
制作日期：2018年3月16日；制作人：郭竞兴
该视频拍摄并制作于2017年2月10日，纪录了小汤哥（#王钊楚 ）在祁东和叔叔们一起游玩的场景。 [[Category:2017Vlog]]

page.title: File:巨好听！！小孩翻唱《追光者》一开口就惊呆了，碉堡了有木有

revision.text:
原唱：岑宁儿 翻唱：王子瑜（回忆版MV）
如果说 你是海上的烟火 我是浪花的泡沫 某一刻 你的光照亮了我 如果说 你是遥远的星河 耀眼得让人想哭 我是追逐着你的眼眸 总在孤单时候眺望夜空 我可以跟在你身后 像影子追着光梦游 我可以等在这路口 不管你会不会经过 每当我为你抬起头 连眼泪都觉得自由 有的爱像阳光倾落 边拥有边失去着 如果说 你是夏夜的萤火 孩子们为你唱歌 那么我 是想要画你的手 你看我 多么渺小一个我 因为你有梦可做 也许你不会为我停留 那就让我站在你的背后 我可以跟在你身后 像影子追着光梦游 我可以等在这路口 不管你会不会经过 每当我为你抬起头 连眼泪都觉得自由 有的爱像大雨滂沱 却依然相信彩虹 我可以跟在你身后 像影子追着光梦游 我可以等在这路口 不管你会不会经过 每当我为你抬起头 连眼泪都觉得自由 有的爱像大雨滂沱 却依然相信彩虹
#追光者 #抖音 #夏至未至

File:MV 佳兴作品辑 The best of 2020 平凡的一天

revision.comment: /* top */clean up, removed: https://bit.ly/37Ab4vR (7), 更多精彩节目视频及栏目：, 王喜明的YouTube频道（第二频道）：, 佳兴官方Vimeo频道：, 佳兴官方Dailymotion频道：, 佳兴官方优酷频道：, 佳兴官方土豆频道：, 佳兴官方Facebook主页：, 佳兴官方博客：
revision.text:
原唱：毛不易 翻唱、制作、摄影：郭竞兴 王佳明
每个早晨七点半就自然醒 风铃响起又是一天云很轻 晒好的衣服味道很安心 一切都是柔软又宁静 每个路口花都开在阳光里 小店门前传来好听的恋曲 不用太久就能走到目的地 人来人往里满是善意 这是最平凡的一天啊 你也想念吗 不追不赶慢慢走回家 就这样虚度着年华 没牵挂 只有晚风轻拂着脸颊 日落之前斜阳融在小河里 逛了黄昏市场收获很满意 朋友打来电话说他在等你 见面有聊不完的话题 餐桌摆在开满花的院子里 微微酒意阵阵欢歌笑语 从不考虑明天应该去哪里 因为今夜的风太和煦 这是最平凡的一天啊 你也想念吗 不追不赶慢慢走回家 就这样虚度着年华 没牵挂 只有晚风轻拂着脸颊 这是最完美的一天啊 你也想要吗 生活可以不那么复杂 就这样虚度着年华 没牵挂 只有晚风轻拂着脸颊 总有一天 我们会找到她
#翻唱 #祁东黄花公园 #鼎山公园

海浪无声将夜幕深深淹没 漫过天空尽头的角落 大鱼在梦境的缝隙里游过 凝望你 沉睡的 轮廓 看海天一色 听风起雨落 执子手 吹散苍茫茫烟波 大鱼的翅膀 已经太辽阔 我松开 时间的绳索 怕你飞远去 怕你离我而去 更怕你永远停留在这里 每一滴泪水 都向你流淌去 倒流进天空的海底 海浪无声将夜幕深深淹没 漫过天空尽头的角落 大鱼在梦境的缝隙里游过 凝望你沉睡的轮廓 看海天一色 听风起雨落 执子手吹散苍茫茫烟波 大鱼的翅膀 已经太辽阔 我松开时间的绳索 看你飞远去 看你离我而去 原来你生来就属于天际 每一滴泪水 都向你流淌去 倒流回最初的相遇

page.title: File:王钊楚2021年元旦表演 朗诵《国家》

revision.text:
祁东县楚源幼儿园（莲花园）2021年“迎新年、庆元旦”文艺汇演（王钊楚表演部分） 时间：2020年12月30日上午9点40分 地点：祁东县楚源小学多媒体报告厅 #文艺汇演 #祁东 #王钊楚
1、 中二班 舞蹈《LaLa La》 2、小一班 舞蹈《宝贝宝贝》 3、中三班 故事《聪明的小毛驴》 4、大四班 舞蹈《最靓的崽》 5、小三班 舞蹈《吉祥娃娃》 6、中三班 舞蹈《加油鸭》 7、小二班 舞蹈《快乐小猪》 8、大一班 朗诵《国家》（有王钊楚） 9、小四班 舞蹈《小跳蛙》 10、中二班 故事《一个叫新型冠状病毒的家伙》 11、教师 舞蹈《舞蹈串烧》 12、大三班 舞蹈《礼仪之邦》 13、大二班 舞蹈《街舞串烧》 14、大一班 故事《小老鼠报恩》 15、大四班 舞蹈《小猪佩奇》 16、中一班 舞蹈《就是这么牛》 17、大三班 故事《小猫钓鱼》 18、中四班 舞蹈《恭喜发财》 [[Category:2021 MV]]
王子瑜、王喜明、王钊楚

#海底 #一支榴莲 #翻唱 原唱：一支榴莲 翻唱：王子瑜 修音、拍摄、制作：郭竞兴 翻唱日期：2021年5月2日 ©Jiaxing Video Album Some Rights Reserved
散落的月光穿过了云 躲着人群 铺成大海的鳞 海浪打湿白裙 试图推你回去 海浪清洗血迹 妄想温暖你 往海的深处听 谁的哀鸣在指引 灵魂没入寂静 无人将你吵醒 你喜欢海风咸咸的气息 踩着湿湿的沙砾 你说人们的骨灰应该撒进海里 你问我死后会去哪里 有没有人爱你 世界能否不再 总爱对凉薄的人扯着笑脸 岸上人们脸上都挂着无关 人间毫无留恋 一切散为烟 散落的月光穿过了云 躲着人群 溜进海底 海浪清洗血迹 妄想温暖你 灵魂没入寂静 无人将你吵醒 你喜欢海风咸咸的气息 踩着湿湿的沙砾 你说人们的骨灰应该撒进海里 你问我死后会去哪里 有没有人爱你 世界已然将你抛弃 总爱对凉薄的人扯着笑脸 岸上人们脸上都挂着无关 人间毫无留恋 一切散为烟 来不及来不及 你曾笑着哭泣 来不及来不及 你颤抖的手臂 来不及来不及 无人将你打捞起 来不及来不及 你明明讨厌窒息

雷阳娟台词：小汤哥（王钊楚），七岁生日了，恭喜你又长大一岁了，虽然妈妈没有在家陪伴你，但是通过奶奶和爷爷的分享妈妈知道了七岁的你比六岁的你更加懂事更加听话，你不但学习认真，在家还是家务小达人，经常帮助奶奶做家务；你勇于尝试、敢于挑战，在未来精彩的路上，你要细心、耐心、努力，更要快乐、幸福，要健康快乐的成长，爱你哦，生日快乐。
王午宏（王钊楚爷爷）台词：你是一个爱笑、爱闹、调皮的孩子!这是小孩子的天性，也是小孩活泼、帅气、聪明的表现，希望你健康快乐成长，愿所有的幸福，所有的快乐，所有的温馨，所有的好运，永远围绕在你的身边!宝贝，今天是你的生日，爷爷祝你生日快乐。 [[Category:2022Vlog]]

page.title: File:【字幕】宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅（ChatGPT创作）

revision.text:
该小说完全由ChatGPT生成，全文6978个字 【请开启CC字幕观看】
全文地址：https://jiaxing.fandom.com/zh/Kilvax
《宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅》是一部科幻小说，讲述了一个名叫王喜明的男子在未来的世界中踏上了一次惊险刺激的宇宙之旅的故事。
故事开始于王喜明的家中，他在接到一封神秘信件后被邀请前往一个秘密的地点。在那里，他遇到了一个外星人，并被邀请成为了他们的旅行伙伴。随后，王喜明登上了一艘飞船，开始了一段穿越星际的旅程。
在这段旅程中，王喜明看到了许多美丽而神秘的星体，甚至还到达了外星人所在的星系。他跟外星人进行了深入的交流，并学到了许多新的知识和技能。不过，王喜明也经历了许多惊险的时刻，比如遭遇了太空暴风雨和外星生物的攻击。
最终，王喜明完成了他的旅程，返回了地球。虽然他在旅途中度过了一段难忘的时光，但他也深刻认识到了人类与宇宙之间的微小差距。此外，他还面临着外星人的秘密以及他的经历是否被地球人所接受的问题。
这部小说因其对太空探索的富有想象力和描述性的描写，以及对人际关系和冒险欲望等主题的探索而受到好评。

{{Infobox | title1=Jiaxing Radio Station | image1=[[File:jiaxing.png|100px|center]] | title= | Simplified Chinese=佳兴广播站 | Traditional Chinese=佳興廣播站 | Founder=[[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]] | English name=Jiaxing Official | Japanese name=佳興公式チャネル | Country={{China}} | language=Simplified Chinese | type=YouTube channel | Establishment time=April 5, 2014 | Headquarters location = [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province | Service Area=Global | URL=[https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f Odysee]
[http://v.qq.com/s/videoplus/353643993 Tencent]
[https://i.youku.com/jxvideoshow Youku]
[https://vimeo.com/jiaxingvideos Vimeo]
[https://www.dailymotion.com/guojingxing0905 Dailymotion] |caption1=The official logo of Jiaxing Radio Station (released in June 2014). |youtube=UC9XJQh5K_KtSssnBaW9iHyA|facebook=jiaxingvideos|Abbreviation=jiaxing|country={{CN}}}} '''Jiaxing Official (佳兴广播站)''', also known as '''Jiaxing Videos''' or '''Jiaxing Video Album''', is a [[Wikipedia:YouTube|YouTube]] channel created and operated by a Chinese YouTuber Guo Jingxing since 2018. Its name '''Jiaxing''' came from its initial creators '''[[Wang Jiaming]](王佳明)'''(born: {{Birthdate|1999-09-24}}) and '''[[Guo Jingxing]]'''(born: {{Birthdate|1999-09-05}}) in April 5, 2014. It's now active with latest music album videos of '''''[[Wang Zhaochu]](王钊楚)'''''(born: {{Birthdate|2015-10-28}}). The operator was claimed to be from [[Qidong]], Hunan in China, and all the videos are shot or made by Guo Jingxing in Hunan, China. Due to restriction of access to YouTube in China Mainland, most of the subscribers come from Singapore and Taiwan, while few Chinese people subscribe this channel. The channel uploads the daily vlog and music video of Wang Zhaochu, Wang Jiaming, [[Wang Ziyu]] and so on. Many of the videos were made before when this channel was created. And this channel has an odysee Channel duplicated in the early time of 2021, which can be seen [https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f here], making this YouTube channel a backup channel.
The channel was set up to reveal the daily life in Hunan, China and share some photos to record the daily life for memory. ==History== Since the foundation of Jiaxing Videos in April 2014, Wang and Guo start creating and uploading videos via some Chinese video platforms such as ''Youku'' and ''Tudou''. At first, they just create some videos of the latest news comment and telling jokes like ''Einstein and Chaplin's Story''. While few people in China mainland are interested in politics, they started creation of music and dance and afterwards, making music and funning videos dominated their channels for about 2 years. Their first [https://youtu.be/RujOVzzXVDM dancing video] was created on June 8, 2014.
In July 2015, Wang and Guo released their 2 episode talk show ''Wang&Guo Video Show''. In the first episode, they talked about the interesting things happened during ''Chinese National College Entrance Examination'' (also known as ''[[wikipedia:Gaokao|Gaokao]]'', one of the biggest examinations in China) during June 7–9 every year, while in the second episode they told some funny stories and little jokes and invite two guests in their program.
Since Jan 2017, Wang and Guo started creating music videos, and they released the first MV in Jan 16, 2017, which can be seen [https://youtu.be/uRrIJPeTAnU here]. The most viewed music video is ''[https://music.163.com/#/video?id=465FE9D06B5EDAB3551EA631FF452B3F 19-Years-Old]'' on ''Netease'' Music Platform released on Aug 10, 2018. Due to [[wikipedia:COVID-19|COVID-19]], Wang proposed to make an MV ''[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTDv7xv0w_M Another Kind of Homesickness]'', which encourages the people and the doctors who fight through the coronavirus disease in Wuhan. Guo recorded Wang's younger brother's song ''[https://youtu.be/istxZmljAYI Desert Camel]'' on July 16, 2019 and become the milestone of making music through tuning (on Wang Ziyu's music), which becomes an indispensable part of Jiaxing Video Album.
After the birth of Wang Zhaochu (Hereinafter referred to as WZC) in 2015, recording and making WZC's video an important part. The most famous video of WZC is ''[https://youtu.be/Yp-Pgbg8cQQ Two Tigers]''. All of WZC's videos have been collected [https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=4 here]. ==Features== Since the development of Jiaxing Videos for about 3 years, this channel has developed some features: *Most of the videos are created, shot, or made by Guo Jingxing in Qidong, It has some features made by Guo and most of the videos doesn't contain Guo but other people. Wang Zhaochu is the most photographed person.
*The main and the most original playlist of this channel can be seen in the playlist ''[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLr2zN-4ce5vnkS2nFlfiyVcdO-rcNnk22 Jiaxing Official Channel]'', which has collected the videos they've made since 2012 in time order. All of the main videos by Wang and Guo are collected in the playlist [https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos/playlists?view=50&shelf_id=1 page].
*This channel has 4 main branches: **'''Wang Jiaming and Guo Jingxing's music videos.'''Wang and Guo are the main leader of the music videos and the dancing videos, which are collected [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2 here]. They have recorded their daily life and the sing they sang. The most famous dancing video can be seen [https://youtu.be/5HE_tLhfXUk here](created in August 3, 2014). Some old music videos released in 2012 has been uploaded in 2020. **'''Some collections of old or new photos or videos with music.'''These photos or videos often collects the moments that records the best time in daily life. **'''Wang Zhaochu's daily playing videos.''' Such as some of the music videos recording the best moments of Wang Zhaochu from 1 to 7 years old. **'''Travel, teaching, gaming, vlog videos and some other self-made videos.''' For example, travel in Guangzhou or Xiangxi are two of the most classic documentaries in this channel. Some Nintendo games(Super Mario Bros., Bug's Bunny Fun House, Rainbow Islands) played by Wang Jiaming in 2012 are the most ancient videos.

{{Wikipedia}}'''Hengyang No.8 Middle School''' (Chinese: '''''衡阳市第八中学''''' ) is located in Hengyang, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], China No. 81, Huangbai Road, Hengyang City, is a public school in Hengyang City and one of the model middle schools in Hunan Province. In 2012, it was awarded the first batch of youth clean government cultural education bases in Hengyang City. In 2013, it was rated as an ecological civilization demonstration school in Hunan Province by the Hunan Provincial Department of Education. In 2016, it was awarded "2016 Shengyuan Middle School" by Tsinghua University. [[Guo Jingxing]] studied in Class 423 of Hengyang Eighth Middle School from 2013 to 2016. ==School Culture== School motto: from high to strict, seeking truth and beauty
Spirit: self-confidence, self-improvement, unity and forge ahead, dare to be the first, and create first-class bravely
Teaching style: Rigorous and professional, cooperative and innovative
Style of study: erudite and prudent, discerning interrogation ==Awards== The No. 8 Middle School of Hengyang City has won the honors of "National Top 100 Middle Schools" and "Leader of Key Middle Schools in Hunan Province". ==official site== [http://www.hysbz.com Hengyang Eighth Middle School] ==Outstanding Alumni== ===Politics=== Among the alumni of No. 8 Middle School in Hengyang City, Wang Xiaofeng served as Deputy Secretary of the Hunan Provincial Party Committee, Secretary of the Provincial Party Committee and Governor of Hainan Province, and Hu Dan (Hu Qinchun) served as Deputy Director of the Research Department of the Party History Institute of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.
Liao Daiguang served as the vice mayor of Yiyang City, party secretary and principal of Hunan Urban Construction Institute.

{{Wikipedia}} {{Stub}}{{GameInfo|image=[[File:Minecraft_cover.jpg]]|caption=The official poster of "Minecraft". |zh-hans_name=我的世界|zh-hant_name=當個創世神|english_name=Minecraft|category=Sandbox, Survival, Adventure, Puzzle, Creation|platform=Microsoft Windows, macOS, Linux, etc.|developer=Mojang| publisher=Mojang Studios (PC, Mobile, Wii U, Nintendo Switch)
Microsoft Studio (X360, XONE, Series X/S, Windows Phone, Windows 10 Edition, Nintendo switch)
Sony Interactive Entertainment (PS3, PS4, PS5, PSV)
Netease (computers and mobile phones in mainland China)|designer=Marcus Poisson (2009-2011)
Jens Bergenstein (2011-present)|art=Markus Toivonen|music=C418, Lena Raine|mode=single player, multiplayer|release_date=November 18, 2011 |official_website=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/}} '''Minecraft''' (commonly known as "'''MC'''" in mainland China) is a sandbox game developed by Swedish game designer Markus Alexei Poisson (Notch) in Java language , the alpha version was released in 2009, and then officially released by the Swedish company Mojang in November 2011, and Jens Bergenstein (Jeb) was responsible for the main development. Players play in a random procedurally generated 3D world based on textured cubes. Other features in the game include exploring the world, gathering resources, synthesizing items, and survival adventures. There are many modes in the game. In survival mode, players must maintain life and collect resources to build their own world; in creative mode, players have unlimited resources and can fly, and most players will use this mode to build large buildings; in adventure mode, players Play on maps customized by other players. The Java Edition of the game is known for its powerful third-party expansion modules (mods), which can add various new objects, characters, and functions to the game.
"Minecraft" has received unanimous praise from the industry, winning many awards and honors. In September 2014, Microsoft announced the acquisition of Mojang and the intellectual property rights of the game for US$2.5 billion, and the acquisition was completed two months later. In May 2016, NetEase announced that it was the agent of the Chinese version of "My World", and in August 2017, the public beta was launched.
As of 2020, Minecraft has 200 million sales volume and 126 million monthly active users on various platforms, and is comparable to the imitation game of ROBLOX machine cubes, and is the best-selling video game in history.
==Relationship with Jiaxing Radio Station==
[[Jiaxing Radio Station]]'s younger brother [[Wang Ziyu]], one of the founders of [[Jiaxing Radio Station]], was once an obsessed player of the game "Minecraft". Wang Ziyu used [[Guo Jingxing]]’s mobile phone to download Minecraft from 2017 to 2020, and also used Guo Jingxing’s computer to play Minecraft and recorded multiple game videos and sent them to Jiaxing Broadcasting Station’s YouTube, on Youku channel.
In 2019, Wang Ziyu wrote a Minecraft movie script "[[Steve's Cosmic Adventure]]", and at the same time made a short Minecraft short film with Guo Jingxing, which tells the story of Steve in the forest Cutting down trees, and being blown up by creepers, Steve came to the local high-level castle and used a computer to talk to [[Wang Ziyu]].
==Wang Ziyu Funny Show== [[Wang Ziyu]] continuously recorded Minecraft game commentary videos from April to June 2020, and uploaded them to the YouTube channel [[Wang Ziyu Funny Show]]. Wang Ziyu uses Minecraft 1.7. Version 10 (the client of the Duck Exchange Club), and configure various additional game mods.
== Wang Zhaochu playing minecraft == [[Wang Zhaochu]] is also an obsessed player of Minecraft. Wang Zhaochu's favorite prop in Minecraft is the energy absorption gun, and he likes building houses, digging holes, using TNT and flint. Wang Zhaochu likes to watch Guo Jingxing use a nuclear bomb to blow up a big crater in Minecraft.
==Related YouTube Videos== [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZoeJQDUm-oo Wang Ziyu explained "Minecraft" - the future base of the solar system (Eris) 1]
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-h5Wu2_86J8 Wang Ziyu explained "Minecraft" - the future base of the solar system (Eris) 2]
[https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos/search?query=%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C Wang Ziyu Funny Show YouTube Channel " Minecraft Video]
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ZhsTttAhMk Wang Zhaochu playing Minecraft] [[Category:Games]] [[Category:My World]] [[Category:Minecraft]] [[Category:Wang Ziyu]] [[Category:Wang Zhaochu]]

[[zh:王佳明]]{{Celebrity|title=Wang Jiaming|image=WangJiaming.jpg|chinese_name=王佳明|english_name=Wang Jiaming|gender=male|nationality={{cn}}|language=Chinese(Mandarin, Qidong dialect), English |minzu=Han |birthplace=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|birthday={{Birthdate|1999-09-24}}|hometown=Qidong County, Hengyang City, Hunan Province|profession=graduate student|college= [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A1%82%E6%9E%97%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 Guilin University of Science and Technology]|height=173cm|weight=60kg|constellation=Libra|achievements=First Prize of 2018 "Internet +" Innovation Competition
2022 Guilin University of Technology Postgraduate National Scholarship|email=1638382633@qq.com|caption=Wang Jiaming is filming the MV of "An Ordinary Day". |representative_work="[[Wang Ziyu tours Siming Mountain]]"
"Grandma's Life"|political_status=CCP member|qq=1638382633|wechat=dgdgwang}} '''Wang Jiaming''' (Chinese name: '''王佳明'''), was born on September 24, 1999 in [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], he is a native in Qidong, Hengyang, Hunan, and is one of the founders of [[Jiaxing Radio Station]]. Wang Jiaming grew up in [[Qidong County]], with elder cousin brother [[Wang Ximing]] and elder cousin sister Wang Ting. In 2009, Wang Jiaming's younger brother [[Wang Ziyu]] was born. Wang Jiaming passed the [[wikipedia:Gaokao|National College Entrance Examination]] in 2016 and was admitted to [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A1%82%E6%9E%97%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 Guilin University of Technology] majoring in mechanical engineering and automation, moved into [[Qidong County]] Sanwang Garden built in 2018 in January 2020 Xinwu, who passed the 2020 National Graduate Admissions Examination, was admitted to Guilin University of Technology, majoring in computer science and technology, to study for a master's degree. Representative works include "[[Little Apple]]" (2014), "[[Once You]]", "[[Nineteen Years Old]]", "[[Ordinary Day]]" and so on. Obtained in September 2022 National Scholarship in [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A1%82%E6%9E%97%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 Guilin University of Technology].<ref>It is easy for you| It is not easy for these graduate students to win the National Scholarship! https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/dV9CuBjGZ87FaviTPuL2qw</ref>
==Life Experience== On September 24, 1999, Wang Jiaming was born in [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]], and lived opposite Zaoshuyuan Market on Chujie Road.
In September 2004, Wang Jiaming enrolled in Jinwa Primary School in Qidong County.
In September 2006, enrolled in Qidong County No. 7 Primary School.
In September 2010, enrolled in Chujie Middle School in Qidong County.
In September 2011, due to the reorganization of Chujie Middle School into Chuanshan Experimental Primary School, I chose to transfer to the No. 2 Middle School of Hongqiao Town, Qidong County.
In September 2013, enrolled in the No. 2 Middle School of Qidong County.
In June 2016, he participated in the National College Entrance Examination (National College Entrance Examination).
In September 2016, admitted to [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A1%82%E6%9E%97%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 Guilin University of Technology], began studying for a bachelor's degree in mechanical engineering and automation.
In December 2017, passed the National College English Test Band 4.
In December 2017, participated in the Guangxi College Students Mechanical Design Competition and won the first prize.
In May 2018, participated in the National Undergraduate Internet + Innovation Competition and won the first prize.
In June 2019, passed the National College English Test Band-6.
In December 2019, I participated in [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%80%83%E7%A0%94 National Postgraduate Admissions Examination], and the applicant institution was Hunan Normal University.
In January 2020, moved to a new house in Sanwang Garden in [[Qidong County]].
In June 2020, graduated from Guilin University of Technology.
In September 2020, he began to study for a master's degree in computer science and technology from Guilin University of Technology.
On May 21, 2021, the first dose of the new crown vaccine will be vaccinated.
In September 2022, [https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%A1%82%E6%9E%97%E7%90%86%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%A7%E5%AD%A6 Guilin University of Technology] National Scholarship for Graduate Students.
==Applying for Chinese Communist Party Experience== In October 2016, I submitted an application for joining the party, but was rejected because I was under 18 years old.
In October 2017, he submitted the application for joining the party for the second time and was successfully elected as a party activist. However, he was disqualified as a party activist because he failed the exam in February 2018.
In October 2020, he submitted an application for joining the party for the third time, but was defeated in the voting and talking sessions.
In March 2021, submitted the application for joining the party for the fourth time, and was successfully selected as an active member of the party. It is expected to be selected as a probationary member of the Communist Party of China in December 2021.
==Research Achievements==
(1) SCI paper: Wang J, Xie X, Cheng X, et al. Improved Density Peaking Algorithm for Community Detection Based on Graph Representation Learning[J]. Comput. Syst. Sci. Eng., 2022, 43(3): 997-1008.
(2) Chinese core papers: Chen Chaoquan, Wang Jiaming, Xie Xiaolan. Improved Density Peak Clustering by Combining Manifold Distance and Label Propagation[J]. Science Technology and Engineering, 2022, 22(10): 4011-4018.
(3) Papers published in English general journals: Wang J, Xie X, Wang B. CTO ORDER CLUSTERING FOR ELECTRONIC PRODUCTS BASED ON WORD VECTORS[J]. IETI Transactions on Engineering Research and Practice, 2022, 6(1): 29-37.
(4) Invention patent: Patent number: CN202210940841.5 Patent status: Application and acceptance Patent name: A personalized custom order anomaly detection system based on LOF algorithm
==Research project==
(1) Participating project: GCN-LSTM-based multi-sensor data fusion research provincial project
(2) Participating projects: OPM model-oriented smart service platform for electronic smart manufacturing industry provincial project
==Contest Award==
(1) First Prize in the Big Data Track of the Second Guangxi Undergraduate Artificial Intelligence Design Competition
(2) The third prize in the deep learning track of the 3rd Guangxi Undergraduate Artificial Intelligence Design Competition
(3) The 6th "Yixue Cup" National College Students' English Vocabulary and Comprehensive Ability Competition Provincial First Prize
(4) Third Prize in the English Translation Competition of the Third National College Innovation English Challenge
(5) First Prize of the National Undergraduate Artificial Intelligence Knowledge Contest
(6) The 9th "Teddy Cup" Data Mining Challenge, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Provincial Third Prize
==Representative Works of Jiaxing Broadcasting Station== ===MV class=== In chronological order: ====2017==== [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9KgD3SvID14&list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2&index=14 "Homemade MV" Once you] ====2018==== [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7OY3MnFQZY&list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2&index=17 "Cover" Nineteen Years Old (Cover Zhao Lei)] ====2019==== [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=idtZSOU0tsU&list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2&index=29 "MV" Under the Rainbow (cover Zhao Lei)] ====2020==== [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTDv7xv0w_M&list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2&index=33 "Homemade MV" Another kind of nostalgia]
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_B5mJFuWMjA&list=PLr2zN-4ce5vlUQgA7-hvpdSk3DBjR8SJ2&index=36 "Cover MV" "Ordinary Day" Ordinary Day (cover Mao is not easy)]

{{Stub}}{{Infobox|title1=Wang Ziyu Funny Show|image1=[[File:【王子瑜搞笑秀】黑人抬棺：黑哥一笑，生死难料]]|caption1=Black People Carrying the Coffin: Eat Bricks. |Simplified Chinese=王子瑜搞笑秀|Traditional Chinese=王子瑜搞笑秀|English name=Wang Ziyu's Funny Show|Founder=Wang Ziyu|Country={{cn}}|Language=Simplified Chinese|type=Funny, Game, Daily Life |country={{cn}}|language=Simplified Chinese|Establishment time=April 22, 2020|Headquarters location=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|Service area=Global}} '''Wang Ziyu Funny Show''' is a YouTube channel opened by [[Wang Ziyu]] on April 22, 2020. Through this channel, Wang Ziyu shares [[Qidong]] people's life, primary school mathematics, games Commentary, funny videos and more. The channel can be accessed via [https://youtube.com/@wangziyu2009 here]. ==Channel Statement == On April 22, 2020, Wang Ziyu recorded a channel statement, the full text of which is as follows: [[File:王子瑜搞笑秀YouTube原创声明|360x360px]]
Hello everyone, my name is Wang Ziyu, this is my only YouTube channel, I will bring you the life of Qidong people, primary school mathematics, game commentary, welcome everyone to pay attention, subscribe, forward, remember Turn on the little bell!
==Channel Suspension Update== Due to some reasons, this channel stopped updating from June 9, 2020. [[Category:YouTube]] [[Category:Wang Ziyu]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: Galactic Odyssey: Wang Ximing's Journey Through Space

revision.text:
[[zh:宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅]] {{CC-BY-SA}}{{Infobox|image1=[[File:【字幕】宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅（ChatGPT创作）]]|Simplified Chinese=宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅|English name=Galactic Odyssey: Wang Ximing's Journey Through Space|country={{China}}|genre=fiction (generated by ChatGPT)|production time=February 19, 2023|url=https://youtu.be/-OrrdPQQqxA}}'''''Galactic Odyssey: Wang Ximing's Journey Through Space''''' (Chinese name: '''宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅''') is a science fiction novel generated by [[Wikipedia:ChatGPT|ChatGPT]]. The story follows [[Wang Ximing]], an astronaut who embarks on a space journey to explore the universe. The novel was generated on February 19, 2023, with a total of 3,812 words. ==Plot summary== Wang Ximing sets off on a space journey to explore the universe. During his journey, he encounters a series of breathtaking and mysterious sights, such as a nebula that appears like a giant dragon, and a planet with sentient life forms. Wang also meets an extraterrestrial race who shows him their advanced technology and takes him on a tour of their planet.
Despite the wonders he experiences, Wang Ximing still yearns for his wife and son back on Earth. The lack of communication with his loved ones causes him anxiety, but he finds solace in his interactions with the alien race, especially during moments of humor and shared interests.
After three days, Wang Ximing arrives at Kilvax, where he explores the planet and interacts with its inhabitants. He learns about their culture, and even falls in love with one of the natives. However, his stay is cut short when he is told that he must return to Earth due to an impending danger.
Upon his return to Earth, Wang Ximing finds that much time has passed and his loved ones have aged. He is haunted by the feeling of having lost time and missed out on the lives of his wife and son. Despite this, he is comforted by the knowledge that he has experienced things that no human has before, and the hope that he will one day be able to embark on another adventure. ==Ending== As Wang Ximing settles back into life on Earth, he receives a mysterious message from an unknown source, hinting at the possibility of another adventure. The novel ends with Wang Ximing gazing up at the night sky, his heart filled with a sense of longing and wonder. ==Reception== The novel received positive reviews for its imaginative and descriptive portrayal of space exploration, as well as its exploration of themes such as human connection and the desire for adventure. ==Full Text of the Novel== Wang Ximing, [[Lei Yangjuan]] and their son [[Wang Zhaochu]] are watching the starry sky on the top of Dingshan Park in [[Qidong]]. It was a beautiful night, the stars were twinkling and the moon was hanging in the sky. The family had just moved to the city, and stargazing had become their summer night activity.
Suddenly, they saw a very strange light. This light came from a distance, like a shooting star. However, this light did not land on the earth, but disappeared into the sky.
Both Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan were attracted by this strange light, and they wanted to know what it was. They followed the light for a distance, and finally came to a clearing. There, they saw an alien spaceship.
They were all stunned because they had never seen anything like this. They approached the craft to take a closer look. However, as they approached the spaceship, they heard a very strange sound. The sound seemed to come from inside the spaceship, and they were all taken aback.
This is an unusual night, and they are about to embark on a wonderful journey, an alien journey full of surprises and dangers.
Wang Ximing's research on aliens and UFOs made him feel no fear when facing this alien spaceship. Instead, he felt great excitement and curiosity. He couldn't wait to walk into the spaceship with Lei Yangjuan and Wang Zhaochu.
Once inside the ship, they were taken aback. The interior of this spaceship is unlike any car or building on Earth. Everything is smooth and transparent, with hardly any edges or crevices to be seen. They walked down a wide hallway surrounded by strange instruments and buttons. Wang Ximing looked at these instruments, trying to understand their functions.
Just when they were amazed, a ray of light suddenly flashed. They looked back to find an alien was appearing in front of them. The alien was a little different from what they had imagined. It was about 1.5 meters tall, with an oval body and a red spherical head without eyes, nose or mouth. It appears to be able to communicate with humans using its mind.
Wang Ximing was very excited about this alien, and he had a long communication with this alien. The alien told them it was from a planet called Kilvax and was on a scientific mission. They are very grateful to Wang Ximing's family for their curiosity, because it means that they can communicate more deeply with the people on Earth.
During this exchange, Wang Ximing learned a lot about aliens and the universe, such as aliens' observations of earth civilization, other life forms in the universe, their technological level, and so on. This allows Wang Ximing to have a deeper and broader understanding of the universe.
During this contact, Wang Ximing also invited this alien to come to the earth to explore our civilization and human society. The alien accepted the invitation, and also showed them some other wonderful things, such as virtual reality and photon technology. All this filled Wang Ximing and his family with surprise and excitement.
Wang Ximing felt a familiar excitement in his heart, because this was not his first contact with aliens. He was relieved to realize that the friendly alien wasn't hostile. Wang Ximing knew that a common language was needed to communicate with aliens, so he began to communicate with aliens in simple and easy-to-understand English.
The alien's language is an unfamiliar language, but Wang Ximing can understand it. They started communicating, talking about some things on earth. Aliens are very interested in the earth. Wang Ximing introduced to him the natural scenery of the earth, human history and culture, and some challenges faced by human beings. The aliens also shared their planet with Wang Ximing, as well as their exploration and discovery in the universe.
Although Wang Ximing had experienced an alien abduction incident, he had no sense of fear. Instead, he was full of curiosity about this exchange with aliens. He has always kept an open mind and is constantly exploring this mysterious universe. Communication with aliens not only made him excited, but also gave him a deeper understanding and understanding of the world he was in.
The language barrier between Wang Ximing and the aliens does exist, but the aliens seem to have an advanced translation device that can instantly translate any language. This allows them to communicate in simple English, although the alien's English may sound slightly accented.
Wang Ximing is very grateful for this translation device, and he keeps studying it, trying to understand how it works. This translation device is not like a normal translation machine, it is more like a small electronic device that can accurately capture the nuances of human language and translate it into a language that aliens can understand.
Although translation devices can ensure their conversations flow smoothly, some complex concepts and vocabulary still require more in-depth explanations. During this process, Wang Ximing will use gestures, simple diagrams or animations to help express his ideas. Sometimes he also uses language assistance tools, such as using the voice translation function on his mobile phone, or opening a web page to find relevant pictures and video materials to explain.
The aliens are also very patient, they will listen to Wang Ximing's explanation tirelessly, and will give a more in-depth explanation in their own language when necessary. This exchange of mutual understanding and respect allows them to establish a good way of communication and discuss more in-depth and interesting topics.
Wang Ximing was very excited because this was his dream for many years. But at the same time, he also knew that his idea might be a bit too risky. He began to think about how to express his thoughts to the aliens tactfully, because he didn't want the aliens to misunderstand his intentions or feel that he wanted to invade other planets. So, he cautiously began to express his thoughts to the aliens in simple English, and asked if they could help him go to the planet Kilvax in order to further explore the mysteries of the universe.
Wang Ximing's tone was very modest and cautious, because he knew that he should be more cautious when facing alien civilizations with high IQs. He explained to the aliens that he didn't want to invade or plunder other planets, but just wanted to gain a deeper understanding of the mysteries of the universe and look for other intelligent life that might exist. He also emphasized that he will abide by the regulations and requirements of aliens and try his best to avoid any damage to aliens or other planets.
The aliens seemed to understand Wang Ximing's thoughts and expressed that they would be happy to help him realize his wish. They explained some basics about space travel to Ximing Wang, and told him that they needed some time to prepare the relevant equipment and technology so that he could go to the planet Kilvax. Wang Ximing was very grateful and promised that he would cooperate with their plan as much as possible and wait for the aliens to prepare the relevant technology before proceeding.
On the one hand, Wang Ximing is very eager for this opportunity to go to Kilvax, but on the other hand, he also understands the worries and concerns of his family. He is very clear that his decision this time may cause great harm to his family, but he also knows that this is the only chance in his life. He felt himself facing an extremely difficult decision. He began to seriously consider how to appease his family and minimize the risk of this operation. He had in-depth communication and exchanges with his family members, trying to persuade them to agree with his decision.
"It's too dangerous, you go alone, I absolutely disagree!" Lei Yangjuan stood at the door of the bedroom and said firmly.
"Yes, Dad, you can't go, I don't want you to die." Wang Zhaochu looked at his father anxiously.
Wang Ximing sighed, looked at the two, and said seriously: "I know that such a trip is risky, but we have the opportunity to explore a whole new world, and I don't want to miss this opportunity."
"But, you can't take this risk. You have a family, and you have us." Lei Yangjuan had tears in her eyes.
Wang Ximing gently stroked Lei Yangjuan's shoulder and said softly: "I love you all, but this is my dream, maybe this is the last chance in my life. I need your support."
Lei Yangjuan looked into Wang Ximing's eyes, then at her son, thinking.
"Okay, but you must ensure your own safety, and we will also pray for you." Lei Yangjuan paused, and finally let go of her hand.
"Thank you, I will try my best to ensure safety." Wang Ximing said gratefully holding their hands.
Although he experienced some verbal conflicts, Wang Ximing finally got the understanding and support of his family.
Since then, the aliens and Wang Ximing have left contact information, but because the aliens do not have social accounts and network technology on earth, Wang Ximing does not know how the aliens contacted him. Two months later, when Wang Ximing received the notice from the aliens, he was very surprised and curious at the same time.
Wang Ximing recalled the conversation with the aliens, and he thought of a possible explanation: the communication methods of aliens and the earth may be different. So, he began to prepare to try some new methods.
Wang Ximing gave the aliens his e-mail address and phone number, and told them how to use the communication equipment on Earth. However, these methods did not work, as the aliens used technology that was completely different from that used on Earth.
Wang Ximing began to feel frustrated, but he did not give up. He began to imagine how the alien technology would work, and he speculated that the communication used by the aliens might be an advanced brain wave communication.
So he started researching brainwave communication technology and tried to create some simple brainwave communication devices. After weeks of trying, he finally succeeded. He discovers that, using these devices, he can communicate with aliens. He and the aliens discussed some details about the planet Kilvax, and finally finalized the trip plan.
The communication process was very difficult for Wang Ximing, but he overcame a series of technical and language difficulties, and finally established contact with the aliens. This also made him feel the diversity of technology and life forms in outer space, which made him extremely shocked and excited.
However, Wang Ximing began to feel anxious and confused, and he was not sure whether the aliens could understand his concerns. He decides to communicate with the aliens again, hoping to resolve his doubts.
Wang Ximing found the aliens and expressed his concerns in as simple English as possible: "I want to know, if I get to the Kilvax planet, can I survive? Because there is no air and food in outer space, I am worried that I will not be able to survive." .Besides, we can only communicate in simple English, and I'm worried that we won't be able to solve the problems we have. If you can't solve these problems, will you still take me to Kilvax?"
After the aliens listened, they communicated with Wang Ximing using complex electromagnetic wave signals: "We understand your concerns, but we can provide air and food suitable for human survival. In addition, we have a set of simple and effective communication methods that can make We can communicate in any situation. We will ensure your safety and comfort and provide you with everything you need."
Hearing the alien's answer, Wang Ximing breathed a sigh of relief, and he began to believe that the trip was worth the risk. He thanked the extraterrestrials for their care and help, and decided to actively prepare for the trip to the Kilvax planet.
A new problem appeared again: Wang Ximing knew the importance of keeping in touch with his family while traveling in outer space, but he felt very helpless in the face of network and communication restrictions. He began to think about how to solve this problem, but also realized that he needed to prepare for the worst.
Therefore, Wang Ximing began to actively look for some alternatives, including researching new ways to communicate with aliens, looking for some breakthroughs in communication technology, and exploring some new teleportation and transition technologies so that he can quickly return to Earth when needed. He kept thinking and exploring during his journey, trying to find a workable solution.
He also explored this issue with aliens, wondering if any technology could solve the communication problem. The aliens told him that they have an advanced communication device that can communicate over a long distance, and this device is very small and portable, so you can carry it with you. This surprised Wang Ximing, who felt that this was a very good solution.
So, Wang Ximing set off with this communication device. This device is in communication with the alien's ship and can send messages directly to Earth in order to keep in touch with his family and colleagues on Earth. The technology of this device is very advanced, and it can transmit information quickly, ensuring that his connection with the earth is unimpeded.
Although traveling in outer space will still face many risks and unknowns, Wang Ximing has a comfort in his heart: he will not be alone, he can keep in touch with his family and friends, and share his experience and exploration in outer space.
At this moment, Wang Ximing finally embarked on a journey to the Kilvax planet, full of anticipation and anxiety in his heart. He watched the earth and the solar system gradually shrink, and felt a little bit reluctant, but more of it was his curiosity and desire for the unknown universe. He saw many mysterious stars and cosmic scenes, and saw the unimaginable beauty and magnificence from the earth.
When the aircraft started to fly with curvature and entered the state of superluminal speed, he saw a beautiful and spectacular cosmic scene. He saw countless stars, twinkling in the black universe, some of which emitted light like shooting stars, across the pitch-black sky. Some stars form shining nebulae, like clouds floating in the depths of the universe. The gas in the nebula emits light of various colors, including red, yellow, blue, purple and so on.
In addition, Wang Ximing saw several mysterious stars, one of which was very large, like a giant crystal ball shining with light, and the other looked like a vortex, constantly rotating, as if to swallow everything around it. In addition, he also saw a huge nebula, shaped like a huge bird, with its wings spread and magnificent feathers displayed.
These scenes made Wang Ximing amazed. He felt as if he was in a mysterious, beautiful and infinite world. Such a cosmic scene made him feel incredible, and it also strengthened his belief in exploring the universe.
But over time, he began to feel anxious and lonely. In the distant universe, he felt small and alone. Although he communicated with the aliens in English more and more smoothly, he still found it difficult to adapt to this completely different life. He thought of his wife and son, and missed their company and support.
During his travels in outer space, aliens took Wang Ximing to visit many mysterious galaxies and planets, allowing him to witness many sights that humans have never seen before. When Wang Ximing was admiring a huge comet, the alien suddenly asked about the music on the earth. After Wang Ximing heard the alien's question, he immediately became very excited. He shared some of his favorite music and singers with the aliens, and also introduced some elements of traditional Chinese music to the aliens. The aliens were also very interested and asked Wang Ximing to play a piece of Chinese zither for him. This exchange made Wang Ximing forget the reluctance to leave the earth and the solar system, and it also made him get closer to aliens.
When Wang Ximing was observing a very mysterious planet, the alien suddenly asked him: "Are there any funny jokes on Earth? I want to hear a joke!"
Wang Ximing hesitated for a moment, wondering if aliens could understand human humor. But he still replied without hesitation: "Of course, I'll tell you a bad joke, I hope your smile won't freeze on your face."
The alien was a little confused: "What is a 'dirty joke'?"
Wang Ximing explained: "It's not funny, but it still makes people laugh."
"Oh, okay, come on, tell me one!" The alien said enthusiastically.
Wang Ximing said eloquently: "There was a snail who wanted to participate in the race, but the other snails laughed at him for being too slow, and finally he had to wear red shoes. When it was time for the race, the snails were all shouting, but only One snail had no sound. He looked at the snail next to him and asked, "Why don't you talk?" The snail replied, "I couldn't help laughing when I put on the red shoes!""
After listening to the alien, he was a little puzzled. He didn't know why he had to wear red shoes to laugh. But Wang Ximing's funny expression made him feel very funny, so he also giggled.
After that, Wang Ximing chatted with the alien about his favorite movie again, he said: "There is a movie called " ET", in which an alien accidentally fell on the earth and was rescued by a little boy. Then they became good friends and went on an adventure together, and finally the aliens returned to their own planet."
The alien looked bewildered, and Wang Ximing quickly explained: "This alien is very cute. His fingers are long and can emit light. Their planet is a very magical place, full of strange plants and animals. , very beautiful. And the friendship between the alien and the little boy is also very touching, and one cannot help but be moved."
The alien's eyes lit up, and he began to be interested in this movie. Wang Ximing continued to introduce: "There is also a movie called "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy". Space adventure, I met a group of very interesting aliens. These aliens look very strange, some look like octopuses, and some stick to the ground like chewing gum, which is very funny.”
After hearing this, the alien also began to laugh happily. Seeing the reaction of the aliens, Wang Ximing felt very happy. He knew that even if they were from different planets, they could use the common language of movies to communicate and communicate.
A strange and mysterious galaxy appeared in front of Wang Ximing's eyes, which could not be compared with any planet in the solar system. Under the guidance of the aliens, the spaceship passed through hundreds of planets and satellites of various shapes, some of which revolved around the planets, and some were scattered in the interstellar space. Wang Ximing felt that he was in a wonderful and strange universe.
When Wang Ximing's spacecraft passed by a green planet, he saw a group of alien creatures that looked like butterflies flying in the air with colorful lights shining on their wings. On another planet he saw a great pyramid soaring into the sky, and on another planet he saw a sea of crystal shards whose reflections dazzled the eye.
After a period of travel, the spacecraft finally landed on the planet Kilvax. Wang Ximing jumped down excitedly. This was the first time he set foot on the land of an alien planet.
He felt every cell in his body trembling and his heart beating faster. The scene around him felt very strange, every object and every creature he saw was something he had never seen before. He saw monsters bigger than any animal on the earth, they had all kinds of strange tentacles, wings and eyes, and strange gardens with colorful plants growing on them, unlike any kind on the earth.
Wang Ximing's extraterrestrial guide introduced him to various creatures on the Kilvax planet, as well as their habits and lifestyles. They saw a group of aliens with very high IQ, whose IQ even surpassed that of humans on Earth. They developed super intelligent machines and mastered many technologies beyond humans, such as time travel and teleportation.
On this planet, Wang Ximing felt a sense of mystery and strangeness beyond his imagination. Every discovery surprised him. He felt that this planet was like a world in a science fiction novel, full of infinite possibilities. Imaginative and exploratory.
On the Kilvax planet, Wang Ximing also learned how to use alien technology, including how to communicate with aliens and how to use alien weapons for defense. He also learned about the values and culture of aliens, which gave him a deeper understanding of the alien world.
Although the time Wang Ximing spent on Kilvax was very short, it will have a profound impact on his life. He realizes that outer space is an infinitely vast and unknown world, and he is full of hope and longing for the future.
's expedition on the Kilvax planet came to an end, so he returned to Earth by spaceship. After returning to Earth, Wang Ximing couldn't wait to tell his family and friends about his adventures in outer space. However, as he shared his story with family and friends, he found that his memories seemed so blurred that they seemed unreal.
Wang Ximing was very confused, he didn't understand why his memory was so blurred, as if he had never had it before. He began to feel anxious and restless, worried that he would go crazy. He went to the doctor, but the doctor told him everything was fine.
A few months later, Wang Ximing suddenly received a mysterious letter from the planet Kilvax. The letters told him that his experience did not happen by accident. He was chosen for the mission and had a chip implanted by aliens that recorded his memories, which were then erased upon his return to Earth. The letter told him that this mission was to help them find an alien who was exiled to the earth, and the whereabouts of this alien had been tracked by them. Finally, the letter told him that the alien was by his side.
This made Wang Ximing very shocked. He began to pay attention to the people and things around him, trying to find out who the exiled alien was. He starts to doubt everyone, including his family and friends. However, he did not find the answer in the end, and everything became blurred and uncertain. ==FULL VIDEO== [[File:【字幕】宇宙遨游：王喜明的外太空之旅（ChatGPT创作）|none|thumb|360x360px]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Lei Yangjuan]] {{Navbox_Total}}

The song was recorded and produced by [[Guo Jingxing]], the MV was shot and edited by [[Guo Jingxing]], and the song was recorded in [[Wang Ziyu]]’s bedroom on the night of March 2, 2020. ==Song details== "The Light Chaser" is a song sung by Cen Ninger, written by Tang Tian and composed by Ma Jing. It is an episode of the TV series "Before the summer solstice comes, hear the youth", which was later included in the live album "Live at Blue Note Beijing" released on December 12, 2017.
On January 17, 2018, the song won the Film and Television Single Award of the Year at the 2017 NetEase Cloud Music Original Ceremony. On March 26, the song won the Golden Melody Award of the 25th Oriental Billboard Dynamic 101. The version sung by Wang Ziyu is the version sung by "Cen Ninger". page.title: Wang Zhaochu's Super Long Winter Vacation

revision.text:
{{VlogInfo|title1=Wang Zhaochu's Happy Winter Vacation (2020)|image1=[[File:【完整版】王钊楚的2020超长寒假（内嵌字幕版）|480px]]|caption1=Screenshot of Wang Zhaochu's 2020 winter vacation documentary. |time = January 14th ~ February 23rd, 2020 |location = [[Qidong County]] | person = [[Wang Zhaochu]] | producer = [[Guo Jingxing]] | duration = 90 minutes | production time = February 26, 2020 | originally posted = March 1, 2020|publishing platform=[https://youtu.be/H7gE4j2-qFQ YouTube]|watch URL=https://youtu.be/H7gE4j2-qFQ|description=A special Wang Zhaochu documentary born in early 2020 when [[Wikipedia:COVID-19|COVID-19 Epidemic]] broke out }} '''''Wang Zhaochu's Super Long Winter Vacation''' ''(Chinese name: '''王钊楚2020超长寒假五天乐''')'','' also known as '''''Wang Zhaochu's 2020 Super Long Winter Vacation Five Days''''', is due to a special documentary born out of the [[Wikipedia:COVID-19|COVID-19 Epidemic]] outbreak in early 2020. The film was released online on streaming media platforms such as YouTube on March 1, 2020.
==Video Introduction== Lying comfortably on the sofa watching Ultraman Tiga, playing the Lucky Jar of Plants vs. Zombies, going to the Jiangnan Hotel to enjoy street video games, singing birthday songs for the elderly, shopping for clothes with parents, and riding shared electric vehicles, singing karaoke songs in Sanwang Garden, dancing horse-riding dance with uncle, and playing badminton with grandma... [[Wang Zhaochu]] and his uncles enjoyed a fulfilling and long winter vacation brought about by the epidemic. These videos were shot on 2020.1.14~2020.2.23. [[Jiaxing Radio Station]] took advantage of the epidemic to produce this documentary "''Wang Zhaochu - 2020 Super Long Winter Vacation Five Days of Joy''", which recorded the wonderful moments of [[Wang Zhaochu]].
==Full Video== [[File:【完整版】王钊楚的2020超长寒假（内嵌字幕版）]] ==Wonderful selection== ===Episode 1 (January 14th~January 16th)=== Wang Zhaochu watched Ultraman, played Plants vs. Zombies, and went to Jiangnan Hotel to play street video games, etc.: [https://youtu.be/-9Maa3Kbq4U Watch on YouTube] === Episode 2 (January 17) === Wang Zhaochu helped his old man (who passed away on September 24, 2020) celebrate his 84th birthday, sang birthday songs, played hide-and-seek with Rongrong, etc.: [https://youtu.be/ni-_osATx90 Watch on YouTube] ===Episode 3 (January 18~January 22)=== Wang Zhaochu and his father are shopping downstairs, setting off fireworks, firecrackers and receiving couriers, traveling to Qidong central market, shopping, crying when they come back, etc.: [https://youtu.be/4vq06tZgWug Watch on YouTube] === Episode 4 (January 31st ~ February 20th) === BBQ downstairs, go to Sanwang Garden to sing karaoke, play games with Wang Ziyu, etc.: [https://youtu.be/IuLrcXspQ1A Watch on YouTube] ===Episode 5 (February 21st ~ February 23rd)=== Wang Zhaochu is playing games, trampoline, horseback riding, badminton, etc. at home: [https://youtu.be/WEZV45mZUHk Watch on YouTube] == Video Trivia MV == [[File:【儿歌】王钊楚 春天的风 Spring Wind Official MV]] [[Category:Wang Zhaochu]] [[Category:Qidong]] [[Category:COVID-19]] [[Category:Vlog]] [[Category:2020Vlog]] [[zh:王钊楚2020超长寒假五天乐]] {{Navbox_Total|state5=expanded}}

[[zh:大鱼(2020年王子瑜翻唱歌曲)]] {{Stub}}{{MVInfo|image1=[[File:【翻唱MV】王子瑜 - 大鱼 Big Fish（cover 周深）]]|producer=Guo Jingxing|production date=August 13, 2020|person= Wang Ziyu, Wang Zhaochu, Wang Ximing, etc. | date range = before August 13, 2020 | Release date = May 20, 2016 | format = MP3 |type=Chinese Pop|duration=5:12|record label=Supreme Records|lyricist=Tang Tian|composer=Ma Jing|title1=Big Fish|title=Big Fish|caption1=Screenshot of Wang Ziyu's MV "Big Fish". }}
'''''Big Fish''''' (Chinese name: '''大鱼''') is a cover song of '''[[Wang Ziyu]]''' in 2020. The song was recorded and produced by [[Guo Jingxing]], the MV was shot and edited by [[Guo Jingxing]], and the song was recorded in [[Wang Ziyu]]'s bedroom on the evening of August 12, 2020.
== Song Details == "Big Fish" is a song written by Yin Yue, composed by Qian Lei, and sung by Zhou Shen. It is the impression song of the animated movie "Big Fish and Begonia". It was first released on May 20, 2016. In September 2016, the song won the Top Ten Golden Melody Awards at the annual festival of the Asian New Song List.
=== Creative Background === "Big Fish" is a film impression song tailored by Yin Yue and Qian Lei for "Big Fish and Begonia". new ideas arose. In order to allow Zhou Shen to interpret the emotion of the song more accurately when singing, the lyricist Yin Yue told Zhou Shen the meaning of the lyrics and the stories behind the lyrics one by one. During the recording process, Yin Yue decided to let Zhou Shen sing with himself in the last part of the song in order to sublimate his feelings.<ref>https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%A4%A7%E9%B1%BC/19675903</ref>
=== Song Appreciation === The main song part of the song has a long and long melody, and the lyrics are rich in imagery and full of moving details. The transition from the magnificent scene to the delicate emotion is like a poem that directly touches people's hearts. The melody of the chorus gradually rises, vast and ethereal, and the lyrics directly express Chun's emotions, with a bit of classical sadness in traditional Chinese culture, making people intoxicated by the music and stories of "Big Fish". Zhou Shen is known for his unique voice and delicate singing. His singing in "Big Fish" is as clean as ever, from low-pitched singing and eloquent narration to long and passionate, rich in layers and consistent with deep affection. "Big Fish" Zhongchun, Kun, and Qiu's complex emotional fate is sung delicately, ethereally and movingly. Whether it is lyrics or singing, the impression song "Big Fish" is in the same line with the connotation of "Big Fish and Begonia". Like the national style of the movie, the song also inherits the long-standing style of Chinese music, and the lingering sound is endless.
The version sung by Wang Ziyu is the version sung by Zhou Shen.
==External links== * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jfw_9HxWcDs YouTube MV] * [https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f/WangZiyu_Fish_Song_202008:b Odysee]
== References == <references /> [[Category:2020 MV]] [[Category:MV]] [[Category:Wang Ziyu]] [[Category:Wang Zhaochu]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Guo Jingxing]] {{Navbox_Total}}

[[zh:海底(2021年王子瑜翻唱歌曲)]] {{Stub}}{{MVInfo|image1=[[File:【翻唱MV】王子瑜 - 海底 Sea Bottom（cover 一支榴莲）]]|caption1=Wang Ziyu cover MV "undersea" YouTube cover. |producer=[[Guo Jingxing]]|production date=Music: May 3, 2021 MV: May 5, 2021 | characters = [[Wang Ziyu]], [[Wang Zhaochu]] | date range = February 13, 2020-May 4, 2021 | release date = March 14, 2020 |format=MP3|type=Ballad|duration=4:15|record label=Netease Cloud Music|lyricist=PSROSIE|composer=PSROSIE, Shouyan|title=Sea Bottom}} '''''Sea Bottom''''' (Chinese name: '''海底''') is a cover song by '''[[Wang Ziyu]]''' in 2021. The song was recorded and produced by [[Guo Jingxing]], the MV was shot and edited by [[Guo Jingxing]], and the song was recorded in [[Wang Ziyu]]’s bedroom on the evening of May 2, 2021. The song "Under the Sea" was recorded on the day [[Wikipedia:Netease Cloud Music|Netease Cloud Music]] No. 1 on the hot list, Wang Ziyu's cover version is''[https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E4%B8%80%E6%94%AF%E6%A6%B4%E8%8E%B2 YiZhiliulian]'' singing version. This MV is the last MV that Wang Ziyu collaborated with [[Jiaxing Radio Station]]. ==Behind the Scenes== Wang Ziyu practiced the song repeatedly before recording it. The lyrics of "slip into the bottom of the sea" in the recorded song were re-recorded by Wang Ziyu the next day. ==External links== ===Original MV Video=== * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ot-HzSpyMN4 YouTube] * [https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f/WangZiyu_SeaBottom_20210505:e Odysee] === Karaoke version accompaniment video === * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r72HX58Ho5Q YouTube]
[[Category:2021 MV]] [[Category:MV]] [[Category:Wang Ziyu]] {{Navbox_Total}}

[[zh:史蒂夫的宇宙大冒险]] '''Steve's Big Adventure in the Universe''' is the "Minecraft" version of the movie script written by [[Wang Ziyu]] in 2019, but it has not been made into a movie yet.
==Main characters and dubbing== '''Herobrine (Herobrine)'''——[[Wang Ziyu]] Dubbing '''Robber (Robber)'''——[[Guo Jingxing]] Dubbing '''Alien (Steve)''' - Dubbed by Jun Jun '''Police, Good Friends (Cops)''' - Voiced by Liu Haizhao
==The general plot of the story== ===Scene 1=== '''Hero Brun, the incarnation of justice, saved the child but was beaten into outer space''' A man (''don't know who'') hurts a child, and Hero Brun sees it. With Hero Brun's righteous heart, he decided to save the child; At this time, Hero Brun stepped forward to fight against the bad guys. The child saw it at this time, and was very surprised. He quickly got up and called 911 (110) to call the police. At this time the police came. When they first arrived, they were still fighting, but because the villain was so powerful, he beat the police to Mars (''whatever star''). ===Scene Two=== '''Police encounters on Mars''' (''On Mars'') Because there are probes of Jupiter aliens on Mars, the aliens on Jupiter discovered him at this time, thinking that it was soldiers sent by humans to investigate and kill the aliens. The aliens rushed over at this time, shot fireballs from their hands, and the police were blown away. Then the police were beaten into the void. (''On Earth'') Hero Brun's eyes were red, and after knocking down the bad guys, he flew to Mars again, (''On Mars'') to see what happened to the police, but found that the police were dead up. Helobrun got even angrier. He knelt there, not noticing that the alien next to him was making fireballs. The aliens knocked Helobrun into the void, but Helobrun had flying claws, so he caught the alien directly. The starman went down with him. Throw the alien into the void, and use the flying claws to grab a stone above Mars, then fly up again, and come back here again. ===Scene III=== '''Hello Brunn avenges a good friend''' Because it was the alien who killed the policeman, and then changed the policeman to its good friend, that is, killed his good friend, because the alien killed his good friend Man, and then he went to investigate Uranus, Neptune, Mars, and Jupiter , as long as there is an alien, he must be eliminated, because the alien killed his companion, so he wants to kill the alien. ===Act Four=== '''Hello Brun returns to justice and saves the wounded''' After killing, Hero Brun returned to the earth and found that the houses on the earth were all empty and destroyed. The houses were not as many houses as before, but some ashes with fire burning on them. Brun heard a cry of help, and kept looking for where the sound was coming from. (At this time, Helobrun added the function of Shunfeng ear) Then Herobrun used Shunfeng ear to hear where the sound came from, and then turned on the teleportation function, and then it happened that the person was covered in blood, and one eye was missing , The eyeballs fell. Helobrun tried his best to pull him out, just wanted to use the flying claw to get the stone off, and the man was saved. ===Scene Five=== '''Hello Brun rebuilds the earth and recalls the past''' Then Hero Brun tried every means to restore the earth to have many houses, because the aliens were destroyed, and then Hero Brun made a house by himself, lived there for one night, and then made the city tomorrow. good. After tens of thousands of years, all the houses were finally built, but Helobrun was the only one. In another 10,000 years, Helobrun would raise cubs, and there would be about 100 million babies just like Helobrun. people. Because there are many houses for them to live in. At this time, Hero Brun thought of the former friend, the friend who was killed by aliens. He entered a house, and he imagined that his friend was sitting and watching TV at his house. His friend saw Helobrun waving to him, and then Helobrun hugged him. He didn't know it was a fantasy, and then he regretted it. '''''(End)''''' [[Category:Games]] [[Category: Wang Ziyu]] [[Category:Minecraft]]

[[zh:孤芳自赏(2020年王子瑜翻唱歌曲)]] {{Stub}}{{MVInfo|image1=[[File:【翻唱MV】王子瑜 - 孤芳自赏（cover 杨小壮）]]|producer=[[Guo Jingxing]]|production date=February 19, 2020|person=[[Wang Ziyu]], [[Wang Zhaochu]] et al.|date range=Before February 19, 2020|release date=September 21, 2019|format=MP3|type=Chinese Pop|duration =4:50|record label=Le Nest Records|lyricist=Yang Xiaozhuang|composer=The Chainsmokers|title1=Self-indulgent|title=Self-indulgent}}'''''Self-indulgent''''' (Chinese name: '''孤芳自赏''') is a cover song by '''[[Wang Ziyu]]''' in 2020. The song was recorded by [[Wang Jiaming]], produced by [[Guo Jingxing]], the MV was shot and edited by [[Guo Jingxing]], the song was recorded by Wang Jiaming in [[Wang Ziyu]]’s bedroom on the night of February 1, 2020 . ==Song Details== "Self-indulgent" is a song sung by Yang Xiaozhuang suspected of copyright infringement and plagiarism from "Something just like this". Subsequently, the song was renamed "I Admit My Inferiority" and re-released, but the melody is still similar to "Something just like this".<ref>https://baike.baidu.com/item/%E5%AD%A4%E8%8A%B3%E8%87%AA%E8%B5%8F/23784480</ref>
The version sung by Wang Ziyu is the version sung by "Yang Xiaozhuang". ==External links== * [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dS5fiHNKkME YouTube(MV)] * [https://odysee.com/@JiaxingVideos:f/WangZiyu_Solitary_self_admiration_Song_202002:6 Odysee(MV)] ==References== <references /> {{Navbox_Total}}
