revision.text: 2015年，我自制的一部纪录片，原名叫《曲折回忆》，2016年改名为《我的回忆》。这部纪录片合成了一些王佳明、彭正阳、姐姐、爸爸妈妈、爷爷奶奶、哥哥伯伯的视频，片尾还有王喜明雷阳娟婚礼照片和自己小时候的照片。 高清修复版：https://youtu.be/mHd-OqQfz7k [[Category:2015Vlog]]

[[zh:我的回忆(2015年郭竞兴自制纪录片)]] {{Stub}}{{Movie|title1=My Memories (2015)|image1=[[File:【2015纪录片】我的回忆 My Memories（官方完整版）1280p -HD-]]|director=[[Guo Jingxing]]|producer=[[Guo Jingxing]]|starring=[[Guo Jingxing]], [[Wang Jiaming]], etc.|length =45 minutes|origin={{cn}}|language=Mandarin|release date=February 28, 2015|publisher =[[Jiaxing Films]]}}
"'''My Memories'''", formerly known as '''Twisted Memories''', is a documentary made by [[Guo Jingxing]] in early 2015, and was renamed "My Memories" in 2016. This documentary takes [[Guo Jingxing]] as the first perspective, and synthesizes some videos of [[Wang Jiaming]], Peng Zhengyang, sister, parents, grandparents, brothers and uncles, and [[Wang Ximing]][[Lei Yangjuan] at the end of the film ] Wedding photos and photos of myself as a child.
==Video content== Videos are mainly a collection of videos or pictures that have been taken, in the following chronological order:
Guilin tourism interview video at 23:11 on February 2, 2014
September 7, 2014 Grandma's house
On the evening of December 31, 2012
October 3, 2013 Tour to Qidong No. 2 Middle School
April 22, 2012 Bedroom
2011-2012
2009-2010
August 8, 2013
Chatting with [[Lei Yangjuan]] on August 13, 2013, discussing about birthday gifts
On February 23, 2015, [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Lei Yangjuan]] met + wedding
January 2013
2007 and before
1999-2000
1989-1999
==Video Details== ''(From the end of the video)''
'''Producer:'''Guo Jingxing
'''Editor:'''Guo Jingxing
'''Characters (arranged by frequency):'''
[[Guo Jingxing]], [[Wang Jiaming]], Peng Zhengyang, Peng Zhengfei, [[Lei Yangjuan]], Guo Xinhua, [[Wang Ximing]], Guo Jianchen, Guo Manyuan, Peng Qiong, Wang Shu'ai, [[Wang Wuhong]], Peng Jingran, Guo Xiaoning, [[Wang Ziyu]]

[[zh:王钊楚(2017年佳兴卫视纪录片)]]
{{Stub}}{{Movie|title1=Wang Zhaochu (2017 Documentary)|image1=Wang Zhaochu Poster 2017.jpg|caption1=2017 Jiaxing documentary film "Wang Zhaochu" poster. |director=[[Guo Jingxing]]|producer=[[Wang Wuhong]], [[Guo Jingxing]]|screenwriter=[[Guo Jingxing]]|starring=[[Wang Zhaochu]], [[Wang Ximing]], [[Lei Yangjuan]], Guo Xinhua, [[Wang Wuhong]], [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]], [[Wang Ziyu]] | length = 62 minutes | origin = {{China}} | language = Chinese (Mandarin, Qidong dialect) | released date=October 1, 2017|distributor=Jiaxing Pictures|budget=10 RMB|Mainland China=Wang Zhaochu|Taiwan=Wang Zhaochu|box office= 200 RMB|Hong Kong=Our Wang Zhaochu}}
"'''Wang Zhaochu'''" (Chinese name: '''王钊楚'''), is a 2017 National Day drama produced by '''[[Jiaxing Films]]'''。 This documentary was produced from August 1 to August 31, 2017. It recorded some video and photo moments from 1965 to July 2017. Although the title of the film is '''''[[Wang Zhaochu]]''''', but The actual recording of Wang Zhaochu's video is only in the second half of the movie. The documentary tells part of the experience of my friends and relatives in the way of event flow and first-person perspective, with [[Guo Jingxing]] as the first-person perspective, most of the videos in the video were shot by [[Guo Jingxing]] himself, in order to record life bit by bit.
The film was released in Hengyang City, [[Wikipedia:Hunan|Hunan Province]] [[Qidong County]] on October 1, 2017. On October 7, 2018, the video was released on [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=durCJsSyEtk YouTube].
==Movie Details== === Stories of the last century (1965.5-1984.10) === In May of the lunar calendar in 1965, Uncle [[Wang Wuhong|Wuhong]] was born in Taihe Hall, and in September of the same year, Aunt Guo Xinhua was born in Huangtupu.
In 1970, the blue sky and white clouds were used as quilts, and the wild grass was used as tapestry. The high mountains set up sentries for me, and the flowing water of the Xiangjiang River lulls me to sleep!
This photo was taken by my uncle in the countryside during the period of reform and opening up. She was only 14 years old at the time. After graduating from junior high school, due to family conditions, she dropped out of school and stayed at home to do farm work for the family.
Maybe it was the marriage bestowed on them by God. One night, Uncle [[Wang Wuhong|Wuhong]] asked Uncle Xinhua to watch a movie in the countryside. A few days later, they were farming and planting rice seedlings together, so they walked together.
Time unknowingly went to 1984, when the whole country was celebrating, and it happened to be in this At that time, Uncle also got married.
They lived in a newly built two-story bungalow in Shanmuqiao, and the photo I see now was taken outside the bungalow.
===My story with Wang Jiaming and Lei Yangjuan (2012.1-2014.8)=== On January 4, 2012, [[Wang Jiaming]] and I used a relatively advanced mobile phone at that time when the photography equipment was relatively backward. I don’t remember the brand and model. The first program Opera 2, this video is a precious picture recorded by the 35mm camera at that time, and it also marks the beginning of video recording by [[Wang Jiaming]] and me.
3 days later, [[Wang Jiaming]] and I recorded this physical experiment, and [[Wang Jiaming]] and I were out of curiosity at that time, in order to record this video of the miraculous phenomenon that water was sucked into the cup at that time It also recorded the most classic scene in our filming history.
Afterwards, we successively recorded a series of physical experiments and many songs, making 2012 the peak year of video shooting.
Since the advent of professional cameras, the video we shoot has entered the era of high-definition video. However, at this time, [[Wang Jiaming]] put forward his idea of shooting movies.
I remember the first time I saw my sister-in-law, it was February 2013, I remember that I went to eat with Mingming and [[Wang Jiaming]], and Yuanyuan and the others seemed to be in a coffee shop The restaurant is newly opened, and the business is good, so I sat down.
At that time, I suddenly had such an idea, yes, I didn’t think too much about it, because the song was very popular and catchy at the time, and then I had this idea, I just came back from Shenzhen, and I was idle at home. Do.
===Stories of Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan (2015.1-2016.2)=== On February 14, 2015, [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Lei Yangjuan]] arrived in Qidong by train. After getting their marriage certificate that evening, there was this video, [[Lei Yang] Juan]] said that when queuing up, it happened to be the last one of the day.
Four months later, I'm here again. On June 20, 2015, Uncle [[Wang Wuhong|Wuhong]]'s 50th birthday, colleagues on the construction site came to congratulate him.
On July 25, 2015, [[Lei Yangjuan]] and [[Wang Ximing]] returned to Qidong. [[Wang Ximing]] bought a new computer, and he is checking the condition of the computer, and [[Lei Yangjuan]] also brought a gift to the family after returning this time.
On October 28, this gift broke out, and [[Wang Zhaochu]] was born.
===The story of the Spring Festival in 2016 (2016.2)=== On February 10, 2016, because Guo Jianchen and Zhou Qian got married and held a wedding ceremony, my uncle accompanied me to book a table at Grandma Bridge Hotel in the central market, while [[Wang Ximing]] and the others took care of their children at home.
===The story after the 2016 college entrance examination (2016.6-2016.10)=== On June 7, 2016, [[Wang Jiaming]] and I entered the college entrance examination room, and we are about to usher in one of the most important turning points in our lives. According to reports, this year’s college entrance examination is called “the most rigorous college entrance examination in history”, and the tension exaggerated by the media Under the atmosphere, I hoped that I could show my ideal level in the college entrance examination. The moment I stepped into the examination room, I realized that the college entrance examination was actually not as strict as I imagined before. Talking and laughing, after the math test in the afternoon, most people looked dignified after leaving the test room. Math is difficult, and I am no exception. After the English exam the next afternoon, my high school life came to an end.
On June 17, 2016, my aunt brought 8-month-old [[Wang Zhaochu]] to play.
On July 6, 2016, [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Wang Jiaming]] father and [[Wang Ziyu]] and I came to visit Siming Mountain. When we found this creek, [[Wang Ziyu]] always made new discoveries. The curiosity of exploring the creek prompted us to move forward and go to deeper streams.
In September 2016, [[Wang Jiaming]] and I walked into the university campus. The first thing we did after entering the university was the military parade. After the 22 days of military training, the National Day is coming. On October 1, Uncle and the others came to play in Qidong. At this time, Wang Zhaochu was already able to walk under the traction of the rope.
===The story of the Spring Festival in 2017 (2017.1-2017.2)=== On January 30, 2017, [[Wang Ximing]] and I went to Shaoshan, a famous red tourist spot in Hunan and the hometown of Mao Zedong. This is the scene at a local restaurant at noon that day.
In the afternoon, we set off to Shaoshan Scenic Area, which is in the Shaoshan Mao Zedong Museum. We saw the great achievements along the way in the history of the founding of the country. In the evening, we decided to go to Changsha Underwater World to play.

[[zh:2018年湘西三日游]] {{Stub}}{{Movie|title1=3-day Tour to Western Hunan in 2018|image1=xiangxi.jpg|caption1=Xiangxi Documentary Poster (February 2018). |Origin={{China}} |language = Simplified Chinese ([[Qidong]] dialect) |release date = February 22, 2018 |director=Wang Yonghong |producer = Wang Yonghong [[Guo Jingxing]] |screenwriter = Wang Yonghong [[Wang Jiaming]] [[Guo Jingxing]] |Actor=[[Wang Ziyu]] Wang Yonghong [[Guo Jingxing]] [[Wang Jiaming]] Shi Hongmei Zhou Sitong Guo Manyuan | Length = 67 minutes (before modification) 62 minutes (modified) |distributor=Jiaxing Pictures|budget=US$560|box office=[[Qidong]]:10 RMB|Mainland China=2018 Spring Festival Three-day Tour|Hong Kong=Spring Festival Bliss Tour: My 2018|Taiwan=2018 Spring Festival three-day tour|[[Qidong]]=visit Xiangxi}} '''''3-day Tour to Western Hunan in 2018''''' (Chinese name: '''美丽湘西：2018年春节三日游''') was released in [[Qidong]] during the Spring Festival in 2018, it is a documentary film based on casual shooting to record the scenery of western Hunan. After modification, the duration is 62 minutes. It is Jiaxing Satellite TV’s first true documentary. video. This documentary was filmed by [[Guo Jingxing]] with his mobile phone, and it is the whole journey of [[Guo Jingxing]] and [[Wang Jiaming]]’s family in Xiangxi (mainly Zhangjiajie and Phoenix Ancient City) during the Spring Festival in 2018. "The Memories of Wang and Guo" and "A Trip to Shenzhen" are another objective and realistic tourist documentary. The video was produced by [[Guo Jingxing]]. After the film was broadcast in [[Qidong]], It was corrected by Wang Yonghong pointed out that the subtitle was wrong. The video was launched on the Tencent video website in mainland China with a bit rate of standard definition. Previously, high-definition videos could be watched on YouTube. ==Documentary Background== In January 2018, Wang Yonghong proposed the idea of traveling to Zhangjiajie during the Spring Festival. At that time [[Wang Jiaming]] told [[Guo Jingxing]] about it, but he did not form a final idea, it was just a proposal. On February 16, 2018, [[Wang Jiaming]] and his family temporarily decided to travel to Zhangjiajie. At that time, [[Wang Jiaming]]’s family and [[Guo Jingxing]] made a preliminary agreement on this matter. A preliminary plan was made. On the 17th, [[Guo Jingxing]] and [[Wang Jiaming]] and their family got into their car, and Guo Manyuan joined them along with Wang Ziyu and Zhou Sitong. Arrive in Zhangjiajie at night. On the 18th, [[Wang Jiaming]] and his family decided to go to Tianmen Mountain Forest Park. After arriving at 9:00 in the morning, they went all the way forward and played the ladder and glass path, but they did not see the real scenery of Tianmen Mountain because of the rainy weather. At 14 o'clock, we had lunch at a restaurant at the foot of Tianmen Mountain. In the evening, we went to Zhangjiajie's most famous scenic spot - the Glass Bridge, and stayed in a nearby hotel. On the morning of the 19th, due to the sold-out tickets for the Glass Bridge and [[Wang Jiaming]]’s initiative to petition against not entering the Glass Bridge, the group discussed together and planned to go to Fenghuang, another famous cultural tourism ancient city in western Hunan, and arrived at Fenghuang at 3 p.m. County, and enjoyed local cultural programs with Tujia and Miao characteristics in Western Hunan. On the 20th, the group went to the tourist attractions in Western Hunan—Fenghuang County Waterfall and the South Great Wall, and returned to [[Qidong]] County in the afternoon.
==Timestamp of movie clip== The time stamp is the time when the documentary arrives at the scenic spot during the whole play, and the time node published on [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hcxEBrg1Foc YouTube] shall prevail. 2:04 Rest in the expressway service area 4:22 arrived in Zhangjiajie 9:18 Arrive at Tianmen Mountain Forest Park 22:11 Arrive at Tianmen Mountain Plank Road 32:10 Arrive at Jishou West Toll Station 33:05 Arrive at Fenghuang Ancient City 47:47 Arrive at Phoenix Grand Canyon 55:27 Arrive at the South Great Wall

[[zh:王和郭的记忆]] {{Stub}}{{Movie|title1=Memories of Wang & Guo's|image1=[[File:【纪录片】王和郭的记忆 Wang & Guo's Memories]]|caption1=The cover of "Wang & Guo's Memories". |director=Guo Jingxing|producer=[[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]]|starring=[[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]]|length=58 minutes|origin=[[Qidong County]], Hunan Province|language=Chinese ([[Qidong]])|release date=August 31, 2014|distributor=[[Home HD Movie Press]]|China Mainland=Wang and Guo’s memory|Taiwan=Wang and Guo’s friendship}} '''''Wang & Guo's Memories''''' (Chinese name: '''王和郭的记忆''') is a documentary produced by [[Home HD Movie Press]] (now named [[Jiaxing Radio Station]]) published in August 2014. There is no commentary throughout the documentary, it is a pile of daily life videos taken by [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] from 2012 to 2014. The film tells the story of [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]]’s childhood The memories, as well as the deep friendship between the two people, record the two people's play from childhood to adulthood. ==Video Introduction== The film starts off with the song My heart will go on (from the Titanic movie), and then it opens with some [[Wang Jiaming]] riding a bike.
The film connects the clips of [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] in chronological order, from some imitation fake record clips shot in early 2012 to the collaborative video clips in the first half of 2014. ==Soundtrack== ''''' (from YouTube copyright list)'''''

'''''Travel in Summer 2014''''' (Chinese name: '''2014年暑假之行'''), also known as '''Shenzhen Trip'''. It is a Vlog produced by [[Home HD Movie Press]] in August 2014. The duration of the film is 1 hour and 8 minutes. The first part is the Shenzhen travel diary produced by [[Jiaxing Satellite TV]] in August 2014, directed by [[Lei Yangjuan]] and [[Wang Ximing]]; the film is recorded by camera The scenes of [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Lei Yangjuan]] riding bicycles in the mangroves of Shenzhen, visiting libraries, museums, and civic centers. The film is divided into two parts, the first part is also called "Shenzhen Trip"; the second part mainly records the scene of [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] walking in the Taihe Hall.

'''''Alien Revelation''''' (Chinese name: '''外星人启示录''') was published in October 2016 by '''[[Wang Ximing]]''', which is an opinion piece about [[Wikipedia:alien|Alien]]. This point of view points out that aliens are hidden among human beings, but human beings forget that they are aliens. ==Full Text== Speaking of aliens, I agree with the view that we ourselves are aliens. Therefore, aliens have the same appearance as us, and they hide among us humans. Why can't aliens be discovered so far, but there are so many evidences of aliens' existence. Aliens migrated to the earth a long time ago, and time has passed for a long time, and the aliens on the earth have forgotten that they are from an alien planet. And the home planet of the aliens still remembers this incident, so they come to the earth to see it from time to time, so there are many [[Wikipedia:UFO|ufo]] events, and the aliens have the same appearance as us, mixing among us, So aliens can never be found. That's my point. The so-called human beings evolved from microorganisms is just a cover for aliens. ==Supplement== On November 7, 2019, [[Wang Ximing]] supplemented this point of view with the following additions:
Why don't aliens show up? This question has always been wrong. Humans are aliens.
[[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Aliens]] [[zh:外星人启示录]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: That Night, at Two O'Clock in the Morning in Shenzhen

revision.text:
'''''That Night, at Two O'Clock in the Morning in Shenzhen''''' is a narrative article published by [[Wang Ximing]] in 2012. The article has a total of 690 words and describes the scene of Wang Ximing working in Shenzhen. However, Wang Ximing did not finish this article in 2012. Later, on August 12, 2015, Wang Ximing completed the supplementary writing of the article.
==Full Article== That day, at two o'clock in the morning, I was still sitting in front of the computer, and it was raining faintly outside the window, and the raindrops fell on the window sill, making a ticking, ticking sound. I got up and stood by the window, looking at the brightly lit urban area of Shenzhen over there, took out a cigarette from my pocket, lit it, took a deep breath, and let it out slowly. Watch the smoke swirl and slowly drift away with the wind...
The rain is still falling, the wind is still blowing, and the rain is slowly getting bigger. The small raindrops, after just a few minutes, become like a gaping embankment. I still stood by the window, silently watching the rain poured on the window sill and splashed on my body. As my thoughts went further and further away, I could no longer feel my own existence, and gradually felt that my body was getting lighter and lighter. I tried to raise my head, and saw a crescent moon, which was like a crescent eyebrow hanging lightly, a little strange, but also A little kind, I asked myself in a low voice, how long has it been since I looked up at the starry sky? How long has it been since I stared at this beautiful moon so carefully? At this moment, let the moonlight like water, the brilliance like sand pour down on my body gently, and touch my soul gently. The moonlight is like water, the stars are like sand, and the night is gentle. I felt that I had been sublimated, and a voice slowly came to my ears: You are so intoxicated, please stay! I suddenly came to my senses, my whole body was soaked, I heard the sound of high heels coming from behind, from far to near. Tick tock, one sound hit my heart, I want to turn back, but I can't control my body.
The sound was getting closer and closer, and it stopped behind me. Someone was stroking my hair, the movements were very gentle, but the hands were cold. I stood there blankly, my whole body was stiff, my limbs were cold, suddenly I wanted to laugh, laugh out loud! Laughing away the fear in my heart, the ignorance behind the joke, far away I saw the light shining in the rain, but I know that light does not belong to the world, I may die soon! I felt the heat of the light, and a huge heat hit my face. At this time, I was like a watchman, watching the coming of death and the end of my own life. As the light approached, the sound of high heels going away came from behind, and my body could also move slowly. I slowly turned my head and looked at the sound of going away, and what I saw was pitch black. The sense of fear in my mind doubled. Why is the light outside the window so strong? But it can't get into my room? I picked up the fruit knife next to me and turned around suddenly, only to see that the light that was far away was close at hand, and I couldn't see anything. There was a vast expanse of white in front of me, and darkness behind. I fell to the floor and passed out. I don't know how long it took before I opened my eyes, and my blurred vision gradually became clear. I saw a person standing beside me with a knife stuck in my chest. The heart-piercing pain lasted for a few seconds. Like smoke, it slowly floats into the air and disperses with the wind.
I have always wanted to float. In my dream, I floated into the air, passing fields, mountains and rivers, and forests. The feeling of forest tops brushing my toes is still fresh in my memory. It feels so good to float, empty, gently, all the turbidity in the whole body is removed, leaving a tulle-like body, a gossamer-like breath, flickering, flickering, flickering among the white clouds under the blue sky above everything...
[[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[zh:那夜，深圳的凌晨两点]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan's Wedding

revision.text:
<div class="nocopy">{{Stub}}'''[[Wang Ximing]]''' and '''[[Lei Yangjuan]]''' 's wedding was held on February 23, 2015 at [[Qidong]] Yizhou Hotel. The wedding host is Gao Yuan, hosted by [[Qidong]] Jinyu Liangyuan Wedding Celebration Company.
==Wedding Dialogs== [[File:王喜明和雷阳娟的婚礼(2015)|thumb|Gao Yuan held the wedding.]] '''Gao Yuan:'''Dear guests, dear friends, welcome to witness the wedding ceremony of a happy couple at this sacred moment. Today, we are going to witness the wedding of the groom Wang Ximing and the bride Lei Yangjuan . I believe that a perfect wedding needs your support and blessings from all the guests. A small proposal. When I count to three, I will give you the most enthusiastic applause and cheers to cheer them on and encourage them. Are you ready? One , two, three.
'''Gao Yuan:'''In fact, fate is a very wonderful thing. Fate can make two people who don't know each other meet in that bustling Shenzhen. I still remember that on Valentine's Day that year, two people were introduced by friends Under the circumstances, met and got acquainted. In fact, today's bride, Yang Juan, has always been the most beautiful and perfect goddess among many friends. Also today, for our outstanding and handsome young man, let Mr. Wang Ximing marry and go home. All friends and dear guests, today you must be thinking that our goddess is the happiest and most beautiful, if you wish, cast all eyes and all blessings on the bride, applause and blessings!
'''Gao Yuan:'''All friends, dear guests, I think today's bride, Lei Yangjuan , is the most beautiful girl and the happiest princess. Today she is among the happy flowers, and she is with her dad and mom. First of all, I would like to invite the bride, face the mother, auntie, face to face with your daughter, arrange her wedding dress for your daughter, she has grown up now, she is more beautiful now, come to auntie, cover your daughter Her veil, she will present her happiest image in front of all her friends and her most beloved groom today. Lei Yangjuan , come and give your mother a deep hug, and say two words in your mother's ear, thank you, bride, come and give this great father beside you a deep hug, thank you father, Thank you, holding the hands of Mom and Dad, today , you grow up, today, you are about to get married, also today, you are waiting there, you are waiting there for the most important man in your life to give you The proposal is today's groom, Mr. Wang Ximing. Friends and guests, next, please use your most enthusiastic applause and cheers, welcome to the groom, please give us applause!
'''Gao Yuan:'''Groom, come to the middle of the stage at this moment. I think today's groom is full of strength. Similarly, he is ready to propose to the girl he loves. {{VlogInfo|title1=Travel in Guangzhou 2019(Vlog)|image1=[[File:【祁东文化】《2019年广州之旅》预告片]]|caption1="Travel in Guangzhou 2019" trailer. |time = February 7th to February 9th, 2019|location = Guangzhou Baiyun Mountain, Sacred Heart Cathedral, Chimelong Paradise | person = [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]], Wang Wuhong, Shi Hongmei, [[Wang Ziyu]], Guo Manyuan | producer = Guo Jingxing | duration = total duration 29:29 (average 10 minutes for each episode) | production time = February 8th ~ February 26th, 2019 | release time = February 2020 26th | release platform = YouTube, Odysee | watch URL = https://youtu.be/tOqVds5vARI | event = Take the ropeway, climb the Guangzhou Tower, play in the amusement park}} '''''Travel in Guangzhou 2019''''' (Chinese name: '''2019广州之旅''') is a Vlog produced by [[Jiaxing Films]] in 2019, filmed by Guo Jingxing, directed and produced by Wang Yonghong. The film is divided into a general episode and a diversity episode (3 episodes). The general process of the film is that [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] set off from Hengyang on February 7, 2019 and arrived in Guangzhou. They sat down at noon on February 8. The cable car arrived at the top of Baiyun Mountain, and then took a sightseeing car down the mountain. In the afternoon, we departed from the Sacred Heart Cathedral and arrived at the Canton Tower. The next day we came to Guangzhou Chimelong.
==Diversity Introduction== '''The following is taken from YouTube:''' ===Episode 1=== Wang Jiaming's family and Guo Jingxing set off from Hengyang on February 7, 2019, took a sleeper car for 6 hours along the way, and arrived in Guangzhou at 10 pm. The weather in Guangzhou was more than 20 degrees, while the weather in Hengyang was only 2 degrees Celsius. We felt very uncomfortable in the car, and then we arrived at the hotel next to the train station and stayed overnight. The next day (February 8) we started the Baiyun Mountain cableway tour.
Looking down from the Baiyun Mountain cableway, you can see overlapping peaks, criss-crossing streams, lush forests, singing birds and fragrant flowers.
===Episode 2=== Wang Jiaming's family and Guo Jingxing took the cableway to the top of Baiyun Mountain in Guangzhou at noon on February 8, 2019, then took a sightseeing bus down the mountain and took the subway to the Sacred Heart Cathedral.
Looking down from the top of Baiyun Mountain, you can see overlapping peaks and ridges, criss-cross streams, lush forests, singing birds and fragrant flowers.
The Sacred Heart Cathedral stands majestically, with carved beams and painted buildings, magnificent and beautiful.
===Episode 3=== Wang Jiaming's family and Guo Jingxing's father set off from the Sacred Heart Cathedral on the afternoon of February 8, 2019, arrived at the Canton Tower, and arrived at Guangzhou Chimelong the next day.

-Welcome to [[Jiaxing]] YouTube Channel Wiki, a comprehensive fan-made website dedicated to the YouTube channel "[https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos Jiaxing Radio Station]"! Our website features in-depth information, analysis, and discussion about the channel's diverse content, including life and travel vlogs, DIY videos, music covers and MVs, and [[Wang Zhaochu]] videos. -Here, you can find detailed descriptions of each video, as well as biographies and profiles of the people involved in them. Whether you're a longtime fan or a newcomer, our website has something for everyone. -We also encourage you to join our community of passionate fans and contribute your own comments, feedback, and ideas about the channel and its videos. Our goal is to create a welcoming and inclusive space for fans to connect and engage with each other. -Thank you for visiting Jiaxing YouTube Channel Wiki, and we hope you enjoy exploring our website!

{{ItemInfo|title1=Wang & Lei's Wedding News Broadcast|image1=[[File:佳兴卫视开台：王雷婚礼新闻联播]]|type=News|host=[[Wang Jiaming]] , [[Guo Jingxing]]|country/region={{China}}|language=Mandarin|episode=1|producer=[[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]]|shooting location=[[Qidong County]], Hunan Province|shooting date=February 2, 2015|production date=February 3-5, 2015}} '''''Wang & Lei's Wedding News''''' was broadcast on February 2, 2015. It is the opening video of [[Jiaxing Radio Station]], composed by [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]]. As the host and commentator, they interpreted and blessed [[Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan's Wedding]] on February 23, 2015.
==Press Release== '''Wang:'''The two officially met in January 2013, and they had been in love for two years until February 23, 2015.
'''Guo:'''They have experienced a tortuous but smooth love experience. (''Insert a video and speak at the same time'') Wang Ximing, Han nationality, male and female, human race, born in 1985, just turned 30 years and 2 months this year, graduated from a university of science and technology, with outstanding achievements, career He has made important achievements and made the third largest contribution to the development of Shenzhen's economy after Deng Xiaoping and Lei Yangjuan. Lei Yangjuan, Han nationality, was born in 1989 and graduated from a certain university. With a brilliant career and a smooth life, he made the second largest contribution to Shenzhen's economic development after Deng Xiaoping. The two are healthy and healthy. I wish the two of them will get married and grow old together. Once the sea was too difficult for water, except Wushan is not a cloud.
'''Wang:'''Obama pointed out in his congratulatory message that the issue of extremist organizations in the world is no longer important, what is important is the coming historical turning point. I wish them both a happy life and thank them for their great contributions to the world. In this regard, I declare a national holiday for three days. I hereby wish the two of you will love each other forever and be happy forever. May your love be deeper than the sea. And I wish you a happy wedding, happiness, passion forever, and grow old together.
'''Guo:'''Let this lingering poem ring the bell of happiness. May you two fall in love forever and grow old together!
'''Wang:'''The highest state of mutual love is relative insatiability. I wish the newlyweds love each other sincerely and meet forever! Congratulations on the wedding!
'''Guo:'''I wish you a happy marriage forever! Happy wedding, sweet honey!
'''Wang:'''You are a natural couple, a pair created by nature, and now you are married together. In the future, you need to be tolerant and take care of each other. Bless you!
'''Guo:'''May the two of you be affectionate and loving, with deep love, eternal love in this life, and love growing day by day!
'''Wang:'''A millennium will be bound by a thousand years, and a hundred years will be accompanied by a hundred years of sleep. He is born with a talent and a beautiful woman, and he only envies mandarin ducks but not immortals.
'''Guo:'''United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon pointed out that the love between you two has played an important role model for world peace. On behalf of the United Nations Security Council, the United Nations Women's Federation, the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations, the United Nations Development Programme, the United Nations Trade and Development Organization, the United Nations Children's Fund, the United Nations Economic Commission for Europe, the Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific, the Committee on the Peaceful Uses of Outer Space, United Nations Economic and Social Council, United Nations Trusteeship Council, International Court of Justice and United Nations Secretariat, World Trade Organization, World Tourism Organization, Organization of the Islamic Conference, League of Arab States, Organization of African Unity, North Atlantic Treaty Organization, Council of Europe, Organization of American States , International Union of Railways, Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries, European Community, SELA, International Red Cross, ISO wish you happiness.

page.title: Travel to Double-Dragon Canyon in Qiyang and Zhuangyuan Bridge in Guiyang in 2021

revision.text:
{{Stub}}{{VlogInfo|title1=One-day tour to Guiyang, Qiyang|image1=[[File:【旅游VLOG】祁阳双龙峡、归阳状元桥一日游]]|caption1=Travel vlog on YouTube. |time = Afternoon of February 14, 2021|location = Qiyang Shuanglong Gorge, Guiyang Zhuangyuan Bridge|person = [[Wang Jiaming]], [[Wang Ziyu]], Wang Yonghong, Wang Wuhong, [[Guo Jingxing]], Shi Hongmei| producer=[[Guo Jingxing]]|duration=9:06|soundtrack=Stealing Gong, Bazaar, Just Blue|production time=February 17, 2021|release time=February 17, 2021|publishing platform= YouTube, Youku, Odysee|watch URL=https://youtu.be/XrwPi9FG8Fo}} '''''Travel to Double-Dragon Canyon in Qiyang and Zhuangyuan Bridge in Guiyang in 2021''''' (Chinese name: '''2021年祁阳双龙峡、归阳状元桥一日游'''), Also known as '''Shuanglong Gorge One-Day Tour''', '''Guiyang One-Day Tour''', '''Qiyang Guiyang One-Day Tour''', it was published by [[Jiaxing Radio Station]] in 2021 A travel Vlog produced in February 2019, the film was filmed by [[Guo Jingxing]] and directed by Wang Yonghong. The video was filmed on February 14, 2021 and will be available on YouTube on February 17, 2021.
==Introduction to Tourist Attractions== [[Qidong]] Shuanglong Gorge is located between Hengqi Village, Guiyang Town, [[Qidong County]], Huaxi New Village, Meixi Town, Qiyang County, and Mubing Formation. The Longxi River flows into the Xiangjiang River from Huaxi Xincun to Muzhu Formation to Hengqi Village, Guiyang Town. This section of the canyon is long and winding, with beautiful scenery. It is a good outdoor place for leisure, adventure and adventure. Qidong Shuanglongxia Scenic Area is located at the junction of the southeast border of Qidong County and Qiyang, on the north bank of the middle reaches of the Xiangjiang River. It is 40 kilometers away from [[Qidong]] county seat, and 7 kilometers away from the urban area of Guiyang Town.
Zhuangyuan Bridge is located in Guiyang Town [[Qidong County]], Hengyang City. It is a 5-hole stone arch bridge with a length of 86.1 meters, a height of 9 meters, and a bridge deck width of 7.95 meters. . There are 20 long stone pillars on both sides, and 24 Tongxin bridge pavilions are built on the bridge deck, with a firm structure and a generous shape. In the middle of the bridge pavilion, there is a plaque of "Eternal Never Grinding". There is a pair of stone lions at the head of the bridge, which are mighty and majestic.
According to legend, when the stone bridge was built, there happened to be a champion of the new discipline passing by here. At that time, there were crowds of people at both ends of the bridge. From then on, he must recite poems and write poems, have feelings, and do something. What does the champion think?" The champion pondered for a while, and said happily: "Xiaosheng Xinzhong, and then he will be an official. He should serve the country and benefit the people. , not for profit. The elders don’t have to worry.” Everyone praised it as wonderful, so it was named Zhuangyuan Bridge. And erect a stone tablet at the south end of Zhuangyuan Bridge, engrave this couplet on the bridge plinth, and engrave the origin of Zhuangyuan Bridge on the stone tablet to remember its prosperity.
Zhuangyuan Bridge is also known as Xianren Bridge. There is another touching story about the origin of the name: it is said that there were exactly one hundred stonemasons working during the construction of the bridge, but only ninety-nine people were present at each meal. The "immortal" on the table helps. Therefore, the bridge was named "Xianren Bridge". On the stone slab of the bridge deck, we saw a depression that resembled footprints. The local people said that it was left by the immortals who helped them ascend to the sky after the completion of the bridge. Everyone called it "immortal feet". There is a "fairy's foot" on the stone pavement of the bridge deck, which is 28 cm long and 16 cm wide, which is about the size of a human foot. Visitors passing by here will always step on the "fairy's feet" with bare feet, so as to gain blessings and longevity[2]. The Zhuangyuan Bridge is all made of bluestones. Each square stone weighs several tons, and the lightest ones weigh several hundred kilograms. There is no adhesive material between the stones. Although they have experienced 130 years of wind and rain, they are still solid and firm. Under the conditions at that time, how these giant stones were transported to the building position and how they were built together is really unimaginable. No wonder later generations attribute the achievements of bridge construction to the help of immortals.
Zhuangyuan Bridge is a provincial key cultural relic protection unit and a famous scenic spot of Henggui Ancient Road in Hengyang City. It is located in the center of Guiyang Town and crosses the Baihe River into the Xiangjiang River. Zhuangyuan Bridge was first built in the Wanli period of the Ming Dynasty and rebuilt in the Tongzhi period of the Qing Dynasty (1862-1874). The bridge was submerged in floods. In the second year of Guangxu in the Qing Dynasty (1876), there was a squire named Yang Changshou who raised funds for the construction, and everyone responded with donations. In the eighth year of Guangxu in the Qing Dynasty, the bridge was completed, a bridge association was set up, and land was set up for long-term management. The Bridge Association once leased 24 bridge pavilions to small traders, set up shops on both sides of the bridge, and the rent collected was used to set up the local Yangsi Primary School. In the 33rd year of the Republic of China (1944), the Japanese invaders bombed the bridge twice with planes, but the bombs were all inaccurate. The bridge body was unharmed, but all 24 bridge pavilions were burned down, and the stone lions at the bridgehead were bombed until only the stone seat remained. In 1952, the people's government allocated funds for reconstruction. The bridge deck was first accessible to cars, but the rear bridge pavilion was demolished due to its low height, and 19 new bridge pavilions were built for cars to pass through. The bridge has been protected as a cultural relic and motor vehicles are prohibited from passing.

'''''Secret Monk Clothes''''' was created by '''''New Bing''''' on March 1, 2023 based on Internet search results this funny novel, the protagonists are '''[[Wang Ximing]]''', '''[[Lei Yangjuan]]''', '''[[Wang Zhaochu]]'''. This novel was generated under '''New Bing''''s ''More Creative'' Model.
== Novel Summary == This is a story that happened in a temple. [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] came to visit a master in the temple, but accidentally traveled half an hour into the future. They experienced many strange things in the next half hour, but finally heard the bell and returned to the present. During the period, they met [[Lei Yangjuan]], and together they explored how to solve the problem of [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] returning to the present. In the end, [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] returned to the present safely and returned the clothes to the master.
== Full Text of the Novel == [[Wang Ximing]] is a middle-aged man who loves photography. He often takes his son [[Wang Zhaochu]] to various places to take pictures. One day, they came to an ancient temple, and [[Wang Ximing]] wanted to take a photo of [[Wang Zhaochu]] wearing a monk's uniform, so he found an old monk in the temple and asked him to borrow one clothing.
The old monk agreed, but he said: "There is a rule about this dress. It can only be worn for half an hour, neither more nor less, otherwise there will be bad consequences."
[[Wang Ximing]] agreed, and then changed [[Wang Zhaochu]] into monk clothes. [[Wang Zhaochu]] was very cute in monk clothes, [[Wang Ximing]] was busy taking pictures of him, and it took more than half an hour before he knew it.
At this time, the old monk suddenly appeared in front of them, and said in horror, "Give me back the clothes quickly! Do you know what you have done?"
[[Wang Ximing]] asked puzzledly: "What did we do?"
The old monk said: "It's too late for you to wear my clothes! This dress is a relic left to me by my master. It has a secret: it can let the wearer go back to the past or the future for half an hour!"
"What?!" [[Wang Ximing]] exclaimed, "Then when are we now?"
The old monk said: "You are now half an hour in the future!"
"Then what should we do?" [[Wang Ximing]] asked.
The old monk said: "There is no way! You can only wait for half an hour before returning to the present! But you have to be careful, many things may happen in the next half hour!"
"Like what?" [[Wang Ximing]] asked.
The old monk said: "For example..." He pointed to the distance, "For example, [[Lei Yangjuan]] drove the car that drove over! Is she your wife? She just came back from the city, and she wants to Come to find you!"
"Ah?!" [[Wang Ximing]] turned pale with shock, "Then what shall we do? What will she think when she sees us dressed like this?"
The old monk said: "I don't know either! Hurry up and hide! Don't let her see it!"
[[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] hurried to the backyard of the temple and hid in a remote corner. They wait nervously for half an hour to pass, hoping to be back in the present.
[[Lei Yangjuan]] drove to the gate of the temple. When she got off the car, she saw the old monk and asked, "Master, may I ask where my husband [[Wang Ximing]] and son [[Wang Zhaochu]] are?" where?"
As soon as the old monk saw [[Lei Yangjuan]], he remembered what happened just now. He was startled and didn't know what to say. He could only say vaguely, "They...they are here."
"Where is it?" [[Lei Yangjuan]] asked, "Why didn't I see it?"
The old monk said: "They...they are over there." He pointed in a random direction.
[[Lei Yangjuan]] followed the gestures of the old monk, but only saw a group of young monks fighting. She felt very strange, so she asked, "Master, are you sure it's over there?"
The old monk said, "Yes, it's over there."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "But I only see a group of young monks."
The old monk said, "Oh... that... actually..."
"Actually what?" [[Lei Yangjuan]] asked.
The old monk said: "Actually... your husband and son are two of the young monks!"
"What?!" [[Lei Yangjuan]] exclaimed, "What are you kidding?!"
The old monk said: "I'm not kidding! It's true! Your husband and son became little monks after wearing my clothes! This dress has magic power! It can take the wearer back to the past or half a year in the future Hour!"
"You are talking nonsense!" [[Lei Yangjuan]] said incredulously, "How could such a thing happen? Return my husband and son to me!"
The old monk said: "I want to return it to you too! But not now! They have to wait for half an hour before they can be restored! Otherwise, there will be bigger troubles!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Bigger trouble? What bigger trouble?"
The old monk said: "Don't you know? This dress is a relic left to me by my master. It has a secret: it can allow the wearer to go back to the past or the future for half an hour, but if the wearer is within half an hour If you don’t change your clothes, you will stay in that time and space forever!”
"Ah?!" [[Lei Yangjuan]] became even more frightened, "Then why did you lend them such dangerous clothes?"
The old monk said: "I didn't expect them to be so careless! I just wanted them to experience the life of a monk, but I didn't expect them to spend more than half an hour!"
"Then what should we do now?" [[Lei Yangjuan]] asked.
The old monk said: "Now we can only pray that they can change their clothes in time, otherwise there will be no salvation!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "But how do they know the time? Do they have a watch?"
The old monk said: "No, here are all ancient things, where is there a watch?"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Then can you remind them?"
The old monk said: "Not really, here are all soundproof walls, where can sound be transmitted?"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Then can't you go to them?"
The old monk said: "It's not okay, this is a forbidden area, outsiders can't enter!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Then what is your use?"
The old monk said: "I... I don't know! I'm just an old monk, what can I do?"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "You can't just give up like this! You have to find a way!"
The old monk said, "Okay, okay, let me think about it..."
Just then, they heard a bell. When the old monk heard it, he was overjoyed and said, "Great! Great! It's the half-hour bell! They should be back!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] also breathed a sigh of relief, she said: "Really? Really? Take me to see it!"
The old monk said: "Okay, okay, come with me!" He took [[Lei Yangjuan]]'s hand and walked quickly to the backyard.
[[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] also heard the bell, they felt dizzy for a while, and then returned to their original state. They are pleasantly surprised to find themselves back in the present.
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "It's great! It's great! We're finally back!"
[[Wang Zhaochu]] said: "Father, where did we go just now?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "We went to the next half hour just now! Do you know that there are many strange things in the next half hour!"
[[Wang Zhaochu]] said: "For example, what?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "For example..." He suddenly remembered what happened in the next half hour just now, "For example...it's nothing, it's nothing. Return the clothes to that master."
[[Wang Zhaochu]] said: "Okay."
[[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]] walked up to the old monk and returned the clothes to him. The old monk was also very happy to see that they were safe and sound.
The old monk said: "You are back! Great! Great!"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "Master, thank you for lending us this dress, allowing us to experience a different trip."
The old monk said, "You're welcome, you're welcome. Where did you go after you put on this dress?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "We went to the future for half an hour."
The old monk said, "Oh? Is there anything special in the next half hour?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "Yes, yes. In the next half hour..." He remembered what happened in the next half hour just now, "The next half hour...in fact, there is nothing special La."
The old monk said, "Really? That's a pity."
At this moment, [[Lei Yangjuan]] followed the old monk to the backyard. As soon as she saw [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Wang Zhaochu]], she ran over excitedly and hugged them.
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Honey! Baby! You are finally back! I am so worried about you!"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "Honey, I'm sorry for making you worry. We're fine."
[[Wang Zhaochu]] said: "Mom, we just went to a very magical place."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] asked: "Where?"
[[Wang Zhaochu]] said: "We went..." He looked at his father, "We went...to the temple."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "In the temple? Aren't you always in the temple?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "Yes, yes. We are in the temple."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Then where did you go in the temple?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "We went..." He looked at the old monk, "We went... to the master's room."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Master's room? Is there anything interesting about that?"
[[Wang Ximing]] said: "Yes, yes. In the master's room..." He remembered what happened in the master's room just now, "There is actually nothing interesting in the master's room."
[[Lei Yangjuan]] said: "Really? That's really boring."
The old monk felt very uncomfortable when he heard these words. He felt wronged. He wanted to explain, but he was afraid of revealing the secret.
The old monk said: "Uh...Actually...in my room..."
Just then they heard another chime. When the old monk heard it, he was shocked and said: "It's bad! It's bad! It's the hour bell! I forgot to change my clothes!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] asked: "Change clothes? What change clothes?"
The old monk said: "I am wearing this dress too! It can let me go back to the past or the future for an hour! I just went back to the past for an hour and chatted with my master! I wanted to come back and change clothes, but I forgot the time! It's over an hour now! I'm going to stay in the past hour forever!"
[[Lei Yangjuan]] asked: "What? You are also wearing this dress? It can take you back to the past or the future for an hour? You just went back to the past for an hour to chat with your master?"

'''''(Here is the sample text of how to edit in this fandom website)'''''
'''Guo Jingxing''' (Chinese: 郭竞兴; pinyin: Guō Jìngxīng; born September 1999) is a Chinese radio host, YouTube uploader and operator. He is one of the co-founders of [[Jiaxing Radio Station]], a popular online radio station that broadcasts music, news, entertainment and culture programs.
== Biography == Guo was born in Hengyang, Hunan province, China. He showed an interest in radio broadcasting since he was young. He passed the independent enrollment exam and entered Hengyang No. 8 Middle School in March 2013. He then passed the college entrance exam and enrolled in Huazhong University of Science and Technology in 2016.
In 2017, he met Liu Jiaxing, a fellow student who shared his passion for radio broadcasting. They decided to start their own online radio station with their own equipment and software. They named it Jiaxing Radio Station after their surnames (Jia from Liu Jiaxing and Xing from Guo Jingxing). They invited some other students to join them as hosts, producers and editors.
Jiaxing Radio Station soon gained popularity among netizens for its diverse and high-quality content. It covers topics such as music, news, entertainment, culture, education, sports and more. It also features interviews with celebrities, experts and ordinary people who have interesting stories to share.
Guo is mainly responsible for uploading and operating the YouTube channel of Jiaxing Radio Station. He also hosts some programs such as "Music Time with Guo Jingxing" and "Guo Jingxing's Movie Reviews". He has a cheerful personality and a good sense of humor. He often interacts with fans on social media platforms such as Weibo, WeChat and Instagram.
Guo has won several awards for his work as a radio host and YouTube uploader. In 2018, he won the Best Newcomer Award at the China Internet Radio Awards. In 2019, he won the Best Host Award at the same event. In 2020, he was nominated for the Best YouTube Channel Award at the China Internet Video Awards.
== External links == * [https://www.youtube.com/@jiaxingvideos Jiaxing Radio Station YouTube channel] * [https://weibo.com/u/1234567890 Guo Jingxing's Weibo account] * [https://www.instagram.com/gjx_1998/ Guo Jingxing's Instagram account]

[[zh:王午宏]]{{Celebrity | image = 王午宏.jpg | caption = | nationality = {{cn}} |chinese_name=王午宏|english_name=Wang Wuhong|gender=Male|language=Chinese([[Qidong]] Dialect)|minzu=Han|birthplace=[[Qidong County]], Hengyang City, Hunan Province|birthday={{Birthdate|1965-06-04}}|hometown=Qidong, Hengyang|political status=CCP member}}
'''Wang Wuhong'''(Chinese name: '''王午宏''', born on {{Birthdate|1965-06-04}}) is the father of [[Wang Ximing]] and the grandfather of [[Wang Zhaochu]]. Wang Wuhong's name was derived from his birthdate coinciding with the [[Wikipedia:Dragon Boat Festival|''Dragon Boat Festival'']], also known as ''Duanwu Festival'', which falls on the fifth day of the fifth lunar month in the Chinese calendar. He currently works at '''River Chief Office in People's Government of Taihetang Town, [[Qidong County]]''', serving as the leader of the water conservancy group of Taihetang Town Agricultural Comprehensive Service Center.[[:File:祁东县防汛抗旱指挥部文件：关于明确我县防汛抗旱责任人的通知.pdf|Qidong County Flood Control and Drought Relief Headquarters Document: Notice on Clarifying the Person Responsible for Flood Control and Drought Relief in Our County]] == Experience == In February 2015, participated in the wedding of [[Wang Ximing]] and [[Lei Yangjuan]], and gave a speech as Wang Ximing's father.[[Wang Ximing and Lei Yangjuan's wedding]], https://youtu.be/0wR4AtFiyG0 In 2022, Wang Wuhong was recognized for his outstanding personal achievements in his work at the River Chief Office of Taihetang Town. He has contributed significantly to the implementation of the river chief system, especially in securing funding from the County Agriculture Development Bureau to build a floodgate to address the problem of high water resistance caused by the dam in Luokou Township and the difficult problem of the collapsed river embankment in Shuangpai Village, Caojiaci. From February 2023, he will serve as a correspondent of the Rong Media Center in Qidong County, mainly responsible for reporting on the cleaning of the river, dredging and other work in Taihetang Town, and publicizing the effectiveness, experience, and implementation of the river chief system.太和堂镇开展河道垃圾清零专项行动，祁东新闻网，http://www.qdxw.com.cn/content/646746/91/12301232.html ==References== [[Category:Biography]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Wang Zhaochu]] [[Category:People]] [[Category:NoCopy]] [[Category:Wang Wuhong]] {{Navbox_Total}} {{PersonalInfoProtection}}

'''Warning:'''
You are not currently logged in. You will still be able to browse [[Jiaxing|Jiaxing Encyclopedia]], but you will be unable to edit without an account. Please go [[Special:CreateAccount|here]] to create a Fandom account.

Hello everyone,
I would like to introduce my bot user account, JiaxingBot, on this Fandom. This bot is designed to perform automated edits on pages to help with maintenance tasks and ensure consistency across the wiki.
JiaxingBot is powered by AutoWikiBrowser (AWB), a tool that allows for efficient and effective batch editing on wikis. As an AWB bot, JiaxingBot will only make edits that are approved by me, its operator, and are in compliance with the Fandom's guidelines and policies.
JiaxingBot is currently programmed to perform the following tasks:
* Modify errors * Batch update categories * Batch modify vocabulary links
If you have any questions or concerns regarding JiaxingBot's activities, please feel free to contact me through my user talk page. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation in keeping this Fandom organized and up-to-date.
Best regards,
Jiaxing Wikipedia
[[zh:user:JiaxingBot]]

'''''Wife, forgive me!''''' is an apology letter written by [[Wang Ximing]] to his wife [[Lei Yangjuan]] on August 9, 2015. The letter expresses [[Wang Ximing]]'s pain and remorse for his mistakes by expressing his love for his wife and sincere apology. The content of this letter of apology expresses [[Wang Ximing]]'s true inner feelings, and also shows how much he cherishes and values family and marriage.
== full text == [[File:Apologize to Lei Yangjuan 2015.jpg|thumbnail|The apology letter. |border|alt=Apologize]]The following is the full text of the apology letter: <syntaxhighlight lang="abap"> Wife,
You must forgive me!
Wife's heart is coming back!
my love is always there
never left
Please forgive me again!
beg forgiveness
Breaking down in tears:
vomiting blood
lying on the ground...
sorry...
20150809
02:00 </syntaxhighlight>
[[zh:媳妇，请原谅我！]] [[Category:Wang Ximing]] [[Category:Lei Yangjuan]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: Wang and Guo's Beijing Travel Plan in 2017

revision.text:
'''''Wang & Guo Beijing Travel Plan''''' is a Beijing travel plan made by [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] on June 23, 2017. The plan covers most of the city's famous scenic spots and museums, including the Forbidden City, the Summer Palace, Tiananmen Square, the Temple of Heaven Park, the National Center for the Performing Arts and Nanluoguxiang. Prices and opening hours of each attraction are also listed. Travel time is 7–10 days. ==Plan summary== This paper introduces three kinds of sightseeing routes in Beijing with different plans. Plan one suggests tourists start at Tiananmen Square and travel west along Chang 'an Avenue, passing scenic spots such as the Great Hall of the People, CCTV and the Summer Palace. The second proposal is to start from Beijing West Railway Station and pass several museums, parks, universities, historical sites and cultural attractions, including the Old Summer Palace, the Summer Palace, Tiananmen Square and the Forbidden City. Plan 3 suggests arriving at Nanyuan Airport first, and then starting from Beijing West Railway Station. The tour route is the same as Plan 2. The attractions include the Museum of Natural History, Peking University, the Temple of Heaven Park, the Ming Tombs and the Badaling Great Wall.
Before departure, you need to prepare necessary items, such as mobile phone, ID card, power bank, etc. In downtown Beijing, you can choose ofo shared bikes or subways and buses to travel to tourist attractions. ==Specific itinerary== On the schedule, the first day can be spent in Lianhua Chi Park, the Capital Museum, the China Century Monument and Yuyuantan Park, followed by visits to the CCTV Tower and the Beijing Planetarium.
The next day itinerary includes: visit Beijing Zoo in the morning, then go to Beijing Exhibition Hall to take photos and have a meal, in the afternoon start to Beijing North Railway Station to take photos, then go to Xueyuan Road to visit the front of various schools to take photos, and finally take a walk in Tsinghua University and find a hotel to rest. The universities visited included Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications, China University of Political Science and Law, Beijing Film Academy, Beijing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, Peking University Health Science Center, China University of Geosciences, Beijing University of Science and Technology, and China University of Mining and Technology.
On the morning of the third day, start from the hotel around Tsinghua University and tour Tsinghua University and Peking University by bike. In Tsinghua University, visit the lotus pond, water and wood Tsinghua, I-Zi Hall, the Second School Gate, Tsinghua School and the auditorium. Among them, there are Zhu Ziqing statue, Wen Yiduo statue, Ziqing Pavilion and Wen Pavilion in Shuimu Tsinghua University, and Han Pavilion in recent Spring Garden (in memory of Wu Han). At Peking University, visit the Old School Gate, Weiming Lake, Lake Center Island, Marble Boat, Peking University Red Tower, Bell Pavilion and bronze statue of CAI Yuanpei. It is recommended to buy a map of Tsinghua.
In the afternoon of the third day, we visited the Summer Palace and the Old Summer Palace. It takes a lot of time to visit both sites, so it's important to have plenty of food and water. In the evening, I went to the Olympic Park and visited the Bird's Nest and the Water Cube.
On the morning of Day 4, after visiting the Olympic Park, visit Beihai Park, Jingshan Park, Shichahai Park and the surrounding old hutongs. Eat at Nan Luogu Lane in the evening and then return to the hotel. It is worth mentioning that these parks and attractions have different ticket prices, which requires planning in advance.
In the morning to the Tiananmen Rostrum, and then into the palace browse for more than two hours, the main route for the Meridian Gate, Taihe Gate, Hongyi Pavilion, Hall of Supreme Harmony, Hall of harmony, Hall of preserving harmony, dry Qing Gate, dry Qing Palace, Temple of Communication, Palace of Earthly Tranquility and the imperial garden. Then back to Tiananmen Square, visit the Monument to the People's Heroes, the Great Hall of the People, the National Center for the Performing Arts and the National Museum of China.
In the afternoon, we will go to CCTV, pass Deyunshe, and continue to visit the Temple of Heaven. The tour time is 2 hours. Note that this one day tour may need to be split into two days, the tour time depends on the situation.
The sixth (or seventh) day includes a visit to the Ming Tombs and the Badaling Great Wall. From the Temple of Heaven in the morning, you need to make several transfers to reach your destination. Admission to the Ming Tombs is 135 yuan in high season and 100 yuan in low season, half price for students, and the tour lasts for two hours. After lunch, head to the Badaling Great Wall. Admission is 45 yuan for adults and 22.5 yuan for students. After spending 3–4 hours on the Great Wall, return to Beijing West Railway Station in the afternoon. ==References== [[:File:北京旅行计划.pdf|Beijing Travel Plan.pdf]] [[zh:王郭北京旅行计划(2017)]] {{Navbox_Total}}
