page.title: Guo Jianchen and Zhou Qian's Wedding

revision.text:
<div class="nocopy">[[zh:郭建辰和周倩的婚礼]] '''Guo Jianchen and Zhou Qian's Wedding''' was held at the West Lake of [[Wikipedia:Hengyang|Hengyang City]], [[Wikipedia:Hunan Province|Hunan Province]] at noon on February 12, 2017. This grand wedding was hosted by the famous host '''Tang Fengguo''' from the high-end host team of Siyantang. In addition, Aijia Wedding Company is responsible for undertaking the entire wedding, and all employees of the company participate in the preparation and execution.
== Wedding Lines == '''Tang Guo (Tang Fengguo):'''Dear guests, ladies and gentlemen, good noon, everyone, welcome to the West Lake Hotel, this is the scene of love created by Ai Jia Wedding for you, I am from Tang Guo, the host of Siyantang's high-end hosting team. Sincerely thank you for coming, and sincerely thank you for spending the next time with us, this happy, peaceful and happy noon. It is said that the first one who compares a beauty to a flower is a genius; the second one who compares a beauty to a flower is a mediocrity; the third one who compares a beauty to a flower is a fool. But today's groom, he did something different from ordinary people. How would he describe his woman? He said that his woman is not a flower, but a tree. Because only after becoming a tree, can he return to his nest frequently like a bird. He said that a woman is the sea, and only such a vast sea can accommodate his day and night sailing. He also said that women are his world, and he said that only in his world can he enjoy his happiness. Friends, this happiness, for this boy, he just pursued for a long time. He counted the days, he said, one day, one day, one day after another, for him, the road is eternal and endless, but the time is still vivid in his eyes. All his past attachments, his love, all his love, all his joy and happiness, he held in his hands all the way. Today is the happiest moment in his life, and he wants to share it with everyone in such a venue. Come on, friends, let us applaud, today's groom!
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Good evening everyone! Good afternoon, I'm so nervous.
'''Tang Guo:'''Tell me, is he nervous. In fact, he is happy inside. The reason why he was nervous at this time was because, along the way, there was no applause from everyone.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Oh, thank you, thank you.
'''Tang Guo:'''This is a very simple and honest boy. Do you know why he said night?
'''Audience:'''The bridal chamber!
'''Tang Guo:'''Yes, he just wants a bridal chamber. Among the great pleasures in this life is the wedding night in the bridal chamber. But you, don't worry, I know, you have accumulated a lot of days and love during this journey, and I also believe that you still have a lot of words in your heart, you have to say it here, In fact, I really want to ask you, what is your mood at this moment?
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Excited, excited.
'''Tang Guo:'''Excited, I can see that we have also heard your excitement.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Still nervous.
'''Tang Guo:'''Still nervous. Do you know what it means to start from this moment?
'''Guo Jianchen:'''It means that I will change from a sunny boy to a simple and steady...
'''Tang Guo:'''Man.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Yes.
'''Tang Guo:'''From a boy to a man, in fact, he only needs one step to leap. But during this leap, I would like to ask you more, what is more about you after becoming a man?
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Well, responsibility and responsibility.
'''Tang Guo:'''There are more responsibilities and responsibilities, let us give him applause. This is a responsible boy. but you know what? As you told me, you said, your woman is your tree. From now on, you will be a little bird flying around the tree. No matter how you fly, you have to return to your nest at night, and you have to perch on the tree. I really want to ask you, your woman, how do you call him affectionately?
'''Guo Jianchen:''' (Hengyang dialect) Zhou Qian, I love you! Zhou Qian, I miss you!
'''Tang Guo:'''This is equivalent to that Shaanxi dialect, An Hong, ah. If we have something to say, let’s talk about this sentence in it. What I just said is very authentic and authentic. Of course, at this moment, the only thing he is looking forward to is that his most beautiful woman will appear in front of his eyes. Come let us applaud the bride.
'''Tang Guo:'''She is so beautiful, she should be the most beautiful woman in your heart.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Yes.
'''Tang Guo:'''No matter how you compare him, you can't use the most beautiful adjective to explain it. So, stop talking, just like this, go to your bride.
'''Tang Guo:'''Kneel down. propose to her!
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Honey, marry me.
'''Tang Guo:'''Marry you, this is a responsible and responsible boy. This boy, he must be stalwart, he can shoulder the responsibility of the family. Come on, let's listen to what my father-in-law has to say. Eh, don't get up. Listen to the advice of your father-in-law.
'''Zhou Qian's father:'''Son-in-law, I officially hand over my daughter to you today, I wish you a loving husband and wife, and grow old together. My daughter, because I'm usually a bit pampered, I still want you, Guo Jianchen's son-in-law, to bear with you and take care of you.
'''Tang Guo:'''Can you do it? Jianchen.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''I will definitely be able to, please believe me, father-in-law.
'''Tang Guo:'''Trust him, this man is worth protecting. Come, bride, take the flowers, and lift him up! Zhou Qian, the man next to you is the man who loves you the most, give him an affectionate hug, let's hug your father. For more than 20 years, he has cared for you, cared for you, and made you grow up. Thank you, Dad, let us applaud and invite father-in-law, please take a seat! At this moment, Jianchen and our Zhou Qian are standing side by side. At this moment, they are deeply attached to each other. They are shoulder to shoulder, and they are heart to heart. They are ready at this moment, and they want to move towards their love and happiness. Applause is welcome, thank you for walking together all the way. Thank you all for witnessing today. Thank you, everyone, for all your encouragement, care, and help. I believe that Jianchen and Zhou Qian must be here to give everyone an affectionate bow, thank you everyone. Jianchen, at this very moment, I would like to invite you to face your bride, look at your bride with your wicked eyes, and remember to look at your bride with tenderness. No matter what method you take at this moment, sneaking glances is fine. You have to stare into her eyes, these are a pair of eyes you are so familiar with, how many times, they appear in your nightmares in your dreams; how many times, these eyes are looking forward to your return home; how many times, These eyes are pouring out her love to you. At this moment, looking into these eyes, what words do you have to express to her?
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Well, I want to say, from our acquaintance, acquaintance, and meeting in Shenzhen to our meeting in Qidong Sanhetang, today we finally moved to the most sacred stage of marriage. I hope you can Let me take care of you for a lifetime. Although it was just a love story, today, in front of so many relatives and friends, I want to ask you again, I hope you can allow me to take care of you in your future, for a lifetime, oh no, I should take care of you for a lifetime .
'''Tang Guo:'''You really, just said your love words like this. But no matter how many love words you say, whether you know it or not, they can't be regarded as those three words.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''I love you!
'''Tang Guo:'''Qianqian, I know, for so many years, you have spent your whole life with him, and you made such a solemn vow with him. You once had to tell him that you were willing to accompany him through the journey ahead. At this moment, you are also looking at his eyes. Here, what is reflected in those eyes, I believe you can understand it better. At this moment, Qianqian, I want to ask you, do you love him?
'''Zhou Qian:'''Love.
'''Tang Guo:'''How much love?
'''Zhou Qian:'''I love it very much, love it very much, love it very much.
'''Tang Guo:'''If you were given a deadline, how long would you like to love?
'''Zhou Qian:'''Forever.
'''Tang Guo:'''Would you like to change his current shape into a doubled one?
'''Zhou Qian:'''I am willing.
'''Tang Guo:'''Or you can love him in the shape of a little bird?
'''Zhou Qian:'''I am willing too.
'''Tang Guo:'''Are you really willing?
'''Zhou Qian:'''Yes.
'''Tang Guo:'''Are you really willing to marry him today?
'''Zhou Qian:'''I am willing to marry him today.
'''Tang Guo:'''Then, please say those three words too.
'''Zhou Qian:'''I love you. I……
'''Tang Guo:'''Applause, please invite our happy angel to present a token of love. Come, Jianchen, Qianqian, open this happy ring, pick it up, put it on your chest, and make a wish for each other, for your happiness. Come and open your eyes, Jianchen, and put on your lifelong care and all your love for your wife. Qianqian, also for your husband, put on your lifelong guard, and your love from heart to heart.
'''Tang Guo:'''What are you waiting for, hug him and kiss him. Let's give a round of applause! Let our applause be longer, how long is the applause, how long is their love!
'''Tang Guo:'''OK, everyone thinks that these happy people will be happy forever from today, so let's give them another applause of blessings. Next, let us applaud the groom's uncle, Mr. She Zhongxiang, the former chief judge of the Second Criminal Division of the Intermediate People's Court, who came to the stage to witness the marriage of the two couples.
'''She Zhongxiang:'''Ladies and gentlemen, ladies and gentlemen, friends, hello, today is a happy day for Mr. Guo Jianchen and Ms. Zhou Qian. First of all, on behalf of all the guests, I wish the bride and groom a happy wedding and all the best.
I am entrusted by the bride and groom to be their witnesses. I am extremely honored and delighted. The bride and groom can get to know each other and love each other. Today they finally walk into the wedding hall hand in hand and become husband and wife. Let us express our warmest congratulations to the bride and groom .
Now, I declare that the relationship between Mr. Guo Jianchen and Ms. Zhou Qian is sincere. They are fully prepared psychologically and materially for creating the future together. Their marriage is reasonable and the procedures are legal and effective. Qingshan testifies for you, Xiushui testifies for you, and the relatives and friends present here testify for you. I hope that in the days to come, you will respect and love each other, understand and help each other, and rely on each other to move towards a bright tomorrow. So far, on these beautiful days, you must not forget your parents who have given you infinite care, and you must turn your gratitude to your parents into practical actions. Honor and serve both parents, and smile every day.
Let's pray, let's bless, let's raise the wine glasses in our hands, and wish this couple a happy newlywed, forever united, grow old together, and create a better future together, thank you.
'''Tang Guo:'''Thank you Shelao, ah, thank you. Yes, to create a better tomorrow together, hold happiness in our hands, when we enjoy happiness, we must know the source of happiness. That source is coming to you, they are your parents, let us applaud.
'''Tang Guo:'''Let us once again give applause to the four old people on this stage. I know, Jianchen and Qianqian, they have come all the way, and they are inseparable from your hard work. At this moment, there must be warmth and touch in your hearts, and all the yearning for happiness. At the same time, there are also good wishes for them. You must know that the young couple are getting married today, and they are actually full of deep gratitude to you. Along the way, they are vividly remembered, it is what you have given them, love, care, and selfless dedication. I believe that Jianchen and Qianqian will express their gratitude in their own way. Come here, invite Jianchen to bring your wife to the front of your father-in-law and mother-in-law.
'''Tang Guo:'''Qianqian, bring tea to your husband, at this time, Jianchen, shout loudly.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Dad, drink tea, please drink tea.
'''Tang Guo:'''This tea is very sweet. This is a thank you tea from your son-in-law. From today onwards, you have an extra son. Qianqian, bring tea to your husband, tea to mother.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Mom, please drink tea.
'''Zhou Qian's mother:'''Thank you.
'''Tang Guo:'''Jianchen called his mother just now, and it was very gentle. The reason why I called my mother so softly is because there is a saying. Asking the mother-in-law to watch the son-in-law, it becomes more and more interesting the more you watch, so the son-in-law calls his mother very gently. Look, mom, what are you going to pass to your son-in-law? It's a red envelope and a big gift box. I don't know what's inside this gift box. Do you want to open it on the spot? reserve.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Thank you, thank you father-in-law. Thank you mom.
'''Tang Guo:'''Thank you, mom, yes.
'''Guo Jianchen:'''Thank you, Dad.
'''Tang Guo:'''Thank you mom, it's okay, let's give mom an affectionate hug. Eh, ok, thank you. Come, once again, Jianchen, bring your wife to your parents. We invite Jianchen to bring tea to your wife.
'''Zhou Qian:'''Mom, drink tea.
'''Tang Guo:'''Drink tea, this is filial tea for daughter-in-law, starting today, you have another daughter. Hey, Jianchen, serve tea again, tea to papa (both hands). Dad, please drink tea, we really want to ask, Jianchen's father, is this tea good?
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''Delicious.
'''Tang Guo:'''It's delicious, it's delicious, no wonder you have a smile on your face when you rarely smile. You have to know, is this daughter-in-law beautiful?
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''Beautiful.
'''Tang Guo:'''You didn't take the initiative when your wife hugged you just now, but now you take the initiative to hug her, okay? Everyone said, okay! The applause was not warm enough. Get ready, hold tight, keep your hands together.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''It's fine, it's fine.
'''Tang Guo:'''Is it okay? From now on, she is your daughter.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''That's right.
'''Tang Guo:'''I want to be hugged like a daughter, remember? Haha, it’s good to send your heart, thank you, I know, the young couple is happy here today, because mom and dad are here, we invite Jianchen to take your wife to stand between mom and dad, and Mom and Dad took a group photo together and left this happy moment. Applause stay! This is a family that loves each other, this is a big happy family, let us once again give the applause a little more fiercely, and sincerely wish them happiness and success in everything, thank you. Well, in fact, I know that today's father-in-law said a few words when he told his son-in-law earlier, they were very good. I believe that you may have more to say on this stage today, right? ? Come on, let's listen to my father-in-law, what else do you want to say to the big guy.
'''Zhou Qian's father:'''Respected leader, respected relatives and friends, today, it is my daughter, um, cough, it is my daughter, don't be nervous, Zhou Qian, it is my son-in-law, Guo Jianchen, daughter Zhou Qian, Wedding, birthday, wedding day, as me, father, thank you all, thank you all for coming, I wish him, I wish them both, um... grow old forever, thank you all.
'''Tang Guo:'''This daughter is getting married, why are you more nervous than your daughter? There is another one here, and another one. He may be more nervous than you, believe it or not. He is more excited than you, that is, Jianchen's father. Let's listen to what Jianchen's father, the happiest man in this world at this moment, has to say.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''Dear guests, friends and relatives, good afternoon, thank you for winning the cup, for coming to my son and daughter-in-law's wedding, please allow me to represent my family and thank you sincerely.
'''Tang Guo:'''Let me tell you. He is more nervous than you.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''No, no.
'''Tang Guo:'''No.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''I get nervous when I see you.
'''Tang Guo:'''You saw me nervous.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''This is a relative or friend, you are very famous for pushing it.
'''Tang Guo:'''Oh, thank you, thank you.
'''Guo Xiaoning:'''When my in-laws handed over their daughter to my son just now, in just a few minutes, he has accumulated the hardships of more than 20 years. I want to thank my in-laws and his family, Confidence to my son, and trust in my family. Here, I thank our in-laws and his family. This day is really a happy marriage day, which we have been looking forward to for a long time. I really don't have much to say. I'm just saying two things:
The first one, you two, please remember this day, remember this friend, best wishes to you, and fulfill the promise you said on stage, right?
Second, you must have your own ideals, and long-distance voyages, and you must have a goal. There is nothing else, this, here, I am here, thank you, I wish you all good health and all the best, thank you.
'''Tang Guo:'''That's really good. In fact, Mr. Gao Xiaosong actually said a very classic sentence, that is, life is not only about the present, but also poetry and the distant fields. In fact, your father has made this very clear just now. I hope you will remember that the future is your eternal waiting and hope, your eternal pursuit, and the goal of your lifelong struggle. Thank you mom and dad for your love. Thank you for caring for them as always, let us once again give the applause to parents. Then we also invite parents to sit down at the same time.
'''Tang Guo:'''Come on, with a bright future and a happy vision, pour this champagne of happiness into your love, every happy touch comes from mutual love, every happy Waiting comes from the infinite love in your heart. May you pour champagne like pouring love, sincerely wish you, love forever, thank you. Come on, life is like wine, you need to taste it carefully, life is all you have. Live well, manage well, keep family and love in your heart. Come on, move forward, come among the big guys, friends, come, let us all stand up. Let us fill up the wine, fill up the love, fill up the blessings, fill up all the happiness, and let us drink this happy wine together with the couple. Cheers, friends! Thank you, friends please sit down.
'''Tang Guo:'''At such a happy moment today, when happiness is in their hands, I believe that they must have a longer-term savings in their hearts, that is, to continue to love, and to keep love forever . At this moment, touched by happiness, they really want to share it with the big guys, come, let us all light up the lights! At the same time, we also invite all handsome men and beauties to come to our stage. Those who are on the road of pursuing happiness, please come to our stage as soon as possible. Come, ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, hey, can you, this, the wolf in front, can you be a little more gentleman, let the flower stand in the front, the wolf stand in the back, the wolf Stand back. oops! It started before it was called. It's time to start, then you have no chance, she lost the flower, that's like this, you, you stand here, okay, thank you for your participation. You just match the picture, you know? At this time, please remember that she will send you her blessings.
'''Jiajia:'''Happy newlyweds, and then, grow old together.
'''Tang Guo:'''There is one more sentence to send.
'''Jia Jia:'''Hundred sons and thousands of grandchildren.
'''Tang Guo:'''Give birth to a precious son early.
'''Jiajia:'''Yes, a hundred sons and thousands of grandchildren.
'''Tang Guo:'''How much is born?
'''Jia Jia:'''Hundred sons and thousands of grandchildren.
'''Tang Guo:'''Hundred sons and grandchildren, will it, will it affect family planning?

Okay, There's a boy over there raising his hand, that boy, that boy at that table over there, tell him to stand up. where? page.title: Zuo Jun and Wang Ting's Wedding

revision.text:
<div class="nocopy">[[zh:左军和王婷的婚礼]] Zuo Jun and Wang Ting held their wedding at [[Qidong]] Yizhou Hotel on August 25, 2019. The organizers of this wedding are [[Qidong]] Zhimei Wedding and [[Qidong]] Yizhou Hotel, and the film and television production is in charge of CC Yinghua Wedding. The entire wedding host team is from the Hunan Forerunner host team, and the wedding host is Meng Fei.
The two have known each other and fell in love for nearly two years. From the initial heartbeat to the final firm choice, being with each other has become their longest confession of love. In daily life, Zuo Jun gives people the impression of being shy and restrained. Therefore, this wedding can be said to be the most romantic moment he planned for Wang Ting, and it also met the bride's innermost expectations.
== Wedding Lines == '''Meng Fei:''' Ladies and gentlemen, hello everyone, the wedding has begun. At this time, I think the first thing all guests should do is first, keep quiet, yes, then quietly, give Zuo Jun and Wang Ting applaud, thank you, thank you, first of all, let me introduce myself, I am Zuo Jun and Wang Ting's wedding host, and also your friend, my name is Meng Fei, I am very happy to be with all the guests today , to witness their warm and grand wedding. Of course, at this time, I saw smiles on the faces of all the guests. Yes, we are all looking forward to some wonderful things that will happen next.
In fact, before going on stage, I thought for a long time about how I should share this simple, pure, and beautiful love with all the guests, because not every love will have a story of ups and downs, Maybe, we are often living a repetitive life, the bride and groom, they have been together for nearly two years, yes, from shy heartbeat, to calm determination, along the way, the biggest answer they get is companionship , is the longest confession of love. In life, Zuo Jun is a little bit shy, so we can also imagine that he almost doesn't do too romantic things. Almost the bride is with him, so long During the time, the most romantic thing I have done must be today's wedding.
Yes, this is also this girl, with all the expectations in her heart. Today, I saw that so many guests gathered together, it was like a grand party. Of course, we will also bring a A beautiful mood, to participate, to integrate into, this wedding, then next, the leading actor of this wedding should be invited, I hope that when he comes out, he will not come out with me All the same, there is no sound, okay, dear friends, all the applause, please invite the groom Zuojun.
'''Meng Fei:'''I found that you are not nervous at all, you just took your time and walked onto the stage step by step. In fact, before Zuo Jun came up, I asked him, I asked him, are you nervous? He answered me calmly, not nervous, as if he had made strong preparations before.
'''Meng Fei:'''Uh, came to the stage, did you bow to everyone just now?
'''Meng Fei:'''I bowed, maybe I didn't see it, but I was very polite, uh, let's interview you, okay?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Okay.
'''Meng Fei:'''You have been with Wang Ting for such a long time, do you still remember the first time you saw her?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Remember.
'''Meng Fei:'''That shows that you are a person who keeps your original intentions very much. Do you still remember the mood and the frequency of your heartbeat when you saw her?
'''Zuo Jun:'''It seems quite normal, quite normal, just like today, right? Does that mean you fell in love with her at first sight?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Does not belong.
'''Meng Fei:'''Right.
'''Zuo Jun:'''That counts.
'''Meng Fei:'''That counts, but why didn't my heart skip a beat when I saw it for the first time? Generally, when you fall in love at first sight, your heart will jump.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Mainly because he is old.
'''Meng Fei:'''Well, I am speechless, so you can tell me what kind of girl Wang Ting is in your mind, who made you decide to marry her and go with her Do you want to spend the rest of your life decades?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Because she is different from others, she is very special. Very sensible.
'''Meng Fei:'''Very sensible.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Yes.
'''Meng Fei:'''Well, can she cook?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Yes.
'''Meng Fei:'''Who usually cooks at home?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Well, she does it occasionally.
'''Meng Fei:'''You will be right too.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Yes.
'''Meng Fei:'''That's good, um, and today you two are getting married, uh, may I ask, are you ready?
'''Zuo Jun:'''Get ready.
'''Meng Fei:'''Waiting quietly, what are you waiting for? Dear friends, waiting for your applause, welcome to the bride, Wang Ting.
'''Meng Fei:'''Dear friends, is Wang Ting looking good today?
'''Crowd:'''It looks good.
'''Meng Fei:'''It seems that the voice is not in order, so ask again.
'''Crowd:'''It looks good.
'''Meng Fei:'''Okay, when you said it looks good, our Wang Ting was already smiling from ear to ear. Yes, today is indeed the most beautiful day in her life, and also the happiest day. So many relatives and friends have always been by her side, blessing and witnessing her, witnessing that she is going to marry the man she loves. At this moment, she is waiting for Zuo Jun, slowly approaching herself, Zuo Jun, I know you are ready. At this moment, take the flowers in your hand and walk towards them. At this time, our Zuojun needs everyone's support and encouragement with a little applause. Well, step by step to the side of this beloved girl. Of course, the first thing you must do is not ignore your dad. You must bow to your dad first, because you will say some sweet words in front of your dad later. Uh, then, I know that you have held back the words in your heart for quite a long time. Next, I will not be verbose, I will leave the time to you, dear friend, and I hope everyone can keep quiet.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Wang Ting, I have known you for more than a year. It has come so far. Indeed, you have tolerated a lot, because sometimes you lose your temper. Really, you are very Sensible, my dear marry me.
'''Meng Fei:'''I'm almost certain that this passage must be about the two of you being together. For more than a year, you have said to this girl that the most beautiful love words should be regarded as love words, er, Then, Wang Ting also accepted you readily. Of course, remember to help him up. Yes, the dad next to you has been watching you with loving eyes. In fact, dad has a lot of warmth, blessings, and some words to tell you. Yes, hand the microphone to Dad.
'''Wang Shihong:'''Dear guests, friends and relatives, hello everyone, thank you for attending my daughter's wedding despite your busy schedule.
Today I want to say to her, I hope you will respect and love each other, understand each other, help each other, and create your own beautiful future with your own hands and wise minds in your career.
I wish you a happy wedding and all the best. At the same time, I also wish you all good health and good luck. I hope you drink well, eat well, and be happy.
'''Meng Fei:'''Thank you dad, dad said, the most ordinary words in the world, but they are not the same touching, and warm, thank you, father, now you can safely take Wang Ting's hand, Handed over to the left army. Yes, put their two hands together tightly. I also wish you happiness forever. Wang Ting, you can turn around and give your father a hug. Thank you, Father, you can now take your seat with confidence. I believe that the two children will not let you down. In the future, the two of you will also take time to go home and see you. Dad seems to be a little reluctant to part with this stage, give Dad a little applause, thank you.
Well, Zuo Jun can stand beside you, the groom. At this moment, I believe that your heart must be full of longing and longing for the future life. Of course, it will also carry the blessings and hopes from your parents and all the guests. With these warmth and touches, I invite you to hold hands together and walk into marriage in the name of love.
In life, there is rarely a sense of ceremony and warmth like a wedding. Of course, I believe that the hopes, blessings and touches you have received will definitely turn into the driving force for you to move forward in the future. The turning around just now, the bride and groom , right in front of us, the next thing they have to do is to turn around and face each other again, the two hands can hold hands, the face on the opposite side, I believe, is already very, very familiar. Yes, you have gone through hundreds of days, and you have always been by your side to accompany you. In life, there will always be some small touches and warmth. Although each other is not a romantic person, I believe he must be a very down-to-earth person suitable for living. In the future, I believe that you will hold each other tightly like you are now, never let go, and will always be by each other's side. I would like to ask you two, in the long and unknown time ahead, will you be able to love each other forever, support each other, protect each other, and take good care of each other no matter in good times or bad times, poverty or wealth, health or disease? Run your little home, Excuse me, Bridegroom, would you like to?
'''Zuo Jun:'''I am willing.
'''Meng Fei:'''I think I should pass the microphone to you, and then tell everyone loudly. Excuse me, would you like to?
'''Zuo Jun:'''I am willing.
'''Meng Fei:'''Yes, yes, sometimes it may not be necessary, I invite applause, everyone thinks it is time to applaud, so you have to applaud. I also want to ask the same question, beautiful Wang Ting, may I ask, would you like it too?
'''Wang Ting:'''I am willing.
'''Meng Fei:'''I noticed that when Wang Ting said "I am willing", she shook her shoulders. Obviously, this is a very rewarding and satisfying feeling. The next thing to invite is your bridesmaid, yes, she will give you a testimony of love. There are two round rings in the hands of the bridesmaids. These two round rings will forever inlay the two loving hearts together. Please hold each other's left hand with your left hand, and take off each other's ring with your right hand at the same time. We see that Mr. Zuo Jun is now wearing a ring for his wife in the name of her husband. Yes, Wang Ting is also invited. From the moment you put on the ring, I believe that your ring finger will no longer be nameless, and will engrave each other's name life after life. Come on, what you are going to do next is something that is not suitable for children. If I want to invite children who are close to the stage, they must close their eyes. Yes, because the bride and groom are going to do some embarrassing things. Come on, groom, I invite you to kiss your bride in the name of your husband, and all the applause and cheers are given to them.
oh. Let us witness together that on August 25, 2019, the groom, Zuo Jun, the bride, and Wang Ting became husband and wife in the witness of all the guests. In the future, they will have a new name, that is husband and wife. You two, you can turn around now. Yes, I want to observe Zuo Jun at the first time. It seems that there is some lipstick on his mouth. Can some of the guests pass him a tissue? Yes, we should put on the lipstick at the first time. At this time, I believe that for the bride and groom, they must have gained a lot. Of course, the most important thing is to be grateful. Because they know that without all the guests today, there would be no grand wedding. So at this moment we come together and bow to everyone, thank you, thank you.
Of course, our groom, Zuo Jun, is full of emotions. At this time, there will be many words of thanks in my heart, and I want to tell everyone, especially parents, come, Zuo Jun, take the microphone.
'''Zuo Jun:'''First of all, I would like to thank my parents. Maybe, when I was very young, what I lacked was a kind of companionship. So I……
'''Meng Fei:'''We can give him a few seconds, yes, to calm down a little.
'''Meng Fei:'''Has the applause stopped? come on.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Because my parents were not by my side when I was young. Maybe, I have a big temper with my parents, because I am always at home, maybe, I have a big temper with my parents, so I, they have worked so hard to raise me, so big. And the attitude towards parents is not particularly good, in fact, it's not that the attitude is bad, it may be that the voice of the speech is relatively loud. So I hope my parents don't take it to heart. Then I would like to thank my father-in-law and mother-in-law for raising Wang Ting so well, and then married me, and I would like to thank all the guests, relatives and friends here. Really, in the midst of busy schedules, I took the time to drink. Maybe the greetings in many places are not particularly thoughtful, so I hope everyone can forgive me, thank you.
'''Meng Fei:'''It's hard for us to imagine that a man with such a tough appearance would cry today. Yes, I believe that he also has a steel-like will in his heart. Indeed, today, his tears were poked. Of course, I believe that this passage is definitely not realized today. It must be held in his heart and it is quite long. It's time. It is true that there will be some guilt towards parents in my heart.
Well, it doesn't matter, in the next step, you will sincerely offer a cup of fragrant tea to mom and dad. Come on, I also see Mom and Dad, they are ready. Uh, when mom and dad come to the stage, they can wave to everyone, and ask the two moms to sit in the middle, and the two dads to sit next to their wives. For this cup of tea, I believe that as parents, they have been waiting for a long time. After a lifetime of hard work, I finally see the children get married and have families. I believe that this is also the only thing that parents in the world hope for. Next, let's invite Wang Ting to come to the father-in-law and mother-in-law to serve tea.
Today, I officially entered the door of our left house. It seems that I first came in front of my mother-in-law. I am very sensible and know to build a good relationship with my mother-in-law. I know that the financial power is usually in the hands of my mother-in-law. Okay. , our Zuo Jun remembers, pass the microphone to the wife, come on.
'''Wang Ting:'''Mom, please drink tea. Dad, please drink tea.
'''Meng Fei:'''Remember to take the teacup from mother's hand. Mom wants to drink two more sips. This cup of tea is rarely available. Because this is a cup of modified tea, and then we, Zuo Jun, are going to come to the father-in-law and mother-in-law, and offer modified tea to the father-in-law and mother-in-law. It seems that the first cup of tea should be served to the mother-in-law first, so remember to change your mouth and hold the microphone by yourself.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Mom, please drink tea.
'''Meng Fei:'''This mother screams very loudly. Of course, I can also see in my mother's eyes that my mother is satisfied with this son-in-law.
'''Zuo Jun:'''Dad, drink tea.
'''Meng Fei:'''In the future, I believe that the filial Zuo Jun and Wang Ting will be filial to their parents. I will also treat each other's parents as my own. Next, let's take a family portrait together as a family. Then we invite the bride and groom to come behind mom and dad. Yes, there are also friends who are invited to sit in the front row. It seems that many of them have already taken out their mobile phones and have been taking pictures. Friends who are still interested, have to take out your mobile phone immediately. Yes, because this photo is rarely taken at ordinary times. This family portrait. Uh, mom and dad and the groom and the bride, remember to look ahead with a smile on your face. Yes, see? All cameras, all eyes, are watching this moment. Remember to smile, yes, auntie, OK, let’s give everyone a countdown. Three, two, one, eggplant.
Okay, thank you mom and dad, ah, yes, is this my sister? Come to my sister, come to my sister's side, oh, sister-in-law, right? Oh, sorry, preconceived. It's okay, it's harmless, just look ahead. Well, thank you mom and dad.
The bride and groom will return to the center of the stage again, and then we, all the best men and bridesmaids will come to the stage at this time, because the next time belongs to all the young people on the scene. The best man came to the groom's side, yes, the bridesmaid stood next to the bride, and then troubled the staff, brought wine, yes, would you like to get closer to the groom? Handsome guy, yes, each of us serves a glass of wine, and then, the bride and groom, they will have a glass of wine for each other. Of course, I believe that this glass of wine is also the wine they thanked all the guests present today. At this time, I saw that some guests had already got up. Know what to expect next, come on. At this time, I hope that everyone who drinks tea can raise the teacup in your hands, and those who drink alcohol can raise the wine glass in your hand. Let us raise the wine glass high and all stand up. Let us also wish Zuo Jun and Wang Ting a happy wedding. A happy marriage for a hundred years. I said that when we were newly married, everyone cheered happily, OK? Ready, wish Zuo Jun, Wang Ting, newlyweds.
'''Crowd:'''Happy.
'''Meng Fei:'''One hundred years.
'''Crowd:'''Good cooperation.
'''Meng Fei:'''The most important thing is to be born early.
'''Crowd:'''Takako.
'''Meng Fei:'''Thank you, let us toast together, thank you everyone, please sit down. After drinking this glass of wine, we will walk together in this life. After drinking this glass of wine, we will be happy forever. Next, we're going to grab flowers. Yes, besides the best man and bridesmaid, I would like to ask if there are any unmarried young friends, not just those who are over 18. As long as you are not married, you can participate. I saw that there are already several beauties beside the stage, and they are ready. They came behind the bride and groom, yes, are there any handsome guys on the scene? Unmarried handsome guys, I think, almost all the ones who should come have come. Today's situation is that there are more wolves, more meat and fewer wolves. I saw that the best man didn't allow others to grab flowers. He especially wanted to grab the bouquet What a flower, uh, let me give Wang Ting a countdown, okay? I'm already going back, have you observed the terrain yet? OK, ready. Three, two, one, here it comes, so cruel. Stay on stage with the bridesmaids of course. Yes, thank you to all the friends who participated in the bouquet, the best man and bridesmaid stayed on the stage, and then, the bride and groom returned to the middle of the stage again. Uh, please pass some microphones to this handsome guy who grabbed the flowers, yes, I think you really want to grab this bouquet of flowers, so I want to interact with you grandly, okay, first introduce yourself who you are. Ah, where did you come from, and the current single status, okay? one by one.
'''Jiangnan:'''Where did you come from, right? From Qidong.
'''Meng Fei:'''From Qidong, who are you?
'''Jiangnan:'''My name is Jiangnan.
'''Meng Fei:'''Are you a relative or friend of the groom?
'''Jiangnan:'''I am the groom's cousin.
'''Meng Fei:'''Cousin, right?
'''Jiangnan:'''Yes.
'''Meng Fei:'''Cousin, my cousin got married today, and you are also anxious about my cousin getting married today.
'''Jiangnan:'''A little bit,
'''Meng Fei:'''It's more than just a little bit. Just now, I saw that you jumped up to grab the flower.
'''Jiangnan:'''Flying up, I feel that you look like an athlete at that moment. Right, classmate, and today is well deserved. Special congratulations to you. Uh, lastly, there is another question about the current relationship status. However, I roughly estimated that it should be single. Right, all you have to do is nod your head. Right, it seems that he has a girlfriend, so he says it's okay. Say it yourself.
'''Jiangnan:'''Have a girlfriend.
'''Meng Fei:'''Have a girlfriend?
'''Jiangnan:'''Yes.
'''Meng Fei:'''The reason why you want to grab the flowers so enthusiastically today is because this bouquet of flowers is for your girlfriend, right?
'''Jiangnan:'''I can't deliver it, but I can express it.
'''Meng Fei:'''Express delivery is possible, but your girlfriend isn't there, so why do you want to compete with everyone?
'''Jiangnan:'''Talk.
'''Meng Fei:'''Okay, then we won't make videos, okay? Tell your girlfriend later that I snatched this bunch of bouquets, which means that our fate has really arrived, so let's set the date earlier, okay?
'''Jiangnan:'''Okay.
'''Meng Fei:'''OK, then I handed over the microphone to the best man, do you have anything to say, nothing to say. Well, sure enough, the best man is not... shall we pass the microphone to the bridesmaids? The bridesmaid had something to say, so she passed it on to the next one. good. Come, you come.
'''Wang Ting's childhood friend:'''I am Wang Ting's childhood friend. We met when we were five years old, and we have been together for more than 20 years now.
'''Meng Fei:'''Speak up, please don't cry.
'''Wang Tingfa Xiao:'''There are many hard times in life from childhood to adulthood, and she is always by her side in difficult times. Well, I hope that the girl we loved since we were young can live happily ever after. Then I wish you a happy marriage for a hundred years and an early birth to your son.
'''Meng Fei:'''Usually the bridesmaids shed tears when they spoke, and then even the bride shed tears. Indeed, they know that this relationship is not easy. They have traveled too many roads together. Today, they saw their girlfriends and reaped their own happiness. I am very touched and sincerely wish them well. This bridesmaid is holding the microphone to say, well, you are going to say it too, right? Okay, let's take a photo together, shall we? Yes, you can move a little closer and look ahead. This handsome guy doesn't take flowers like this, it's too casual. Okay, this is what you have worked so hard to get, you must stick it on your chest, okay, let's look ahead, will we compare our hearts, yes, OK, let's compare our hearts. Then look ahead and ask you a question. May I ask who is the most handsome today?
'''Jiangnan:'''Me!
'''Meng Fei:'''Stop eating later, this question should be answered by the most handsome groom. I hope you can answer the last question without thinking. Who is the most beautiful today?
'''Meng Fei:'''That's right, this is the rhythm. OK, thank you all, we can go to eat now. Okay, then look at the camera again, three, two, one, eggplant. Thanks so much, so many good brothers and girlfriends have been with me. It also means that this wedding has come to a complete ceremony. At this moment, Zuo Jun and Wang Ting are holding each other tightly and walking towards your beautiful tomorrow and glory. To bright. Everyone has a different way of meeting love. The bride and groom will love each other forever in the world of mortals.
Dear friends, this wedding ceremony has come to a complete conclusion. This wedding was jointly created and carefully planned by Qidong Zhimei Wedding and Yizhou International Hotel. Thank you to all the guests present today, and to every colleague who worked hard in front of and behind the scenes. Finally, let me introduce myself. I am from Hengyang, the host of Hunan Pioneer Hosting Team. My name is Meng Fei. If possible, give me a little applause. Thank you. Qidong Zhimei Wedding will give you a wedding that is within the budget and unexpected. I wish you a happy meal. page.title: Long Pan and Peng Jingran's Wedding

revision.text:
<div class="nocopy">[[zh:龙盼和彭竞燃的婚礼]]'''The wedding of Long Pan and Peng Jingran''' was held on January 23, 2019 at Area B on the 3rd floor of '''[[Qidong]] Yizhou Hotel''', the wedding host was '''Red Star(Hong Xing)'''.
== Wedding Overview == At the wedding, the couple’s love story was reviewed, starting from the proposal on August 7, 2018, through receiving the marriage certificate, taking wedding photos, and ending with the wedding. The groom served in the army and took a short vacation, but he still took on most of the housework at home, showing his love for his bride. At the wedding scene, the groomsmen and bridesmaids came on stage to send blessings to the couple. Finally, under the guidance of the host, the groom expressed his gratitude to the bride and his expectations for future life. The atmosphere of the whole wedding was warm, full of joy and blessings, and opened a new chapter in life for the couple.
== Wedding Lines == '''Red Star:'''My friends, through spring, summer, autumn and winter, I am looking for the most beautiful star in the sky. You are my colorful rainbow. Every time I think of you, my heart is always filled with infinite touch and surprise. This is such a romantic and legendary love story today.
I would like to thank all the relatives and friends in the audience for gathering at this moment to participate in the wedding ceremony of the two newlyweds. I am Red Star, the host of today's wedding.
'''Red Star:'''My friends, in fact, 30% of a good wedding lies in the planning of the wedding company and the performance of the wedding and host on stage, and 70% lies in the good things in the audience. My friends, the more enthusiastic your applause, the more happy the two newcomers will be on stage. Come to listen to all the good friends at the scene, the first happy applause and blessings, thank you, thank you.
'''Red Star:'''My friends, the next two newcomers who will be on the stage of happiness, their love story officially kicked off on August 7, 2018. [[zh:王钊楚七岁生日祝福]] '''Wang Zhaochu's 7th Birthday Wishes''' is a video recorded by [[Wang Zhaochu]]'s family,<ref>[https://youtu.be/EkCunZSUv6Y Subtitle - Collection of Wang Zhaochu's 7th Birthday Wishes (2022)], YouTube</ref> was recorded on or about October 28, 2022, and played at the collective birthday event of his class [[Qidong County]] Chuanshan Primary School Class 104. In the video, Wang Zhaochu's mother [[Lei Yangjuan]], grandfather [[Wang Wuhong]] and father [[Wang Ximing]] wished him a happy seventh birthday with kind words, and expressed their praise and praise for his growth and learning. expect. The blessing videos have been uploaded to [https://youtube.com/@wangximing1985 Wang Ximing's YouTube channel].
==Birthday Greeting Lines== '''Lei Yangjuan:'''Little Tang (Wang Zhaochu), it’s your seventh birthday, congratulations on being one year older, although your mother is not at home with you, but through the sharing of grandma and grandpa, mother knows that you are seven years old You are more sensible and obedient than you when you were six years old. You not only study hard, but you are also a housework expert at home, and you often help grandma with housework; you have the courage to try and challenge. On the wonderful road in the future, you must be careful, patient and hardworking , but also to be happy, happy, to grow up healthily and happily, love you, happy birthday <ref>[https://youtu.be/uhMHGpP5Obc Lei Yangjuan wishes Wang Zhaochu a happy 7th birthday 20221028], YouTube</ref>
'''Wang Wuhong:'''You are a child who loves to laugh, make trouble, and be mischievous! This is the nature of a child, and it is also the performance of a child who is lively, handsome, and smart. I hope you grow up healthily and happily, and wish you all happiness and happiness. The happiness, all the warmth, all the good luck, will always be around you! Baby, today is your birthday, grandpa wishes you a happy birthday.<ref>[https://youtu.be/_03rJtzJozc Grandpa Wang Zhaochu wishes Wang Zhaochu a happy 7th birthday 20221028], YouTube</ref>
'''Wang Ximing:'''I wish Wang Zhaochu a happy birthday, and then study hard, don't play games every day, um, exercise more, play more basketball, run more, watch less TV, and you will get a prize for whatever clothes you want.<ref>[https://youtu.be/4pRvupTCSys Wang Ximing wishes Wang Zhaochu a happy 7th birthday 20221029], YouTube</ref>
==Related Videos== [[File:【字幕】王钊楚7岁生日祝福合集（2022）]]

[[zh:并非讽刺医生]]{{Movie|title1=Not Satirizing Doctors|image1=[[File:【双簧】并非讽刺医生20140213]]|director=[[Wang Wuhong]]|starring=[[Wang Jiaming]], [[Guo Jingxing]]|length=4 minutes|origin={{China}}|language=[[Qidong]] Dialect|date of shooting=February 13, 2014}}
'''''Not Satirizing Doctors''''' was a '''two-man comic show in [[Qidong]] Dialect''' filmed on February 13, 2014, recorded with a voice recorder, directed by [[Wang Wuhong]], dubbed by [[Guo Jingxing]], starring [[Wang Jiaming]], adapted from [[Wikipedia:zh:大兵|Da Bing]], [[Wikipedia:zh:Zhao Weiguo|Zhao Weiguo]]'s original work "''Not Sarcastic Doctor''".
There are two characters in the two-man comic show: Wang Jiaming and a doctor. Wang Jiaming complained that he paid a lot of money for appendectomy and tried to bargain with the doctor to get a lower price. They discussed anesthesia, disinfection, and the cost of doctors' skills. Wang Jiaming jokingly suggested that doctors use a lighter to sterilize surgical instruments. The two-man comic show is full of puns, wordplay, and humorous exaggeration.
== Comic Show Lines ==
'''(Adapted from Dabing and Zhao Weiguo's two-man comic show)'''
'''Wang Jiaming:''' I, Wang Jiaming, am in very good health. I have never been in a hospital in my life. Yesterday I ate 50 salted duck eggs in one go. I developed appendicitis just after eating half of them. Ouch, doctor, it costs a lot of money to cut the appendix.
'''Doctor:''' Two thousand.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Two thousand, doctor, for two thousand, don't cut the appendix with your knife, you can go here directly. I give this life to you.
'''Doctor:''' Then how much money do you think is appropriate?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Most, eighty.
'''Doctor:''' Eighty? Okay, eighty is eighty.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Oh, it's cheap. I paid back the two thousand to 80, or you have to pay back the price for everything you buy. The appendix can be cut for 80 yuan, and I can eat more than 80 yuan at McDonald's. Tomorrow I will call the whole family to collectively cut the appendix. Eighty yuan, doctor, hurry up, hurry up, while it's hot.
'''Doctor:''' While it's hot, I'm not blacksmithing. This is an operation, so be serious. Are you going to take anesthesia?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Hey, doctor, are you a pig slaughterer or something, and now you have to use anesthesia to kill a pig, why don't you make me a human?
'''Doctor:''' Didn't you say 80 yuan, where is there anesthesia?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Oh, it's anesthetic, why not? If I don't use anesthesia, I will be called to death.
'''Doctor:''' Anesthetics, then 800 yuan per injection.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Eight hundred? Doctor, are you taking anesthesia, or xo?
'''Doctor:''' Imported anesthetic, local anesthesia!
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Do you have any cheaper ones.
'''Doctor:''' It's cheaper, but the effect is not guaranteed. You wake up when you wake up. And the place that should be numb is not numb, and the place that should not be numb is anesthetized for a long time. It is irresponsible if it affects your life in the future.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Hey, it's an imported one, doctor, it's an imported one, the side effect is too great, I can't bear it.
'''Doctor:''' An injection, does it still hurt?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Oh, money is money and goods are goods? It's numb to call it numb.
'''Doctor:''' Open up next, do you still need to sterilize this scalpel?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Doctor, the knives are not sterilized.
'''Doctor:''' The disinfection fee is 500 yuan.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Then no need, I brought a lighter. If you burn that knife twice on the fire, the result will be the same.
'''Doctor:''' Your patient is quite smart.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' There is no way, even if you meet a doctor like you who is not smart.
'''Doctor:''' Let's open it. Yay, it's bleeding, it's bleeding, you're so full of blood. It's so high. Oh, do you want to stop the bleeding?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Hey, of course the bleeding stopped, why didn't it stop bleeding. Doctor?
'''Doctor:''' Do you use hemostatic gauze or a rag?
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Doctor, do you still have a rag to stop the bleeding?
'''Doctor:''' The hemostatic gauze costs 500 yuan.
Wang Jiaming: Oh, you can spend as much money as you want, stop the bleeding quickly, or you will lose your old life.
'''Doctor:''' Yes, if you have this attitude, it will be easier for me. Now stop your bleeding, open the wound, find out the appendix, and cut it off. Congratulations, the operation was a complete success. One last question, you still have to sew it up.
'''Wang Jiaming:''' Doctor, you are going to let my intestines come out, this is scary and attracts flies.
==Comic Show Video== [[File:【双簧】并非讽刺医生20140213]] [[Category:2014Vlog]] [[Category:Guo Jingxing]] [[Category:Wang Jiaming]] [[Category:Wang Wuhong]] {{Navbox_Total}}

page.title: File:雷阳娟祝王钊楚7岁生日快乐20221028

revision.text: 小汤哥（王钊楚）， 七岁生日了，恭喜你又长大一岁了，虽然妈妈没有在家陪伴你，但是通过奶奶和爷爷的分享妈妈知道了七岁的你比六岁的你更加懂事更加听话，你不但学习认真，在家还是家务小达人，经常帮助奶奶做家务； 你勇于尝试、敢于挑战，在未来精彩的路上，你要细心、耐心、努力，更要快乐、幸福，要健康快乐的成长，爱你哦，生日快乐 [[Category:2022Vlog]]

page.title: File:王钊楚爷爷祝王钊楚7岁生日快乐20221028

revision.text: 你是一个爱笑、爱闹、调皮的孩子!这是小孩子的天性，也是小孩活泼、帅气、聪明的表现，希望你健康快乐成长，愿所有的幸福，所有的快乐，所有的温馨，所有的好运，永远围绕在你的身边!宝贝，今天是你的生日，爷爷祝你生日快乐。 [[Category:2022Vlog]]

[[zh:天气预报（2014）]] '''''Weather Forecast''''' is a funny sketch starring [[Wang Jiaming]] and [[Guo Jingxing]] in May 2014.<ref>[[:File:天气预报 Weather Report1|Weather Forecast 1]] , YouTube</ref><ref>[[:File:天气预报 Weather Report2|Weather Forecast 2]], YouTube</ref><ref>[[:File:天气预报 Weather Report3|Weather Forecast 3]], YouTube</ref> In the program, they introduced the weather conditions around the world in the image of weather anchors. The program presents the weather conditions in a humorous way, allowing the audience to feel the joy brought by the program while enjoying the weather information.
Finally, Wang Jiaming and Guo Jingxing presented a song to the audience. The whole program presents the weather conditions in a humorous way, allowing the audience to enjoy the weather information while also feeling the pleasure brought by the program.
== lines== [[File:天气预报 Weather Report1|thumb]]
=== [[:File:天气预报 Weather Report1|Episode 1]]=== '''Wang Jiaming:'''Hi everyone! Welcome to today's weather forecast column.
Here, we will present the latest weather news, well, let’s not gossip, and immediately turn to the topic.
Well, the map of China on the right side of the screen you are watching. Weather snacks will be delivered to you in no time.
Please see the big screen.
As shown in the picture, most of the rain can be seen falling down in most parts of the north, bringing a little bit of coolness. And it is not ruled out that the thick PM2.5 in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region blocks the bright sunshine. Now might as well turn our attention to the south, Hainan! China's special economic zone, which leads China to the sun, is about to usher in the first wave of tornadoes. Here, I would like to remind the local area to plant sunflowers well. Thank you for your cooperation.
Let's take a look at our local region - Hunan. Now the sun is shining brightly and there are no clouds in the sky. On the street, the drums and gongs are loud, the firecrackers are blasting, and the red flags are flying. There are huge crowds of people. It is indeed a lively land of fish and rice. Changsha, accompanied by thunderstorms and strong winds, and accompanied by hail, and it is now in the dog days of June, please see the detailed introduction now. 8:34 2014/5/1
===[[:File:天气预报 Weather Report2|Episode 2]]=== '''Guo Jingxing:'''Okay, after looking at the dull weather forecast just now, you must be very happy. Next, due to the needs of the program group, we hereby add a new interactive unit. Now, you can scan the QR code at the bottom of the screen to participate in the program interaction.
===[[:File:天气预报 Weather Report3|Episode 3]]=== '''Wang Jiaming:'''The weather of the world is briefly summarized, the United States is light rain, Brazil is sunny. The Japanese tsunami, tornado, and earthquake hit the entire Honshu Island together. Let's take a look at Africa again. In Africa, there is light rain in the interim, and there are heavy snowfalls in some areas. Sound incredible? This is the famous El Niño phenomenon. Okay, Europe, heavy rain, and heavy rain here adds up to a heavy snowstorm. Then, this is the Wang Guo radio station, and I will send you a song. (where did all the time go)
==References== <references /> [[Category:Sketches]] [[Category:Wang Jiaming]] [[Category:Guo Jingxing]] {{Navbox_Total}}

revision.text: ;Description :This template is used to generate vde (view/discuss/edit) links. ;Syntax :The template has 2 parameters. The first (unnamed) parameter is the template to link to. The optional parameter type can be used to add the generic type of template (eg. infobox, navbox, ...). This is only used in the link popup texts. [[Category:Templates]][[Category:Template documentation]]

{{Navbox |title = General Guide of Jiaxing Radio Station |template = Navbox_Total <!-- Used for V D E links --> |group1 = People |list1 = * [[Wang Jiaming]] * [[Wang Ziyu]] * [[Wang Ximing]] * [[Lei Yangjuan]] * [[Wang Zhaochu]] * [[Wang Wuhong]] * [[Guo Jingxing]]
|header2 = Music/MV Video |state2 = {{{state2|expanded}}} |group2 = Group by Year |list2 = * [[:Category:2012 MV|2012]] * [[:Category:2013 MV|2013]] * [[:Category:2014 MV|2014]] * [[:Category:2015 MV|2015]] * [[:Category:2016 MV|2016]] * [[:Category:2017 MV|2017]] * [[:Category:2018 MV|2018]] * [[:Category:2019 MV|2019]] * [[:Category:2020 MV|2020]] * [[:Category:2021 MV|2021]] * [[:Category:2022 MV|2022]] * [[:Category:2023 MV|2023]] |group3 = dance |list3 = * [[:File:【王郭广播站】小苹果舞蹈 20140802|Little Apple]] * [[:File:小苹果双人舞蹈2 Little Apple Double Dance 2|Little Apple 2]] |group4 = Cover MV |list4 = * [[Once You]] * [[Old Boys]] * [[You at the Same Table]] * [[Ideal]] * [[Nineteen Years Old]] * [[Below the Rainbow]] * [[Desert Camel]] * [[Another Kind of Nostalgia]] * [[Self-indulgent]] * [[Light Chaser]] * [[Ordinary Day]] * [[Big Fish]] * [[Bird Paradise]] * [[Undersea]]
|header5 = Travel Vlogs |state5 = {{{state5|collapsed}}} |group5 =Group by Year |list5 = * [[:Category:2012Vlog|2012]] * [[:Category:2013Vlog|2013]] * [[:Category:2014Vlog|2014]] * [[:Category:2015Vlog|2015]] * [[:Category:2016Vlog|2016]] * [[:Category:2017Vlog|2017]] * [[:Category:2018Vlog|2018]] * [[:Category:2019Vlog|2019]] * [[:Category:2020Vlog|2020]] * [[:Category:2021Vlog|2021]] * [[:Category:2022Vlog|2022]] * [[:Category:2023Vlog|2023]] |group6 = By Year, Name |list6 = {{Navbox|child |group1 = 2013 |list1 = * [[:File:20130808与王佳明游祁东鼎山公园| Tour Qidong Dingshan Park with Wang Jiaming]] * [[:File:王佳明在祁东二中（短Vlog）|Wang Jiaming in Qidong No. 2 Middle School]] |group2 = 2014 |list2 = * [[Travel in Summer 2014|Shenzhen, Qidong Taihetang Summer Vacation Trip]] |group3 = 2016 |list3 = * [[:File:王子瑜和王佳明游祁东四明山溪水 20160706|Wang Ziyu and Wang Jiaming travel to Qidong Siming Mountain stream]] |group4 = 2017 |list4 = * [[:File:【王钊楚】小汤哥祁东一日游(2017)|Wang Zhaochu Qidong One Day Tour]] * [[:File:王钊楚游石门水库（2017）|Wang Zhaochu visits Shimen Reservoir]] * [[:File:王子瑜、王佳明在祁东过水坪摘酥脆枣(2017)| Wang Ziyu and Wang Jiaming picking crispy dates in Guoshuiping]] * [[:File:王子瑜游四明山|Wang Ziyu visits Siming Mountain]] |group5 = 2018 |list5 = * [[3-day Tour to Western Hunan in 2018|Tour to Western Hunan in Spring Festival]] * [[:File:2018年暑假王子瑜祁东游水漓坊水上乐园| Wang Ziyu and Guo Jingxing swim in the water park]] |group6 = 2019 |list6 = * [[Travel in Guangzhou 2019|Tour to Guangzhou]] * [[:File:【完整版】2019年王喜明和王钊楚游祁东水漓坊水上乐园|Wang Ximing, Wang Zhaochu and Wang Ziyu visited Qidong Shuilifang Water Park]] |group7 = 2021 |list7 = * [[Travel to Double-Dragon Canyon in Qiyang and Zhuangyuan Bridge in Guiyang in 2021| One-day tour of Qiyang Shuanglong Gorge and Guiyang Zhuangyuan Bridge]] }} }}<noinclude>{{documentation}}</noinclude> __NOINDEX__

{{Navbox |title = A simple navbox |template = Navbox Sample <!-- Used for V D E links --> |above = Text to appear on top |group1 = First Group |list1 = * This * Is * An * Example * List |list2 = Second list without group (centered) |group3 = Third group without list (not shown) |group99999 = 99999th Group |list99999 = Any number works |below = Text to appear on bottom }}<noinclude>{{documentation}}</noinclude>

This is a sample of a Navbox template.You can copy the following codes provided [[Template:{{PAGENAME}}#Examples|below]]. == Parameters == Here is a list of all supported parameters. * (n) should be replaced by any valid number. * Underlined values are defaults. All parameters are optional. === Main Parameters === ;template :Name of the template, used for VDE (view/discuss/edit) links. Will be passed directly to {{t|vdelinks}} ;border/''unnamed parameter 1'' :Can be used to control the border of the navbox. Currently only supports the value "child", making the navbox a child navbox of another one. ;title :The main title of the box. ;above :Used to add a row that appears above all image, header and data rows. ;header(n) :Used to add subheaders to the navbox. Headers are hidden by default unless there are any list rows under them. ;show(n) = yes/no :Use this parameter to force show/hide a section. The number should correspond to the number of the header that started the section. ;showall = yes :Use this to force show all sections. Can be overridden with individual show(n) parameters. ;group(n) :Contains the group label for a row. If not present, the corresponding list will expand to fill the gap. ;list(n) :The actual list for the row. ;below :Used to add a row that appears below all header and data rows. === Images === The navbox supports 2 images (one left and one right). Both images support full syntax ([[File:Name.ext|...]]) and filename (File:Name.ext). In case of the former, the respective width and link parameters will be ignored. ;image :Specify an image for the right side ;imagewidth = 100px :If you didn't use the full syntax, use this to specify the width of the image ;imagelink :You can use this to link the image to a certain page. ;imageleft :Specify an image for the left side ;imageleftwidth = 100px :Width for the left image ;imageleftlink :Link for the left image === Style Parameters === ;alternaterows = yes/no/swap :You can optionally add this to disable alternating row styles. If set to swap, the odd rows will be the alternate rows; otherwise the even rows are. ;bodystyle ;bodyclass :Classes and styles to add to the navbox itself ;titlestyle ;titleclass :Classes and styles to add to the title ;abovestyle ;aboveclass :Classes and styles to add to the above row ;imagestyle ;imageclass :Classes and styles to add to the image ;imageleftstyle ;imageleftclass :Classes and styles to add to the left image ;rowclass :Classes to add to all list rows ;altrowclass = alt :Classes to add to list rows with alternating styles ;groupstyle ;groupclass :Classes and styles to add to the groups ;altgroupstyle ;altgroupclass :Classes and styles to add to the groups in alternate rows (if enabled) ;liststyle ;listclass :Classes and styles to add to the lists ;altliststyle ;altlistclass :Classes and styles to add to the lists in alternate rows (if enabled) ;belowstyle ;belowclass :Classes and styles to add to the below row === Collapsing === The Navbox supports two forms of collapsing: for the navbox itself and for individual subsections. ;state = collapsed/expanded/plain :This parameter controls the collapsing of the navbox itself. If set to collapsed, the box will be collapsed by default. If set to expanded, the box can be collapsed, but will be open by default. If set to plain, the box can not be collapsed and no Show/Hide link will show. ;state(n) = collapsed/expanded/plain :Used to control the collapsing of a single section. A section goes from one header to the next. The number should thus correspond to the one of the header that is above the section to collapse. Options are the same as above. ;defaultstate = collapsed/expanded/plain :Sets the default collapse state for the subsections only. Can still be overridden by individual state(n) parameters. ;collapsetext = Hide ;expandtext = Show :Custom text for the toggle labels of the navbox itself. ;collapsetext(n) = Hide ;expandtext(n) = Show :Custom text for the toggle labels of a single section. ;defaultcollapsetext ;defaultexpandtext :Sets the default toggle labels. Can be overridden by individual parameters. ==Examples== ===Simple Example=== 
{{Navbox
 |title = A simple navbox
 |template = Navbox 
 |above = Text to appear on top
 |group1 = First Group
 |list1 = 
* This
* Is
* An
* Example
* List
 |list2 = Second list without group (centered)
 |group3 = Third group without list (not shown)
 |group99999 = 99999th Group
 |list99999 = Any number works
 |below = Text to appear on bottom
}}
{{Navbox |title = A simple navbox |template = Navbox |above = Text to appear on top |group1 = First Group |list1 = * This * Is * An * Example * List |list2 = Second List without group (centered) |group3 = Third Group without list (not shown) |group99999 = 99999th Group |list99999 = Any number works |below = Text to appear on bottom }} ===Headers Example=== 
{{Navbox
 |title = Navbox with subheaders
 |group1 = First Group
 |list1 = This list is before the first header
 |header2 = Header for section 2
 |group2 = Second Group
 |list2 = Second List (part of section 2)
 |group3 = Third Group
 |list3 = Third List (also part of section 2)
 |header4 = Header with no lists (Not shown)
 |header5 = Another Header
 |list5 = Another list (part of section 5)
 |header6 = Another header with no lists (force shown)
 |show6 = yes
 |header7 = A header with a list that is force hidden
 |list7 = Not shown either
 |show7 = no
}}
{{Navbox |title = Navbox with subheaders |group1 = First Group |list1 = This list is before the first header |header2 = Header for section 2 |group2 = Second Group |list2 = Second List (part of section 2) |group3 = Third Group |list3 = Third List (also part of section 2) |header4 = Header with no lists (Not shown) |header5 = Another Header |list5 = Another list (part of section 5) |header6 = Another header with no lists (force shown) |show6 = yes |header7 = A header with a list that is force hidden |list7 = Not shown either |show7 = no }} ===Images Example=== 
{{Navbox
 |title = Navbox with images
 |group1 = First Group
 |list1 = First List
 |header2 = Some Header
 |list2 = Some List
 
 |image = File:Wiki.png
 |imagewidth = 60px
 |imagelink = w:
 
 |imageleft = [[File:Example.jpg|50px]]
 
 |below = Below goes below images too
}}
{{Navbox |title = Navbox with images |group1 = First Group |list1 = First List |header2 = Some Header |list2 = Some List |image = File:Wiki.png |imagewidth = 60px |imagelink = w: |imageleft = [[File:Example.jpg|50px]] |below = Below goes below images too }} ===Collapsing Example=== 
{{Navbox
 |title = Navbox with collapsing
 |state = collapsed
 
 |header1 = First Header (Plain)
 |group1 = First Group
 |list1 = This list is before the first header
 |group2 = Second Group
 |list2 = Second List
 
 |header3 = Second Header (Expanded)
 |state3 = expanded
 |group3 = Third Group
 |list3 = Third List
 |group4 = Fourth Group
 |list4 = Fourth List
 
 |header5 = Third Header (Collapsed)
 |state5 = collapsed
 |group5 = Fifth Group
 |list5 = Fifth List
 |group6 = Sixth Group
 |list6 = Sixth List
}}
{{Navbox |title = Navbox with collapsing |state = collapsed |header1 = First Header (Plain) |group1 = First Group |list1 = This list is before the first header |group2 = Second Group |list2 = Second List |header3 = Second Header (Expanded) |state3 = expanded |group3 = Third Group |list3 = Third List |group4 = Fourth Group |list4 = Fourth List |header5 = Third Header (Collapsed) |state5 = collapsed |group5 = Fifth Group |list5 = Fifth List |group6 = Sixth Group |list6 = Sixth List }} ===Custom Styles Example=== Example using wikipedia style colors. The values represent CSS classes. Note: It is recommended to use the classes over the styles if possible. To view/edit the default styles, see [[MediaWiki:Common.css]] 
{{Navbox
 |title = .navbox-title
 |above = .navbox-above
 |header1 = .navbox-header
 |group1 = .navbox-row-group
 |list1 = .navbox-row-list
 |group2 = .alt .navbox-row-group
 |list2 = .alt .navbox-row-list
 |list3 = .navbox-list.no-group
 |below = .navbox-below
 
 |bodystyle = background: #fdfdfd; color: black; border: 1px solid #aaa; padding: 3px
 |titlestyle = background: #ccf; color: black
 |abovestyle = background: #ddf; color: black
 |headerstyle = background: #ddf; color: black
 |groupstyle = background: #ddf; border-right: 2px solid white; color: black; text-align: right; padding-right: 1em
 |liststyle = background: transparent; color: black
 |altliststyle = background: #f7f7f7; color: black
 |belowstyle = background: #ddf; color: black
}}
{{Navbox |title = .navbox-title |above = .navbox-above |header1 = .navbox-header |group1 = .navbox-group |list1 = .navbox-list |group2 = .alt .navbox-group |list2 = .alt .navbox-list |list3 = .navbox-list.no-group |below = .navbox-below |bodystyle = background: #fdfdfd; color: black; border: 1px solid #aaa; padding: 3px |titlestyle = background: #ccf; color: black |abovestyle = background: #ddf; color: black |headerstyle = background: #ddf; color: black |groupstyle = background: #ddf; border-right: 2px solid white; color: black; text-align: right; padding-right: 1em |liststyle = background: transparent; color: black |altliststyle = background: #f7f7f7; color: black |belowstyle = background: #ddf; color: black }} ===Subgroups Example=== 
{{Navbox
 |title = Navbox with subgroups
 |group1 = Normal group
 |list1 = Normal list
 |group2 = Subgrouped
 |list2 = {{Navbox|child
  |group1 = First subgroup
  |list1 = List goes here
  |group2 = Second...
  |list2 = Another list
  |group3 = Subgrouped
  |list3 = {{Navbox|child
   |group1 = Another subgroup
   |list1 = List here
   }}
  |image = [[File:Example.jpg|48px]] 
  |alternaterows = swap 
 }}
}}
{{Navbox |title = Navbox with subgroups |group1 = Normal group |list1 = Normal list |group2 = Subgrouped |list2 = {{Navbox|child |group1 = First subgroup |list1 = List goes here |group2 = Second... |list2 = Another list |group3 = Subgrouped |list3 = {{Navbox|child |group1 = First subgroup |list1 = List here }} |image = [[File:Example.jpg|48px]] |alternaterows = swap }} }}

{{SITENAME}} is the official English wiki-based online encyclopedia that contains detailed information about Jiaxing YouTube Channel(Jiaxing Album), including Wang Jiaming, Guo Jingxing, Wang Ximing, Wang Ziyu, Wang Zhaochu, etc., as well as their latest videos, history and experience.

Welcome to '''{{FULLPAGENAME}}'''!
To test, click '''[{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}}}?action=edit here]''' to start testing or click '''Edit''' on the upper right. Sandboxes are test pages for practicing page editing skills. Feel free to practice editing here. After you finish editing, you can preview the content and save it. Just like the text written on the beach will disappear when the tide rises, the content written in the sandbox may be emptied at any time without any prior notice (but the saved content will still remain permanently on the page [{{fullurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}}}?action=history history]).
'''Precautions''': *'''Don't''' write entries or store other valuable content in the public sandbox (see [[Help:New page|Create a new page]]). *'''Don't''' save content in the sandbox that violates other people's copyrights, is offensive, defamatory, slandering others or their privacy. *'''Don't''' redirect the sandbox to another page, or remove the top template. *'''Don't''' advertise in the sandbox, or you may be banned. '''Tools''':

revision.text:
<noinclude>[[Wang Zhaochu]] transferred from Taihetang Elf Kindergarten to Qidong County Chuyuan Kindergarten (Lotus Garden) in September 2020 to study in the first class of kindergarten, and on July 6, 2021 from [[Qidong County]] Chuyuan Kindergarten graduated, and held the first class opening ceremony and graduation ceremony on the same day. </noinclude> === Class photo === {| class="wikitable" !
